433 
434 void remove_radio_mod( item &it, Character &p )
435 {
436  if( !it.has_flag( flag_RADIO_MOD ) ) {
437  return;
438  }
439  p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You remove the radio modification from your %s." ), it.tname() );
440  item mod( "radio_mod" );
441  p.i_add_or_drop( mod, 1 );
442  it.unset_flag( flag_RADIO_ACTIVATION );
443  it.unset_flag( flag_RADIO_MOD );
444  it.unset_flag( flag_RADIOSIGNAL_1 );
445  it.unset_flag( flag_RADIOSIGNAL_2 );
446  it.unset_flag( flag_RADIOSIGNAL_3 );
447  it.unset_flag( flag_RADIOCARITEM );
448 }
449 
450 // Checks that the player can smoke
451 std::optional<std::string> iuse::can_smoke( const Character &you )
452 {
453  auto cigs = you.cache_get_items_with( flag_LITCIG, []( const item & it ) {
454  return it.active;
455  } );
456 
457  if( !cigs.empty() ) {
458  return string_format( _( "You're already smoking a %s!" ), cigs[0]->tname() );
459  }
460 
461  if( !you.has_charges( itype_fire, 1 ) ) {
462  return _( "You don't have anything to light it with!" );
463  }
464  return std::nullopt;
465 }
466 
467 std::optional<int> iuse::sewage( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
468 {
469  if( !p->query_yn( _( "Are you sure you want to drink this?" ) ) ) {
470  return std::nullopt;
471  }
472 
473  get_event_bus().send<event_type::eats_sewage>();
474  p->vomit();
475  return 1;
476 }
477 
478 std::optional<int> iuse::honeycomb( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
479 {
480  get_map().spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_wax, 2 );
481  return 1;
482 }
483 
484 std::optional<int> iuse::xanax( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
485 {
486  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You take some %s." ), it->tname() );
487  p->add_effect( effect_took_xanax, 90_minutes );
488  p->add_effect( effect_took_xanax_visible, rng( 70_minutes, 110_minutes ) );
489  return 1;
490 }
491 
492 static constexpr time_duration alc_strength( const int strength, const time_duration &weak,
493  const time_duration &medium, const time_duration &strong )
494 {
495  return strength == 0 ? weak : strength == 1 ? medium : strong;
496 }
497 
498 static int alcohol( Character &p, const item &it, const int strength )
499 {
500  // Weaker characters are cheap drunks
501  /** @EFFECT_STR_MAX reduces drunkenness duration */
502  time_duration duration = alc_strength( strength, 22_minutes, 34_minutes,
503  45_minutes ) - ( alc_strength( strength, 36_seconds, 1_minutes, 72_seconds ) * p.str_max );
504  if( p.has_trait( trait_ALCMET ) ) {
505  duration = alc_strength( strength, 6_minutes, 14_minutes, 18_minutes ) - ( alc_strength( strength,
506  36_seconds, 1_minutes, 1_minutes ) * p.str_max );
507  // Metabolizing the booze improves the nutritional value;
508  // might not be healthy, and still causes Thirst problems, though
509  p.stomach.mod_nutr( -std::abs( it.get_comestible() ? it.type->comestible->stim : 0 ) );
510  // Metabolizing it cancels out the depressant
511  p.mod_stim( std::abs( it.get_comestible() ? it.get_comestible()->stim : 0 ) );
512  } else if( p.has_trait( trait_TOLERANCE ) ) {
513  duration -= alc_strength( strength, 9_minutes, 16_minutes, 24_minutes );
514  } else if( p.has_trait( trait_LIGHTWEIGHT ) ) {
515  duration += alc_strength( strength, 9_minutes, 16_minutes, 24_minutes );
516  }
517  p.add_effect( effect_drunk, duration );
518  return 1;
519 }
520 
521 std::optional<int> iuse::alcohol_weak( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
522 {
523  return alcohol( *p, *it, 0 );
524 }
525 
526 std::optional<int> iuse::alcohol_medium( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
527 {
528  return alcohol( *p, *it, 1 );
529 }
530 
531 std::optional<int> iuse::alcohol_strong( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
532 {
533  return alcohol( *p, *it, 2 );
534 }
535 
536 /**
537  * Entry point for intentional bodily intake of smoke via paper wrapped one
538  * time use items: cigars, cigarettes, etc.
539  *
540  * @param p Player doing the smoking
541  * @param it the item to be smoked.
542  * @return Charges used in item smoked
543  */
544 std::optional<int> iuse::smoking( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
545 {
546  std::optional<std::string> litcig = can_smoke( *p );
547  if( litcig.has_value() ) {
548  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( litcig.value_or( "" ) ) );
549  return std::nullopt;
550  }
551 
552  item cig;
553  if( it->typeId() == itype_cig || it->typeId() == itype_handrolled_cig ) {
554  cig = item( "cig_lit", calendar::turn );
555  cig.item_counter = to_turns<int>( 4_minutes );
556  p->mod_hunger( -3 );
557  p->mod_thirst( 2 );
558  } else if( it->typeId() == itype_cigar ) {
559  cig = item( "cigar_lit", calendar::turn );
560  cig.item_counter = to_turns<int>( 12_minutes );
561  p->mod_thirst( 3 );
562  p->mod_hunger( -4 );
563  } else if( it->typeId() == itype_joint ) {
564  cig = item( "joint_lit", calendar::turn );
565  cig.item_counter = to_turns<int>( 4_minutes );
566  p->mod_hunger( 4 );
567  p->mod_thirst( 6 );
568  if( p->get_painkiller() < 5 ) {
569  p->set_painkiller( ( p->get_painkiller() + 3 ) * 2 );
570  }
571  } else {
572  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
573  _( "Please let the devs know you should be able to smoke a %s, but the smoking code does not know how." ),
574  it->tname() );
575  return std::nullopt;
576  }
577  // If we're here, we better have a cig to light.
578  p->use_charges_if_avail( itype_fire, 1 );
579  cig.active = true;
580  p->inv->add_item( cig, false, true );
581  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You light a %s." ), cig.tname() );
582 
583  // Parting messages
584  if( it->typeId() == itype_joint ) {
585  // Would group with the joint, but awkward to mutter before lighting up.
586  if( one_in( 5 ) ) {
587  weed_msg( *p );
588  }
589  }
590  if( p->get_effect_dur( effect_cig ) > 10_minutes * ( p->addiction_level(
591  addiction_nicotine ) + 1 ) ) {
592  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Ugh, too much smoke you feel nasty." ) );
593  }
594 
595  return 1;
596 }
597 
598 std::optional<int> iuse::ecig( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
599 {
600  if( it->typeId() == itype_ecig ) {
601  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You take a puff from your electronic cigarette." ) );
602  } else if( it->typeId() == itype_advanced_ecig ) {
603  if( p->has_charges( itype_nicotine_liquid, 1 ) ) {
604  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral,
605  _( "You inhale some vapor from your advanced electronic cigarette." ) );
606  p->use_charges( itype_nicotine_liquid, 1 );
607  item dummy_ecig = item( "ecig", calendar::turn );
608  p->consume_effects( dummy_ecig );
609  } else {
610  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't have any nicotine liquid!" ) );
611  return std::nullopt;
612  }
613  }
614 
615  p->mod_thirst( 1 );
616  p->mod_hunger( -1 );
617  p->add_effect( effect_cig, 10_minutes );
618  if( p->get_effect_dur( effect_cig ) > 10_minutes * ( p->addiction_level(
619  addiction_nicotine ) + 1 ) ) {
620  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Ugh, too much nicotine you feel nasty." ) );
621  }
622  return 1;
623 }
624 
625 std::optional<int> iuse::antibiotic( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
626 {
627  p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_neutral,
628  _( "You take some antibiotics." ),
629  _( "<npcname> takes some antibiotics." ) );
630  if( p->has_effect( effect_tetanus ) ) {
631  if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
632  p->remove_effect( effect_tetanus );
633  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The muscle spasms start to go away." ) );
634  } else {
635  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "The medication does nothing to help the spasms." ) );
636  }
637  }
638  if( p->has_effect( effect_infected ) && !p->has_effect( effect_antibiotic ) ) {
639  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
640  _( "Maybe this is just the placebo effect, but you feel a little better as the dose settles in." ) );
641  }
642  p->add_effect( effect_antibiotic, 12_hours );
643  p->add_effect( effect_antibiotic_visible, rng( 9_hours, 15_hours ) );
644  return 1;
645 }
646 
647 std::optional<int> iuse::eyedrops( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
648 {
649  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
650  return std::nullopt;
651  }
652  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
653  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You're out of %s." ), it->tname() );
654  return std::nullopt;
655  }
656  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You use your %s." ), it->tname() );
657  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
658  if( p->has_effect( effect_boomered ) ) {
659  p->remove_effect( effect_boomered );
660  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You wash the slime from your eyes." ) );
661  }
662  return 1;
663 }
664 
665 std::optional<int> iuse::fungicide( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
666 {
667  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
668  return std::nullopt;
669  }
670 
671  const bool has_fungus = p->has_effect( effect_fungus );
672  const bool has_spores = p->has_effect( effect_spores );
673 
674  if( p->is_npc() && !has_fungus && !has_spores ) {
675  return std::nullopt;
676  }
677 
678  p->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You use your fungicide." ), _( "<npcname> uses some fungicide." ) );
679  if( has_fungus && one_in( 3 ) ) {
680  // this is not a medicine, the effect is shorter
681  p->add_effect( effect_antifungal, 1_hours );
682  if( p->has_effect( effect_fungus ) ) {
683  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
684  _( "You feel a burning sensation slowly radiating throughout your skin." ) );
685  }
686  }
687  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
688  if( has_spores && one_in( 2 ) ) {
689  if( !p->has_effect( effect_fungus ) ) {
690  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Your skin grows warm for a moment." ) );
691  }
692  p->remove_effect( effect_spores );
693  int spore_count = rng( 1, 6 );
694  map &here = get_map();
695  for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( p->pos(), 1 ) ) {
696  if( spore_count == 0 ) {
697  break;
698  }
699  if( dest == p->pos() ) {
700  continue;
701  }
702  if( here.passable( dest ) && x_in_y( spore_count, 8 ) ) {
703  if( monster *const mon_ptr = creatures.creature_at<monster>( dest ) ) {
704  monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
705  if( !critter.type->in_species( species_FUNGUS ) ) {
706  add_msg_if_player_sees( dest, m_warning, _( "The %s is covered in tiny spores!" ),
707  critter.name() );
708  }
709  if( !critter.make_fungus() ) {
710  critter.die( p ); // counts as kill by player
711  }
712  } else {
713  g->place_critter_at( mon_spore, dest );
714  }
715  spore_count--;
716  }
717  }
718  }
719  return 1;
720 }
721 
722 std::optional<int> iuse::antifungal( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
723 {
724  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
725  return std::nullopt;
726  }
727  p->add_effect( effect_antifungal, 4_hours );
728  if( p->has_effect( effect_fungus ) ) {
729  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
730  _( "You feel a burning sensation slowly radiating throughout your skin." ) );
731  }
732  if( p->has_effect( effect_spores ) ) {
733  if( !p->has_effect( effect_fungus ) ) {
734  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Your skin grows warm for a moment." ) );
735  }
736  }
737  return 1;
738 }
739 
740 std::optional<int> iuse::antiparasitic( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
741 {
742  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
743  return std::nullopt;
744  }
745  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You take some antiparasitic medication." ) );
746  if( p->has_effect( effect_dermatik ) ) {
747  p->remove_effect( effect_dermatik );
748  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The itching sensation under your skin fades away." ) );
749  }
750  if( p->has_effect( effect_tapeworm ) ) {
751  p->remove_effect( effect_tapeworm );
752  p->guts.mod_nutr( -1 ); // You just digested the tapeworm.
753  if( p->has_flag( json_flag_PAIN_IMMUNE ) ) {
754  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Your bowels clench as something inside them dies." ) );
755  } else {
756  p->add_msg_if_player( m_mixed, _( "Your bowels spasm painfully as something inside them dies." ) );
757  p->mod_pain( rng( 8, 24 ) );
758  }
759  }
760  if( p->has_effect( effect_bloodworms ) ) {
761  p->remove_effect( effect_bloodworms );
762  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Your skin prickles and your veins itch for a few moments." ) );
763  }
764  if( p->has_effect( effect_blood_spiders ) ) {
765  p->remove_effect( effect_blood_spiders );
766  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Your veins relax in a soothing wave through your body." ) );
767  }
768  if( p->has_effect( effect_brainworms ) ) {
769  p->remove_effect( effect_brainworms );
770  if( p->has_flag( json_flag_PAIN_IMMUNE ) ) {
771  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The pressure inside your head feels better already." ) );
772  } else {
773  p->add_msg_if_player( m_mixed,
774  _( "Your head pounds like a sore tooth as something inside of it dies." ) );
775  p->mod_pain( rng( 8, 24 ) );
776  }
777  }
778  if( p->has_effect( effect_paincysts ) ) {
779  p->remove_effect( effect_paincysts );
780  if( p->has_flag( json_flag_PAIN_IMMUNE ) ) {
781  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The stiffness in your joints goes away." ) );
782  } else {
783  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The pain in your joints goes away." ) );
784  }
785  }
786  return 1;
787 }
788 
789 std::optional<int> iuse::anticonvulsant( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
790 {
791  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You take some anticonvulsant medication." ) );
792  /** @EFFECT_STR reduces duration of anticonvulsant medication */
793  time_duration duration = 8_hours - p->str_cur * rng( 0_turns, 10_minutes );
794  if( p->has_trait( trait_TOLERANCE ) ) {
795  duration -= 1_hours;
796  }
797  if( p->has_trait( trait_LIGHTWEIGHT ) ) {
798  duration += 2_hours;
799  }
800  p->add_effect( effect_valium, duration );
801  p->add_effect( effect_took_anticonvulsant_visible, duration );
802  p->add_effect( effect_high, duration );
803  if( p->has_effect( effect_shakes ) ) {
804  p->remove_effect( effect_shakes );
805  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You stop shaking." ) );
806  }
807  return 1;
808 }
809 
810 std::optional<int> iuse::weed_cake( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
811 {
812  p->add_msg_if_player(
813  _( "You start scarfing down the delicious cake. It tastes a little funny, though" ) );
814  time_duration duration = 12_minutes;
815  if( p->has_trait( trait_TOLERANCE ) ) {
816  duration = 9_minutes;
817  }
818  if( p->has_trait( trait_LIGHTWEIGHT ) ) {
819  duration = 15_minutes;
820  }
821  p->mod_hunger( 2 );
822  p->mod_thirst( 6 );
823  if( p->get_painkiller() < 5 ) {
824  p->set_painkiller( ( p->get_painkiller() + 3 ) * 2 );
825  }
826  p->add_effect( effect_weed_high, duration );
827  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
828  if( one_in( 5 ) ) {
829  weed_msg( *p );
830  }
831  return 1;
832 }
833 
834 std::optional<int> iuse::coke( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
835 {
836  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You snort a bump of coke." ) );
837  /** @EFFECT_STR reduces duration of coke */
838  time_duration duration = 20_minutes - 1_seconds * p->str_cur + rng( 0_minutes, 1_minutes );
839  if( p->has_trait( trait_TOLERANCE ) ) {
840  duration -= 1_minutes; // Symmetry would cause problems :-/
841  }
842  if( p->has_trait( trait_LIGHTWEIGHT ) ) {
843  duration += 2_minutes;
844  }
845  p->mod_hunger( -8 );
846  p->add_effect( effect_high, duration );
847  return 1;
848 }
849 
850 std::optional<int> iuse::meth( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
851 {
852  /** @EFFECT_STR reduces duration of meth */
853  time_duration duration = 1_minutes * ( 60 - p->str_cur );
854  if( p->has_amount( itype_apparatus, 1 ) && p->use_charges_if_avail( itype_fire, 1 ) ) {
855  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You smoke your meth." ) );
856  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The world seems to sharpen." ) );
857  p->mod_sleepiness( -375 );
858  if( p->has_trait( trait_TOLERANCE ) ) {
859  duration *= 1.2;
860  } else {
861  duration *= ( p->has_trait( trait_LIGHTWEIGHT ) ? 1.8 : 1.5 );
862  }
863  map &here = get_map();
864  // breathe out some smoke
865  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
866  point offset( rng( -2, 2 ), rng( -2, 2 ) );
867  here.add_field( p->pos_bub() + offset, field_type_id( "fd_methsmoke" ), 2 );
868  }
869  } else {
870  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You snort some crystal meth." ) );
871  p->mod_sleepiness( -300 );
872  }
873  if( !p->has_effect( effect_meth ) ) {
874  duration += 1_hours;
875  }
876  if( duration > 0_turns ) {
877  // meth actually inhibits hunger, weaker characters benefit more
878  /** @EFFECT_STR_MAX >4 experiences less hunger benefit from meth */
879  int hungerpen = p->str_max < 5 ? 35 : 40 - ( 2 * p->str_max );
880  if( hungerpen > 0 ) {
881  p->mod_hunger( -hungerpen );
882  }
883  p->add_effect( effect_meth, duration );
884  }
885  return 1;
886 }
887 
888 std::optional<int> iuse::flu_vaccine( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
889 {
890  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You inject the vaccine." ) );
891  time_point expiration_date = it->birthday() + 24_weeks;
892  time_duration remaining_time = expiration_date - calendar::turn;
893  // FIXME Removing feedback and visible status would be more realistic
894  if( remaining_time > 0_turns ) {
895  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You no longer need to fear the flu, at least for some time." ) );
896  p->add_effect( effect_flushot, remaining_time, false );
897  } else {
898  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
899  _( "You notice the date on the packaging is pretty old. It may no longer be effective." ) );
900  }
901  p->mod_pain( 3 );
902  item syringe( "syringe", it->birthday() );
903  p->i_add_or_drop( syringe );
904  return 1;
905 }
906 
907 std::optional<int> iuse::poison( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
908 {
909  if( p->has_trait( trait_EATDEAD ) ) {
910  return 1;
911  }
912 
913  // NPCs have a magical sense of what is inedible
914  // Players can abuse the crafting menu instead...
915  if( !it->has_flag( flag_HIDDEN_POISON ) &&
916  ( p->is_npc() ||
917  !p->query_yn( _( "Are you sure you want to eat this? It looks poisonous" ) ) ) ) {
918  return std::nullopt;
919  }
920  /** @EFFECT_STR increases EATPOISON trait effectiveness (50-90%) */
921  if( p->has_trait( trait_EATPOISON ) && ( !one_in( p->str_cur / 2 ) ) ) {
922  return 1;
923  }
924  p->add_effect( effect_poison, 1_hours );
925  p->add_effect( effect_foodpoison, 3_hours );
926  return 1;
927 }
928 
929 std::optional<int> iuse::meditate( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
930 {
931  if( !p ) {
932  debugmsg( "%s called action meditate that requires character but no character is present",
933  it->typeId().str() );
934  return std::nullopt;
935  }
936  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
937  return std::nullopt;
938  }
939  if( p->has_trait( trait_SPIRITUAL ) ) {
940  p->assign_activity( meditate_activity_actor() );
941  } else {
942  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "This %s probably meant a lot to someone at one time." ),
943  it->tname() );
944  }
945  return 1;
946 }
947 
948 std::optional<int> iuse::thorazine( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
949 {
950  if( p->has_effect( effect_took_thorazine ) ) {
951  p->remove_effect( effect_took_thorazine );
952  p->mod_sleepiness( 15 );
953  }
954  p->add_effect( effect_took_thorazine, 12_hours );
955  p->mod_sleepiness( 5 );
956  p->remove_effect( effect_hallu );
957  p->remove_effect( effect_visuals );
958  p->remove_effect( effect_high );
959  if( !p->has_effect( effect_dermatik ) ) {
960  p->remove_effect( effect_formication );
961  }
962  if( one_in( 50 ) ) { // adverse reaction
963  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You feel completely exhausted." ) );
964  p->mod_sleepiness( 15 );
965  p->add_effect( effect_took_thorazine_bad, p->get_effect_dur( effect_took_thorazine ) );
966  } else {
967  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You feel a bit wobbly." ) );
968  }
969  p->add_effect( effect_took_thorazine_visible, rng( 9_hours, 15_hours ) );
970  return 1;
971 }
972 
973 std::optional<int> iuse::prozac( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
974 {
975  if( !p->has_effect( effect_took_prozac ) ) {
976  p->add_effect( effect_took_prozac, 12_hours );
977  } else {
978  p->mod_stim( 3 );
979  }
980  if( one_in( 50 ) ) { // adverse reaction, same duration as prozac effect.
981  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You suddenly feel hollow inside." ) );
982  p->add_effect( effect_took_prozac_bad, p->get_effect_dur( effect_took_prozac ) );
983  }
984  p->add_effect( effect_took_prozac_visible, rng( 9_hours, 15_hours ) );
985  return 1;
986 }
987 
988 std::optional<int> iuse::datura( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
989 {
990  if( p->is_npc() ) {
991  return std::nullopt;
992  }
993 
994  p->add_effect( effect_datura, rng( 3_hours, 13_hours ) );
995  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You eat the datura seed." ) );
996  if( p->has_trait( trait_SPIRITUAL ) ) {
997  p->add_morale( MORALE_FOOD_GOOD, 36, 72, 2_hours, 1_hours, false, it->type );
998  }
999  return 1;
1000 }
1001 
1002 std::optional<int> iuse::flumed( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
1003 {
1004  p->add_effect( effect_took_flumed, 10_hours );
1005  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You take some %s." ), it->tname() );
1006  return 1;
1007 }
1008 
1009 std::optional<int> iuse::flusleep( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
1010 {
1011  p->add_effect( effect_took_flumed, 12_hours );
1012  p->mod_sleepiness( 30 );
1013  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You take some %s." ), it->tname() );
1014  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You feel very sleepy" ) );
1015  return 1;
1016 }
1017 
1018 std::optional<int> iuse::inhaler( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
1019 {
1020  p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_neutral, _( "You take a puff from your inhaler." ),
1021  _( "<npcname> takes a puff from their inhaler." ) );
1022  if( !p->remove_effect( effect_asthma ) ) {
1023  p->mod_sleepiness( -3 ); // if we don't have asthma can be used as stimulant
1024  if( one_in( 20 ) ) { // with a small but significant risk of adverse reaction
1025  p->add_effect( effect_shakes, rng( 2_minutes, 5_minutes ) );
1026  }
1027  }
1028  p->add_effect( effect_took_antiasthmatic, rng( 6_hours, 12_hours ) );
1029  p->remove_effect( effect_smoke_lungs );
1030  return 1;
1031 }
1032 
1033 std::optional<int> iuse::oxygen_bottle( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
1034 {
1035  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
1036  p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_neutral, string_format( _( "You breathe deeply from the %s." ),
1037  it->tname() ),
1038  string_format( _( "<npcname> breathes from the %s." ),
1039  it->tname() ) );
1040  if( p->has_effect( effect_smoke_lungs ) ) {
1041  p->remove_effect( effect_smoke_lungs );
1042  } else if( p->has_effect( effect_teargas ) ) {
1043  p->remove_effect( effect_teargas );
1044  } else if( p->has_effect( effect_asthma ) ) {
1045  p->remove_effect( effect_asthma );
1046  } else if( p->get_stim() < 16 ) {
1047  p->mod_stim( 8 );
1048  p->mod_painkiller( 2 );
1049  }
1050  p->mod_painkiller( 2 );
1051  return 1;
1052 }
1053 
1054 std::optional<int> iuse::blech( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
1055 {
1056  // TODO: Add more effects?
1057  if( it->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
1058  if( !p->query_yn( _( "This looks unhealthy, sure you want to drink it?" ) ) ) {
1059  return std::nullopt;
1060  }
1061  } else { //Assume that if a blech consumable isn't a drink, it will be eaten.
1062  if( !p->query_yn( _( "This looks unhealthy, sure you want to eat it?" ) ) ) {
1063  return std::nullopt;
1064  }
1065  }
1066 
1067  if( it->has_flag( flag_ACID ) && ( p->has_trait( trait_ACIDPROOF ) ||
1068  p->has_trait( trait_ACIDBLOOD ) ) ) {
1069  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Blech, that tastes gross!" ) );
1070  //reverse the harmful values of drinking this acid.
1071  double multiplier = -1;
1072  p->stomach.mod_nutr( -p->nutrition_for( *it ) * multiplier );
1073  p->mod_thirst( -it->get_comestible()->quench * multiplier );
1074  p->stomach.mod_quench( 20 ); //acidproof people can drink acids like diluted water.
1075  p->mod_daily_health( it->get_comestible()->healthy * multiplier,
1076  it->get_comestible()->healthy * multiplier );
1077  p->add_morale( MORALE_FOOD_BAD, it->get_comestible_fun() * multiplier, 60, 1_hours, 30_minutes,
1078  false, it->type );
1079  } else if( it->has_flag( flag_ACID ) || it->has_flag( flag_CORROSIVE ) ) {
1080  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Blech, that burns your throat!" ) );
1081  p->mod_pain( rng( 32, 64 ) );
1082  p->add_effect( effect_poison, 1_hours );
1083  p->apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), rng( 4, 12 ) );
1084  p->vomit();
1085  } else {
1086  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Blech, you don't feel you can stomach much of that." ) );
1087  p->add_effect( effect_nausea, 3_minutes );
1088  }
1089  return 1;
1090 }
1091 
1092 std::optional<int> iuse::blech_because_unclean( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
1093 {
1094  if( !p->is_npc() ) {
1095  if( it->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
1096  if( !p->query_yn( _( "This looks unclean; are you sure you want to drink it?" ) ) ) {
1097  return std::nullopt;
1098  }
1099  } else { //Assume that if a blech consumable isn't a drink, it will be eaten.
1100  if( !p->query_yn( _( "This looks unclean; are you sure you want to eat it?" ) ) ) {
1101  return std::nullopt;
1102  }
1103  }
1104  }
1105  return 1;
1106 }
1107 
1108 std::optional<int> iuse::plantblech( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
1109 {
1110  if( p->has_trait( trait_THRESH_PLANT ) ) {
1111  double multiplier = -1;
1112  if( p->has_trait( trait_CHLOROMORPH ) ) {
1113  multiplier = -3;
1114  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The meal is revitalizing." ) );
1115  } else {
1116  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Oddly enough, this doesn't taste so bad." ) );
1117  }
1118 
1119  //reverses the harmful values of drinking fertilizer
1120  p->stomach.mod_nutr( p->nutrition_for( *it ) * multiplier );
1121  p->mod_thirst( -it->get_comestible()->quench * multiplier );
1122  p->mod_daily_health( it->get_comestible()->healthy * multiplier,
1123  it->get_comestible()->healthy * multiplier );
1124  p->add_morale( MORALE_FOOD_GOOD, -10 * multiplier, 60, 1_hours, 30_minutes, false, it->type );
1125  return 1;
1126  } else {
1127  return blech( p, it, pos );
1128  }
1129 }
1130 
1131 std::optional<int> iuse::chew( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
1132 {
1133  // TODO: Add more effects?
1134  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You chew your %s." ), it->tname() );
1135  return 1;
1136 }
1137 
1138 // Helper to handle the logic of removing some random mutations.
1139 static void do_purify( Character &p )
1140 {
1141  std::vector<trait_id> valid; // Which flags the player has
1142  for( const mutation_branch &traits_iter : mutation_branch::get_all() ) {
1143  if( p.has_trait( traits_iter.id ) && !p.has_base_trait( traits_iter.id ) ) {
1144  //Looks for active mutation
1145  valid.push_back( traits_iter.id );
1146  }
1147  }
1148  if( valid.empty() ) {
1149  p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You feel cleansed." ) );
1150  return;
1151  }
1152  int num_cured = rng( 1, valid.size() );
1153  num_cured = std::min( 4, num_cured );
1154  for( int i = 0; i < num_cured && !valid.empty(); i++ ) {
1155  const trait_id id = random_entry_removed( valid );
1156  if( p.purifiable( id ) ) {
1157  p.remove_mutation( id );
1158  } else {
1159  p.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You feel a slight itching inside, but it passes." ) );
1160  }
1161  }
1162 }
1163 
1164 std::optional<int> iuse::purify_smart( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
1165 {
1166  std::vector<trait_id> valid; // Which flags the player has
1167  std::vector<std::string> valid_names; // Which flags the player has
1168  for( const mutation_branch &traits_iter : mutation_branch::get_all() ) {
1169  if( p->has_trait( traits_iter.id ) &&
1170  !p->has_base_trait( traits_iter.id ) &&
1171  p->purifiable( traits_iter.id ) ) {
1172  //Looks for active mutation
1173  valid.push_back( traits_iter.id );
1174  valid_names.push_back( p->mutation_name( traits_iter.id ) );
1175  }
1176  }
1177  if( valid.empty() ) {
1178  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You don't have any mutations to purify." ) );
1179  return std::nullopt;
1180  }
1181 
1182  int mutation_index = uilist( _( "Choose a mutation to purify: " ), valid_names );
1183  // Because valid_names doesn't start with a space,
1184  // include one here to prettify the output
1185  if( mutation_index < 0 ) {
1186  return std::nullopt;
1187  }
1188 
1189  p->add_msg_if_player(
1190  _( "You inject the purifier. The liquid thrashes inside the tube and goes down reluctantly." ) );
1191 
1192  p->remove_mutation( valid[mutation_index] );
1193  valid.erase( valid.begin() + mutation_index );
1194 
1195  // and one or two more untargeted purifications.
1196  if( !valid.empty() ) {
1197  p->remove_mutation( random_entry_removed( valid ) );
1198  }
1199  if( !valid.empty() && one_in( 2 ) ) {
1200  p->remove_mutation( random_entry_removed( valid ) );
1201  }
1202 
1203  p->mod_pain( 3 );
1204 
1205  item syringe( "syringe", it->birthday() );
1206  p->i_add( syringe );
1207  p->vitamins_mod( it->get_comestible()->default_nutrition.vitamins() );
1208  get_event_bus().send<event_type::administers_mutagen>( p->getID(),
1209  mutagen_technique::injected_smart_purifier );
1210  return 1;
1211 }
1212 
1213 static void spawn_spores( const Character &p )
1214 {
1215  int spores_spawned = 0;
1216  map &here = get_map();
1217  fungal_effects fe;
1218  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
1219  for( const tripoint &dest : closest_points_first( p.pos(), 4 ) ) {
1220  if( here.impassable( dest ) ) {
1221  continue;
1222  }
1223  float dist = rl_dist( dest, p.pos() );
1224  if( x_in_y( 1, dist ) ) {
1225  fe.marlossify( dest );
1226  }
1227  if( creatures.creature_at( dest ) != nullptr ) {
1228  continue;
1229  }
1230  if( one_in( 10 + 5 * dist ) && one_in( spores_spawned * 2 ) ) {
1231  if( monster *const spore = g->place_critter_at( mon_spore, dest ) ) {
1232  spore->friendly = -1;
1233  spores_spawned++;
1234  }
1235  }
1236  }
1237 }
1238 
1239 static void marloss_common( Character &p, item &it, const trait_id &current_color )
1240 {
1241  static const std::map<trait_id, addiction_id> mycus_colors = {{
1242  { trait_MARLOSS_BLUE, addiction_marloss_b }, { trait_MARLOSS_YELLOW, addiction_marloss_y }, { trait_MARLOSS, addiction_marloss_r }
1243  }
1244  };
1245 
1246  if( p.has_trait( current_color ) || p.has_trait( trait_THRESH_MARLOSS ) ) {
1247  p.add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1248  _( "As you eat the %s, you have a near-religious experience, feeling at one with your surroundings" ),
1249  it.tname() );
1250  p.add_morale( MORALE_MARLOSS, 100, 1000 );
1251  for( const std::pair<const trait_id, addiction_id> &pr : mycus_colors ) {
1252  if( pr.first != current_color ) {
1253  p.add_addiction( pr.second, 50 );
1254  }
1255  }
1256 
1257  p.set_hunger( -10 );
1258  spawn_spores( p );
1259  return;
1260  }
1261 
1262  int marloss_count = std::count_if( mycus_colors.begin(), mycus_colors.end(),
1263  [&p]( const std::pair<trait_id, addiction_id> &pr ) {
1264  return p.has_trait( pr.first );
1265  } );
1266 
1267  /* If we're not already carriers of current type of Marloss, roll for a random effect:
1268  * 1 - Mutate
1269  * 2 - Mutate
1270  * 3 - Mutate
1271  * 4 - Painkiller
1272  * 5 - Painkiller
1273  * 6 - Cleanse radiation + Painkiller
1274  * 7 - Fully satiate
1275  * 8 - Vomit
1276  * 9-12 - Give Marloss mutation
1277  */
1278  int effect = rng( 1, 12 );
1279  if( effect <= 3 ) {
1280  p.add_msg_if_player( _( "It tastes extremely strange!" ) );
1281  p.mutate();
1282  // Gruss dich, mutation drain, missed you!
1283  p.mod_pain( 2 * rng( 1, 5 ) );
1284  p.mod_stored_kcal( -87 );
1285  p.mod_thirst( 10 );
1286  p.mod_sleepiness( 5 );
1287  } else if( effect <= 6 ) { // Radiation cleanse is below
1288  p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You feel better all over." ) );
1289  p.mod_painkiller( 30 );
1290  p.mod_pain( -40 );
1291  if( effect == 6 ) {
1292  p.set_rad( 0 );
1293  }
1294  } else if( effect == 7 ) {
1295 
1296  // previously used to set hunger to -10. with the new system, needs to do something
1297  // else that actually makes sense, so it is a little bit more involved.
1298  units::volume fulfill_vol = std::max( p.stomach.capacity( p ) / 8 - p.stomach.contains(), 0_ml );
1299  if( fulfill_vol != 0_ml ) {
1300  p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "It is delicious, and very filling!" ) );
1301  int fulfill_cal = units::to_milliliter( fulfill_vol * 6 );
1302  p.stomach.mod_calories( fulfill_cal );
1303  p.stomach.mod_contents( fulfill_vol );
1304  } else {
1305  p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "It is delicious, but you can't eat any more." ) );
1306  }
1307  } else if( effect == 8 ) {
1308  p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You take one bite, and immediately vomit!" ) );
1309  p.vomit();
1310  } else if( p.crossed_threshold() ) {
1311  // Mycus Rejection. Goo already present fights off the fungus.
1312  p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
1313  _( "You feel a familiar warmth, but suddenly it surges into an excruciating burn as you convulse, vomiting, and black out" ) );
1314  if( p.is_avatar() ) {
1315  get_memorial().add(
1316  pgettext( "memorial_male", "Suffered Marloss Rejection." ),
1317  pgettext( "memorial_female", "Suffered Marloss Rejection." ) );
1318  }
1319  p.vomit();
1320  p.mod_pain( 90 );
1321  p.hurtall( rng( 40, 65 ), nullptr ); // No good way to say "lose half your current HP"
1322  /** @EFFECT_INT slightly reduces sleep duration when eating Mycus+goo */
1323  p.fall_asleep( 10_hours - p.int_cur *
1324  1_minutes ); // Hope you were eating someplace safe. Mycus v. goo in your guts is no joke.
1325  for( const std::pair<const trait_id, addiction_id> &pr : mycus_colors ) {
1326  p.unset_mutation( pr.first );
1327  p.rem_addiction( pr.second );
1328  }
1329  p.set_mutation(
1330  trait_MARLOSS_AVOID ); // And if you survive it's etched in your RNA, so you're unlikely to repeat the experiment.
1331  } else if( marloss_count >= 2 ) {
1332  p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
1333  _( "You feel a familiar warmth, but suddenly it surges into painful burning as you convulse and collapse to the ground" ) );
1334  /** @EFFECT_INT reduces sleep duration when eating wrong color Marloss */
1335  p.fall_asleep( 40_minutes - 1_minutes * p.int_cur / 2 );
1336  for( const std::pair<const trait_id, addiction_id> &pr : mycus_colors ) {
1337  p.unset_mutation( pr.first );
1338  p.rem_addiction( pr.second );
1339  }
1340 
1341  p.set_mutation( trait_THRESH_MARLOSS );
1342  get_map().ter_set( p.pos(), ter_t_marloss );
1343  get_event_bus().send<event_type::crosses_marloss_threshold>( p.getID() );
1344  p.add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1345  _( "You wake up in a Marloss bush. Almost *cradled* in it, actually, as though it grew there for you." ) );
1346  p.add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1347  //~ Beginning to hear the Mycus while conscious: that's it speaking
1348  _( "unity. together we have reached the door. we provide the final key. now to pass through" ) );
1349  } else {
1350  p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You feel a strange warmth spreading throughout your body" ) );
1351  p.set_mutation( current_color );
1352  // Give us addictions to the other two colors, but cure one for current color
1353  for( const std::pair<const trait_id, addiction_id> &pr : mycus_colors ) {
1354  if( pr.first == current_color ) {
1355  p.rem_addiction( pr.second );
1356  } else {
1357  p.add_addiction( pr.second, 60 );
1358  }
1359  }
1360  }
1361 }
1362 
1363 static bool marloss_prevented( const Character &p )
1364 {
1365  if( p.is_npc() ) {
1366  return true;
1367  }
1368  if( p.has_trait( trait_MARLOSS_AVOID ) ) {
1369  p.add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1370  //~ "Nuh-uh" is a sound used for "nope", "no", etc.
1371  _( "After what happened that last time? Nuh-uh. You're not eating that alien poison." ) );
1372  return true;
1373  }
1374  if( p.has_trait( trait_THRESH_MYCUS ) ) {
1375  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1376  _( "we no longer require this scaffolding. we reserve it for other uses." ) );
1377  return true;
1378  }
1379 
1380  return false;
1381 }
1382 
1383 std::optional<int> iuse::marloss( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
1384 {
1385  if( marloss_prevented( *p ) ) {
1386  return std::nullopt;
1387  }
1388 
1389  get_event_bus().send<event_type::consumes_marloss_item>( p->getID(), it->typeId() );
1390 
1391  marloss_common( *p, *it, trait_MARLOSS );
1392  return 1;
1393 }
1394 
1395 std::optional<int> iuse::marloss_seed( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
1396 {
1397  if( !query_yn( _( "Are you sure you want to eat the %s? You could plant it in a mound of dirt." ),
1398  colorize( it->tname(), it->color_in_inventory() ) ) ) {
1399  return std::nullopt; // Save the seed for later!
1400  }
1401 
1402  if( marloss_prevented( *p ) ) {
1403  return std::nullopt;
1404  }
1405 
1406  get_event_bus().send<event_type::consumes_marloss_item>( p->getID(), it->typeId() );
1407 
1408  marloss_common( *p, *it, trait_MARLOSS_BLUE );
1409  return 1;
1410 }
1411 
1412 std::optional<int> iuse::marloss_gel( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
1413 {
1414  if( marloss_prevented( *p ) ) {
1415  return std::nullopt;
1416  }
1417 
1418  get_event_bus().send<event_type::consumes_marloss_item>( p->getID(), it->typeId() );
1419 
1420  marloss_common( *p, *it, trait_MARLOSS_YELLOW );
1421  return 1;
1422 }
1423 
1424 std::optional<int> iuse::mycus( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
1425 {
1426  if( p->is_npc() ) {
1427  return 1;
1428  }
1429  // Welcome our guide. Welcome. To. The Mycus.
1430 
1431  // From an end-user perspective, dialogue should be presented uniformly:
1432  // initial caps, as in human writing, or all lowercase letters.
1433  // I think that all lowercase, because it contrasts with normal convention, reinforces the Mycus' alien nature
1434 
1435  if( p->has_trait( trait_THRESH_MARLOSS ) ) {
1436  get_event_bus().send<event_type::crosses_mycus_threshold>( p->getID() );
1437  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral,
1438  _( "It tastes amazing, and you finish it quickly." ) );
1439  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You feel better all over." ) );
1440  p->mod_painkiller( 30 );
1441  p->set_rad( 0 );
1442  p->healall( 4 ); // Can't make you a whole new person, but not for lack of trying
1443  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1444  _( "As it settles in, you feel ecstasy radiating through every part of your body" ) );
1445  p->add_morale( MORALE_MARLOSS, 1000, 1000 ); // Last time you'll ever have it this good. So enjoy.
1446  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1447  _( "Your eyes roll back in your head. Everything dissolves into a blissful haze" ) );
1448  /** @EFFECT_INT slightly reduces sleep duration when eating Mycus */
1449  p->fall_asleep( 5_hours - p->int_cur * 1_minutes );
1450  p->unset_mutation( trait_THRESH_MARLOSS );
1451  p->set_mutation( trait_THRESH_MYCUS );
1452  g->invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
1453  //~ The Mycus does not use the term (or encourage the concept of) "you". The PC is a local/native organism, but is now the Mycus.
1454  //~ It still understands the concept, but uninitelligent fungaloids and mind-bent symbiotes should not need it.
1455  //~ We are the Mycus.
1456  popup( _( "we welcome into us. we have endured long in this forbidding world." ) );
1457  p->add_msg_if_player( " " );
1458  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1459  _( "A sea of white caps, waving gently. A haze of spores wafting silently over a forest." ) );
1460  g->invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
1461  popup( _( "the natives have a saying: \"e pluribus unum.\" out of many, one." ) );
1462  p->add_msg_if_player( " " );
1463  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1464  _( "The blazing pink redness of the berry. The juices spreading across our tongue, the warmth draping over us like a lover's embrace." ) );
1465  g->invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
1466  popup( _( "we welcome the union of our lines in our local guide. we will prosper, and unite this world. even now, our fruits adapt to better serve local physiology." ) );
1467  p->add_msg_if_player( " " );
1468  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1469  _( "The sky-blue of the seed. The nutty, creamy flavors intermingling with the berry, a memory that will never leave us." ) );
1470  g->invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
1471  popup( _( "as, in time, shall we adapt to better welcome those who have not received us." ) );
1472  p->add_msg_if_player( " " );
1473  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1474  _( "The amber-yellow of the sap. Feel it flowing through our veins, taking the place of the strange, thin red gruel called \"blood.\"" ) );
1475  g->invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
1476  popup( _( "we are the Mycus." ) );
1477  /*p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1478  _( "We welcome into us. We have endured long in this forbidding world." ) );
1479  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1480  _( "The natives have a saying: \"E Pluribus Unum\" Out of many, one." ) );
1481  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1482  _( "We welcome the union of our lines in our local guide. We will prosper, and unite this world." ) );
1483  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Even now, our fruits adapt to better serve local physiology." ) );
1484  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1485  _( "As, in time, shall we adapt to better welcome those who have not received us." ) );*/
1486  map &here = get_map();
1487  fungal_effects fe;
1488  for( const tripoint &nearby_pos : here.points_in_radius( p->pos(), 3 ) ) {
1489  if( here.move_cost( nearby_pos ) != 0 && !here.has_furn( nearby_pos ) &&
1490  !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, nearby_pos ) &&
1491  !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NO_FLOOR, nearby_pos ) ) {
1492  fe.marlossify( nearby_pos );
1493  }
1494  }
1495  p->rem_addiction( addiction_marloss_r );
1496  p->rem_addiction( addiction_marloss_b );
1497  p->rem_addiction( addiction_marloss_y );
1498  } else if( p->has_trait( trait_THRESH_MYCUS ) &&
1499  !p->has_trait( trait_M_DEPENDENT ) ) { // OK, now set the hook.
1500  if( !one_in( 3 ) ) {
1501  p->mutate_category( mutation_category_MYCUS, false, true );
1502  p->mod_stored_kcal( -87 );
1503  p->mod_thirst( 10 );
1504  p->mod_sleepiness( 5 );
1505  p->add_morale( MORALE_MARLOSS, 25, 200 ); // still covers up mutation pain
1506  }
1507  } else if( p->has_trait( trait_THRESH_MYCUS ) ) {
1508  p->mod_painkiller( 5 );
1509  p->mod_stim( 5 );
1510  } else { // In case someone gets one without having been adapted first.
1511  // Marloss is the Mycus' method of co-opting humans. Mycus fruit is for symbiotes' maintenance and development.
1512  p->add_msg_if_player(
1513  _( "This tastes really weird! You're not sure it's good for you" ) );
1514  p->mutate();
1515  p->mod_pain( 2 * rng( 1, 5 ) );
1516  p->mod_stored_kcal( -87 );
1517  p->mod_thirst( 10 );
1518  p->mod_sleepiness( 5 );
1519  p->vomit(); // no hunger/quench benefit for you
1520  p->mod_daily_health( -8, -50 );
1521  }
1522  return 1;
1523 }
1524 
1525 std::optional<int> iuse::petfood( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
1526 {
1527  if( !it->is_comestible() ) {
1528  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You doubt someone would want to eat %1$s." ), it->tname() );
1529  return std::nullopt;
1530  }
1531 
1532  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt = choose_adjacent( string_format(
1533  _( "Tame which animal with %s?" ),
1534  it->tname() ) );
1535  if( !pnt ) {
1536  return std::nullopt;
1537  }
1538 
1539  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
1540  // First a check to see if we are trying to feed a NPC dog food.
1541  if( npc *const who = creatures.creature_at<npc>( *pnt ) ) {
1542  if( query_yn( _( "Are you sure you want to feed a person %1$s?" ), it->tname() ) ) {
1543  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
1544  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You put your %1$s into %2$s's mouth!" ),
1545  it->tname(), who->disp_name( true ) );
1546  if( x_in_y( 9, 10 ) || who->is_ally( *p ) ) {
1547  who->say(
1548  _( "Okay, but please, don't give me this again. I don't want to eat pet food in the Cataclysm all day." ) );
1549  } else {
1550  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "%s knocks it from your hand!" ), who->disp_name() );
1551  who->make_angry();
1552  }
1553  p->consume_charges( *it, 1 );
1554  return std::nullopt;
1555  } else {
1556  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
1557  return std::nullopt;
1558  }
1559  // Then monsters.
1560  } else if( monster *const mon = creatures.creature_at<monster>( *pnt, true ) ) {
1561  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
1562 
1563  bool can_feed = false;
1564  const pet_food_data &petfood = mon->type->petfood;
1565  const std::set<std::string> &itemfood = it->get_comestible()->petfood;
1566  for( const std::string &food : petfood.food ) {
1567  if( itemfood.find( food ) != itemfood.end() ) {
1568  can_feed = true;
1569  break;
1570  }
1571  }
1572 
1573  if( !can_feed ) {
1574  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s doesn't want that kind of food." ), mon->get_name() );
1575  return std::nullopt;
1576  }
1577 
1578  bool halluc = mon->is_hallucination();
1579 
1580  if( mon->type->id == mon_dog_thing ) {
1581  if( !halluc ) {
1582  p->deal_damage( mon, bodypart_id( "hand_r" ), damage_instance( STATIC( damage_type_id( "cut" ) ),
1583  rng( 1, 10 ) ) );
1584  }
1585  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You want to feed it the dog food, but it bites your fingers!" ) );
1586  if( one_in( 5 ) ) {
1587  p->add_msg_if_player(
1588  _( "Apparently, it's more interested in your flesh than the dog food in your hand!" ) );
1589  if( halluc ) {
1590  item drop_me = p->reduce_charges( it, 1 );
1591  p->i_drop_at( drop_me );
1592  } else {
1593  p->consume_charges( *it, 1 );
1594  }
1595  }
1596  return std::nullopt;
1597  }
1598 
1599  if( halluc && one_in( 4 ) ) {
1600  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You try to feed the %1$s some %2$s, but it vanishes!" ),
1601  mon->type->nname(), it->tname() );
1602  mon->die( nullptr );
1603  return std::nullopt;
1604  }
1605 
1606  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You feed your %1$s to the %2$s." ), it->tname(), mon->get_name() );
1607  if( mon->has_flag( mon_flag_EATS ) ) {
1608  int kcal = it->get_comestible()->default_nutrition.kcal();
1609  mon->amount_eaten += kcal;
1610  if( mon->amount_eaten >= mon->stomach_size ) {
1611  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %1$s seems full now." ), mon->get_name() );
1612  }
1613  } else if( !mon->has_flag( mon_flag_EATS ) ) {
1614  mon->add_effect( effect_critter_well_fed, 24_hours );
1615  }
1616 
1617  if( petfood.feed.empty() ) {
1618  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The %1$s is your pet now!" ), mon->get_name() );
1619  } else {
1620  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, petfood.feed, mon->get_name() );
1621  }
1622 
1623  mon->friendly = -1;
1624  mon->add_effect( effect_pet, 1_turns, true );
1625  if( halluc ) {
1626  item drop_me = p->reduce_charges( it, 1 );
1627  p->i_drop_at( drop_me );
1628  } else {
1629  p->consume_charges( *it, 1 );
1630  }
1631  return std::nullopt;
1632  }
1633  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There is nothing to be fed here." ) );
1634  return std::nullopt;
1635 }
1636 
1637 std::optional<int> iuse::radio_mod( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
1638 {
1639  if( p->is_npc() ) {
1640  // Now THAT would be kinda cruel
1641  return std::nullopt;
1642  }
1643 
1644  auto filter = []( const item & itm ) {
1645  return itm.has_flag( flag_RADIO_MODABLE );
1646  };
1647 
1648  // note: if !p->is_npc() then p is avatar
1649  item_location loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu(
1650  filter, *p->as_avatar(), _( "Modify what?" ) );
1651 
1652  if( !loc ) {
1653  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You don't have that item!" ) );
1654  return std::nullopt;
1655  }
1656  item &modded = *loc;
1657 
1658  int choice = uilist( _( "Which signal should activate the item?" ), {
1659  _( "\"Red\"" ), _( "\"Blue\"" ), _( "\"Green\"" )
1660  } );
1661 
1662  flag_id newtag;
1663  std::string colorname;
1664  switch( choice ) {
1665  case 0:
1666  newtag = flag_RADIOSIGNAL_1;
1667  colorname = _( "\"Red\"" );
1668  break;
1669  case 1:
1670  newtag = flag_RADIOSIGNAL_2;
1671  colorname = _( "\"Blue\"" );
1672  break;
1673  case 2:
1674  newtag = flag_RADIOSIGNAL_3;
1675  colorname = _( "\"Green\"" );
1676  break;
1677  default:
1678  return std::nullopt;
1679  }
1680 
1681  if( modded.has_flag( flag_RADIO_MOD ) && modded.has_flag( newtag ) ) {
1682  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "This item has been modified this way already." ) );
1683  return std::nullopt;
1684  }
1685 
1686  remove_radio_mod( modded, *p );
1687 
1688  p->add_msg_if_player(
1689  _( "You modify your %1$s to listen for the %2$s activation signal on the radio." ),
1690  modded.tname(), colorname );
1691  modded.set_flag( flag_RADIO_ACTIVATION )
1692  .set_flag( flag_RADIOCARITEM )
1693  .set_flag( flag_RADIO_MOD )
1694  .set_flag( newtag );
1695  return 1;
1696 }
1697 
1698 std::optional<int> iuse::remove_all_mods( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
1699 {
1700  if( !p ) {
1701  return std::nullopt;
1702  }
1703 
1704  item_location loc = g->inv_map_splice( []( const item & e ) {
1705  for( const item *it : e.toolmods() ) {
1706  if( !it->is_irremovable() ) {
1707  return true;
1708  }
1709  }
1710  return false;
1711  },
1712  _( "Remove mods from tool?" ), 1,
1713  _( "You don't have any modified tools." ) );
1714 
1715  if( !loc ) {
1716  add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
1717  return std::nullopt;
1718  }
1719 
1720  if( !loc->ammo_remaining() || p->unload( loc ) ) {
1721  item *mod = loc->get_item_with(
1722  []( const item & e ) {
1723  return e.is_toolmod() && !e.is_irremovable();
1724  } );
1725  add_msg( m_info, _( "You remove the %s from the tool." ), mod->tname() );
1726  p->i_add_or_drop( *mod );
1727  loc->remove_item( *mod );
1728  remove_radio_mod( *loc, *p );
1729  loc->on_contents_changed();
1730  }
1731  return 0;
1732 }
1733 
1734 static bool good_fishing_spot( const tripoint &pos, Character *p )
1735 {
1736  std::unordered_set<tripoint> fishable_locations = g->get_fishable_locations( 60, pos );
1737  std::vector<monster *> fishables = g->get_fishable_monsters( fishable_locations );
1738  map &here = get_map();
1739  // isolated little body of water with no definite fish population
1740  // TODO: fix point types
1741  const oter_id &cur_omt =
1742  overmap_buffer.ter( tripoint_abs_omt( ms_to_omt_copy( here.getabs( pos ) ) ) );
1743  std::string om_id = cur_omt.id().c_str();
1744  if( fishables.empty() && !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_CURRENT, pos ) &&
1745  // this is a ridiculous way to find a good fishing spot, but I'm just trying
1746  // to do oceans right now. Maybe is_water_body() would be better?
1747  // if you find this comment still here and it's later than 2025, LOL.
1748  om_id.find( "river_" ) == std::string::npos && !cur_omt->is_lake() && !cur_omt->is_ocean() &&
1749  !cur_omt->is_lake_shore() && !cur_omt->is_ocean_shore() ) {
1750  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You doubt you will have much luck catching fish here." ) );
1751  return false;
1752  }
1753  return true;
1754 }
1755 
1756 std::optional<int> iuse::fishing_rod( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
1757 {
1758  if( p->is_npc() ) {
1759  // Long actions - NPCs don't like those yet.
1760  return std::nullopt;
1761  }
1762  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
1763  return std::nullopt;
1764  }
1765  map &here = get_map();
1766  std::optional<tripoint> found;
1767  for( const tripoint &pnt : here.points_in_radius( p->pos(), 1 ) ) {
1768  if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FISHABLE, pnt ) && good_fishing_spot( pnt, p ) ) {
1769  found = pnt;
1770  break;
1771  }
1772  }
1773  if( !found ) {
1774  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't fish there!" ) );
1775  return std::nullopt;
1776  }
1777  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You cast your line and wait to hook something" ) );
1778  p->assign_activity( ACT_FISH, to_moves<int>( 5_hours ), 0, 0, it->tname() );
1779  p->activity.targets.emplace_back( *p, it );
1780  p->activity.coord_set = g->get_fishable_locations( 60, *found );
1781  return 0;
1782 }
1783 
1784 std::optional<int> iuse::fish_trap( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
1785 {
1786  map &here = get_map();
1787  // Handle deploying fish trap.
1788  if( it->active ) {
1789  it->active = false;
1790  return 0;
1791  }
1792 
1793  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
1794  return std::nullopt;
1795  }
1796  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
1797  return std::nullopt;
1798  }
1799 
1800  if( it->ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
1801  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Fish aren't foolish enough to go in here without bait." ) );
1802  return std::nullopt;
1803  }
1804 
1805  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Put fish trap where?" ) );
1806  if( !pnt_ ) {
1807  return std::nullopt;
1808  }
1809  const tripoint pnt = *pnt_;
1810 
1811  if( !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FISHABLE, pnt ) ) {
1812  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't fish there!" ) );
1813  return std::nullopt;
1814  }
1815  if( !good_fishing_spot( pnt, p ) ) {
1816  return std::nullopt;
1817  }
1818  it->active = true;
1819  it->set_age( 0_turns );
1820  here.add_item_or_charges( pnt, *it );
1821  p->i_rem( it );
1822  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1823  _( "You place the fish trap; in three hours or so, you may catch some fish." ) );
1824 
1825  return 0;
1826 
1827 }
1828 
1829 std::optional<int> iuse::fish_trap_tick( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
1830 {
1831  map &here = get_map();
1832  // Handle processing fish trap over time.
1833  if( it->ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
1834  it->active = false;
1835  return 0;
1836  }
1837  if( it->age() > 3_hours ) {
1838  it->active = false;
1839 
1840  if( !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FISHABLE, pos ) ) {
1841  return 0;
1842  }
1843 
1844  avatar &player = get_avatar();
1845 
1846  int success = -50;
1847  const float surv = player.get_skill_level( skill_survival );
1848  const int attempts = rng( it->ammo_remaining(), it->ammo_remaining() * it->ammo_remaining() );
1849  for( int i = 0; i < attempts; i++ ) {
1850  /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL randomly increases number of fish caught in fishing trap */
1851  success += rng( round( surv ), round( surv * surv ) );
1852  }
1853 
1854  int bait_consumed = rng( 0, it->ammo_remaining() + 1 );
1855  if( bait_consumed > it->ammo_remaining() ) {
1856  bait_consumed = it->ammo_remaining();
1857  }
1858 
1859  int fishes = 0;
1860 
1861  if( success < 0 ) {
1862  fishes = 0;
1863  } else if( success < 300 ) {
1864  fishes = 1;
1865  } else if( success < 1500 ) {
1866  fishes = 2;
1867  } else {
1868  fishes = rng( 3, 5 );
1869  }
1870 
1871  if( fishes == 0 ) {
1872  it->ammo_consume( it->ammo_remaining(), pos, nullptr );
1873  player.practice( skill_survival, rng( 5, 15 ) );
1874 
1875  return 0;
1876  }
1877 
1878  //get the fishables around the trap's spot
1879  std::unordered_set<tripoint> fishable_locations = g->get_fishable_locations( 60, pos );
1880  std::vector<monster *> fishables = g->get_fishable_monsters( fishable_locations );
1881  for( int i = 0; i < fishes; i++ ) {
1882  player.practice( skill_survival, rng( 3, 10 ) );
1883  if( !fishables.empty() ) {
1884  monster *chosen_fish = random_entry( fishables );
1885  // reduce the abstract fish_population marker of that fish
1886  chosen_fish->fish_population -= 1;
1887  if( chosen_fish->fish_population <= 0 ) {
1888  g->catch_a_monster( chosen_fish, pos, p, 300_hours ); //catch the fish!
1889  } else {
1890  here.add_item_or_charges( pos, item::make_corpse( chosen_fish->type->id,
1891  calendar::turn + rng( 0_turns,
1892  3_hours ) ) );
1893  }
1894  } else {
1895  //there will always be a chance that the player will get lucky and catch a fish
1896  //not existing in the fishables vector. (maybe it was in range, but wandered off)
1897  //lets say it is a 5% chance per fish to catch
1898  if( one_in( 20 ) ) {
1899  const std::vector<mtype_id> fish_group = MonsterGroupManager::GetMonstersFromGroup(
1900  GROUP_FISH, true );
1901  const mtype_id &fish_mon = random_entry_ref( fish_group );
1902  //Yes, we can put fishes in the trap like knives in the boot,
1903  //and then get fishes via activation of the item,
1904  //but it's not as comfortable as if you just put fishes in the same tile with the trap.
1905  //Also: corpses and comestibles do not rot in containers like this, but on the ground they will rot.
1906  //we don't know when it was caught so use a random turn
1907  here.add_item_or_charges( pos, item::make_corpse( fish_mon, it->birthday() + rng( 0_turns,
1908  3_hours ) ) );
1909  break; //this can happen only once
1910  }
1911  }
1912  }
1913  it->ammo_consume( bait_consumed, pos, nullptr );
1914  }
1915  return 0;
1916 }
1917 
1918 std::optional<int> iuse::extinguisher( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
1919 {
1920  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
1921  return std::nullopt;
1922  }
1923  // If anyone other than the player wants to use one of these,
1924  // they're going to need to figure out how to aim it.
1925  const std::optional<tripoint> dest_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Spray where?" ) );
1926  if( !dest_ ) {
1927  return std::nullopt;
1928  }
1929  tripoint dest = *dest_;
1930 
1931  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
1932 
1933  map &here = get_map();
1934  // Reduce the strength of fire (if any) in the target tile.
1935  here.add_field( dest, fd_extinguisher, 3, 10_turns );
1936 
1937  // Also spray monsters in that tile.
1938  if( monster *const mon_ptr = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( dest, true ) ) {
1939  monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
1940  critter.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
1941  bool blind = false;
1942  if( one_in( 2 ) && critter.has_flag( mon_flag_SEES ) ) {
1943  blind = true;
1944  critter.add_effect( effect_blind, rng( 1_minutes, 2_minutes ) );
1945  }
1946  viewer &player_view = get_player_view();
1947  if( player_view.sees( critter ) ) {
1948  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s is sprayed!" ), critter.name() );
1949  if( blind ) {
1950  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s looks blinded." ), critter.name() );
1951  }
1952  }
1953  if( critter.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
1954  if( player_view.sees( critter ) ) {
1955  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s is frozen!" ), critter.name() );
1956  }
1957  critter.apply_damage( p, bodypart_id( "torso" ), rng( 20, 60 ) );
1958  critter.set_speed_base( critter.get_speed_base() / 2 );
1959  }
1960  }
1961 
1962  // Slightly reduce the strength of fire immediately behind the target tile.
1963  if( here.passable( dest ) ) {
1964  dest.x += ( dest.x - p->posx() );
1965  dest.y += ( dest.y - p->posy() );
1966 
1967  here.mod_field_intensity( dest, fd_fire, std::min( 0 - rng( 0, 1 ) + rng( 0, 1 ), 0 ) );
1968  }
1969 
1970  return 1;
1971 }
1972 
1973 class exosuit_interact
1974 {
1975  public:
1976  static int run( item *it ) {
1977  exosuit_interact menu( it );
1978  menu.interact_loop();
1979  return menu.moves;
1980  }
1981 
1982  private:
1983  explicit exosuit_interact( item *it ) : suit( it ), ctxt( "", keyboard_mode::keycode ) {
1984  ctxt.register_navigate_ui_list();
1985  ctxt.register_leftright();
1986  ctxt.register_action( "SCROLL_INFOBOX_UP" );
1987  ctxt.register_action( "SCROLL_INFOBOX_DOWN" );
1988  ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
1989  ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
1990  // mouse selection
1991  ctxt.register_action( "SELECT" );
1992  ctxt.register_action( "SEC_SELECT" );
1993  ctxt.register_action( "MOUSE_MOVE" );
1994  ctxt.register_action( "SCROLL_UP" );
1995  ctxt.register_action( "SCROLL_DOWN" );
1996  pocket_count = it->get_all_contained_pockets().size();
1997  height = std::max( pocket_count, height_default ) + 2;
1998  width_menu = 30;
1999  for( const item_pocket *pkt : it->get_all_contained_pockets() ) {
2000  int tmp = utf8_width( get_pocket_name( pkt ) );
2001  if( tmp > width_menu ) {
2002  width_menu = tmp;
2003  }
2004  }
2005  width_menu = std::min( width_menu, 50 );
2006  width_info = 80 - width_menu;
2007  moves = 0;
2008  }
2009  ~exosuit_interact() = default;
2010 
2011  item *suit;
2012  weak_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> ui;
2013  input_context ctxt;
2014  catacurses::window w_border;
2015  catacurses::window w_info;
2016  catacurses::window w_menu;
2017  std::map<int, inclusive_rectangle<point>> pkt_map;
2018  int moves = 0;
2019  int pocket_count = 0;
2020  int cur_pocket = 0;
2021  int scroll_pos = 0;
2022  int height = 0;
2023  const int height_default = 20;
2024  int width_info = 30;
2025  int width_menu = 30;
2026  int sel_frame = 0;
2027 
2028  static std::string get_pocket_name( const item_pocket *pkt ) {
2029  if( !pkt->get_pocket_data()->pocket_name.empty() ) {
2030  return pkt->get_pocket_data()->pocket_name.translated();
2031  }
2032  const std::set<flag_id> flags = pkt->get_pocket_data()->get_flag_restrictions();
2033  return enumerate_as_string( flags, []( const flag_id & fid ) {
2034  if( fid->name().empty() ) {
2035  return fid.str();
2036  }
2037  return fid->name();
2038  } );
2039  }
2040 
2041  void init_windows() {
2042  const point topleft( TERMX / 2 - ( width_info + width_menu + 3 ) / 2, TERMY / 2 - height / 2 );
2043  //NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-use-named-point-constants)
2044  w_menu = catacurses::newwin( height - 2, width_menu, topleft + point( 1, 1 ) );
2045  w_info = catacurses::newwin( height - 2, width_info, topleft + point( 2 + width_menu, 1 ) );
2046  w_border = catacurses::newwin( height, width_info + width_menu + 3, topleft );
2047  }
2048 
2049  void draw_menu() {
2050  pkt_map.clear();
2051  // info box
2052  pkt_map.emplace( -1, inclusive_rectangle<point>( point( 2 + width_menu, 1 ),
2053  point( 2 + width_menu + width_info, height - 2 ) ) );
2054  werase( w_menu );
2055  int row = 0;
2056  for( const item_pocket *pkt : suit->get_all_contained_pockets() ) {
2057  nc_color colr = row == cur_pocket ? h_white : c_white;
2058  std::string txt = get_pocket_name( pkt );
2059  int remaining = width_menu - utf8_width( txt, true );
2060  if( remaining > 0 ) {
2061  txt.append( remaining, ' ' );
2062  }
2063  trim_and_print( w_menu, point( 0, row ), width_menu, colr, txt );
2064  pkt_map.emplace( row, inclusive_rectangle<point>( point( 0, row ), point( width_menu, row ) ) );
2065  row++;
2066  }
2067  wnoutrefresh( w_menu );
2068  }
2069 
2070  void draw_iteminfo() {
2071  std::vector<iteminfo> dummy;
2072  std::vector<iteminfo> suitinfo;
2073  item_pocket *pkt = suit->get_all_contained_pockets()[cur_pocket];
2074  pkt->general_info( suitinfo, cur_pocket, true );
2075  pkt->contents_info( suitinfo, cur_pocket, true );
2076  item_info_data data( suit->tname(), suit->type_name(), suitinfo, dummy, scroll_pos );
2077  data.without_getch = true;
2078  data.without_border = true;
2079  data.scrollbar_left = false;
2080  data.use_full_win = true;
2081  data.padding = 0;
2082  draw_item_info( w_info, data );
2083  }
2084 
2085  shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> create_or_get_ui_adaptor() {
2086  shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = ui.lock();
2087  if( !current_ui ) {
2088  ui = current_ui = make_shared_fast<ui_adaptor>();
2089  current_ui->on_screen_resize( [this]( ui_adaptor & cui ) {
2090  init_windows();
2091  cui.position_from_window( w_border );
2092  } );
2093  current_ui->mark_resize();
2094  current_ui->on_redraw( [this]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
2095  draw_border( w_border, c_white, suit->tname(), c_light_green );
2096  for( int i = 1; i < height - 1; i++ ) {
2097  mvwputch( w_border, point( width_menu + 1, i ), c_white, LINE_XOXO );
2098  }
2099  mvwputch( w_border, point( width_menu + 1, height - 1 ), c_white, LINE_XXOX );
2100  wnoutrefresh( w_border );
2101  draw_menu();
2102  draw_iteminfo();
2103  } );
2104  }
2105  return current_ui;
2106  }
2107 
2108  void interact_loop() {
2109  bool done = false;
2110  shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
2111  while( !done ) {
2112  ui_manager::redraw();
2113  std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
2114  if( action == "MOUSE_MOVE" || action == "SELECT" ) {
2115  std::optional<point> coord = ctxt.get_coordinates_text( w_border );
2116  if( !!coord ) {
2117  int tmp_frame = 0;
2118  run_for_point_in<int, point>( pkt_map, *coord,
2119  [&tmp_frame]( const std::pair<int, inclusive_rectangle<point>> &p ) {
2120  if( p.first == -1 ) {
2121  tmp_frame = 1;
2122  }
2123  } );
2124  sel_frame = tmp_frame;
2125  }
2126  coord = ctxt.get_coordinates_text( w_menu );
2127  if( !!coord ) {
2128  int tmp_pocket = cur_pocket;
2129  run_for_point_in<int, point>( pkt_map, *coord,
2130  [&tmp_pocket, &action]( const std::pair<int, inclusive_rectangle<point>> &p ) {
2131  if( p.first >= 0 ) {
2132  tmp_pocket = p.first;
2133  if( action == "SELECT" ) {
2134  action = "CONFIRM";
2135  }
2136  }
2137  } );
2138  cur_pocket = tmp_pocket;
2139  }
2140  } else if( action == "SCROLL_UP" || action == "SCROLL_DOWN" ) {
2141  if( sel_frame == 0 ) {
2142  action = action == "SCROLL_UP" ? "UP" : "DOWN";
2143  } else {
2144  action = action == "SCROLL_UP" ? "SCROLL_INFOBOX_UP" : "SCROLL_INFOBOX_DOWN";
2145  }
2146  }
2147  if( action == "QUIT" || action == "SEC_SELECT" ) {
2148  scroll_pos = 0;
2149  done = true;
2150  } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
2151  scroll_pos = 0;
2152  int nmoves = insert_replace_activate_mod(
2153  suit->get_all_contained_pockets()[cur_pocket], suit );
2154  moves = moves > nmoves ? moves : nmoves;
2155  if( !get_player_character().activity.is_null() ) {
2156  done = true;
2157  }
2158  } else if( navigate_ui_list( action, cur_pocket, 5, pocket_count, true ) ) {
2159  scroll_pos = 0;
2160  sel_frame = 0;
2161  } else if( action == "SCROLL_INFOBOX_UP" ) {
2162  scroll_pos--;
2163  sel_frame = 1;
2164  } else if( action == "SCROLL_INFOBOX_DOWN" ) {
2165  scroll_pos++;
2166  sel_frame = 1;
2167  }
2168  }
2169  }
2170 
2171  int insert_replace_activate_mod( item_pocket *pkt, item *it ) {
2172  Character &c = get_player_character();
2173  map &here = get_map();
2174  const std::set<flag_id> flags = pkt->get_pocket_data()->get_flag_restrictions();
2175  if( flags.empty() ) {
2176  //~ Modular exoskeletons require pocket restrictions to insert modules. %s = pocket name.
2177  popup( _( "%s doesn't define any restrictions for modules!" ), get_pocket_name( pkt ) );
2178  return 0;
2179  }
2180 
2181  // If pocket already contains a module, ask to unload or replace
2182  const bool not_empty = !pkt->empty();
2183  if( not_empty ) {
2184  item *mod_it = pkt->all_items_top().front();
2185  std::string mod_name = mod_it->tname();
2186  uilist amenu;
2187  //~ Prompt the player to handle the module inside the modular exoskeleton
2188  amenu.text = _( "What to do with the existing module?" );
2189  amenu.addentry( -1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Unload everything from this %s" ),
2190  get_pocket_name( pkt ) );
2191  amenu.addentry( -1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Replace the %s" ), mod_name );
2192  amenu.addentry( -1, mod_it->has_relic_activation() || mod_it->type->has_use(), MENU_AUTOASSIGN,
2193  mod_it->active ? _( "Deactivate the %s" ) : _( "Activate the %s" ), mod_name );
2194  amenu.addentry( -1, mod_it->is_reloadable() && c.can_reload( *mod_it ), MENU_AUTOASSIGN,
2195  _( "Reload the %s" ), mod_name );
2196  amenu.addentry( -1, !mod_it->is_container_empty(), MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Unload the %s" ),
2197  mod_name );
2198  amenu.query();
2199  int ret = amenu.ret;
2200  item_location loc_it;
2201  item_location held = c.get_wielded_item();
2202  if( !!held && held->has_item( *mod_it ) ) {
2203  loc_it = item_location( held, mod_it );
2204  } else {
2205  for( const item_location &loc : c.top_items_loc() ) {
2206  if( loc->has_item( *mod_it ) ) {
2207  loc_it = item_location( loc, mod_it );
2208  break;
2209  }
2210  }
2211  }
2212  if( ret < 0 || ret > 4 ) {
2213  return 0;
2214  } else if( ret == 0 ) {
2215  // Unload existing module
2216  pkt->remove_items_if( [&c, &here]( const item & i ) {
2217  here.add_item_or_charges( c.pos(), i );
2218  return true;
2219  } );
2220  return to_moves<int>( 5_seconds );
2221  } else if( ret == 2 ) {
2222  if( !!loc_it ) {
2223  avatar_action::use_item( get_avatar(), loc_it );
2224  }
2225  return 0;
2226  } else if( ret == 3 ) {
2227  if( !!loc_it ) {
2228  g->reload( loc_it );
2229  }
2230  return 0;
2231  } else if( ret == 4 ) {
2232  if( !!loc_it ) {
2233  c.unload( loc_it );
2234  }
2235  return 0;
2236  }
2237  }
2238 
2239  const item_filter filter = [&flags, pkt, it]( const item & i ) {
2240  return i.has_any_flag( flags ) && ( pkt->empty() || !it->has_item( i ) ) &&
2241  pkt->can_contain( i ).success();
2242  };
2243 
2244  std::vector<item_location> candidates;
2245  for( item *i : c.items_with( filter ) ) {
2246  candidates.emplace_back( c, i );
2247  }
2248  for( const tripoint &p : here.points_in_radius( c.pos(), PICKUP_RANGE ) ) {
2249  for( item &i : here.i_at( p ) ) {
2250  if( filter( i ) ) {
2251  candidates.emplace_back( map_cursor( p ), &i );
2252  }
2253  }
2254  }
2255  if( candidates.empty() ) {
2256  //~ The player has nothing that fits in the modular exoskeleton's pocket
2257  popup( _( "You don't have anything compatible with this module!" ) );
2258  return 0;
2259  }
2260 
2261  //~ Prompt the player to select an item to attach to the modular exoskeleton's pocket (%s)
2262  uilist imenu( string_format( _( "Which module to attach to the %s?" ), get_pocket_name( pkt ) ), {} );
2263  for( const item_location &i : candidates ) {
2264  imenu.addentry( -1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, i->tname() );
2265  }
2266  imenu.query();
2267  int ret = imenu.ret;
2268  if( ret < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( ret ) >= candidates.size() ) {
2269  // Cancelled
2270  return 0;
2271  }
2272 
2273  int moves = 0;
2274 
2275  // Unload existing module
2276  if( not_empty ) {
2277  pkt->remove_items_if( [&c, &here]( const item & i ) {
2278  here.add_item_or_charges( c.pos(), i );
2279  return true;
2280  } );
2281  moves += to_moves<int>( 5_seconds );
2282  }
2283  ret_val<item *> rval = pkt->insert_item( *candidates[ret] );
2284  if( rval.success() ) {
2285  candidates[ret].remove_item();
2286  moves += to_moves<int>( 5_seconds );
2287  return moves;
2288  }
2289  debugmsg( "Could not insert item \"%s\" into pocket \"%s\": %s",
2290  candidates[ret]->type_name(), get_pocket_name( pkt ), rval.str() );
2291  return moves;
2292  }
2293 };
2294 
2295 std::optional<int> iuse::mace( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
2296 {
2297  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
2298  return std::nullopt;
2299  }
2300  // If anyone other than the player wants to use one of these,
2301  // they're going to need to figure out how to aim it.
2302  const std::optional<tripoint> dest_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Spray where?" ) );
2303  if( !dest_ ) {
2304  return std::nullopt;
2305  }
2306  tripoint dest = *dest_;
2307 
2308  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
2309 
2310  map &here = get_map();
2311  here.add_field( dest, fd_tear_gas, 2, 3_turns );
2312 
2313  // Also spray monsters in that tile.
2314  if( monster *const mon_ptr = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( dest, true ) ) {
2315  monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
2316  critter.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
2317  bool blind = false;
2318  if( one_in( 2 ) && critter.has_flag( mon_flag_SEES ) ) {
2319  blind = true;
2320  critter.add_effect( effect_blind, rng( 1_minutes, 2_minutes ) );
2321  }
2322  // even if it's not blinded getting maced hurts a lot and stuns it
2323  if( !critter.has_flag( mon_flag_NO_BREATHE ) ) {
2324  critter.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 3_seconds ) );
2325  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s recoils in pain!" ), critter.name() );
2326  }
2327  viewer &player_view = get_player_view();
2328  if( player_view.sees( critter ) ) {
2329  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s is sprayed!" ), critter.name() );
2330  if( blind ) {
2331  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s looks blinded." ), critter.name() );
2332  }
2333  }
2334  }
2335 
2336  return 1;
2337 }
2338 
2339 std::optional<int> iuse::manage_exosuit( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
2340 {
2341  if( !p->is_avatar() ) {
2342  return std::nullopt;
2343  }
2344  if( it->get_all_contained_pockets().empty() ) {
2345  add_msg( m_warning, _( "Your %s does not have any pockets to contain modules." ), it->tname() );
2346  return std::nullopt;
2347  }
2348  p->mod_moves( -exosuit_interact::run( it ) );
2349  return 0;
2350 }
2351 
2352 std::optional<int> iuse::unpack_item( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
2353 {
2354  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
2355  return std::nullopt;
2356  }
2357  std::string oname = it->typeId().str() + "_on";
2358  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
2359  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You unpack your %s for use." ), it->tname() );
2360  it->convert( itype_id( oname ), p ).active = false;
2361  // Check if unpacking led to invalid container state
2362  p->invalidate_inventory_validity_cache();
2363  return 0;
2364 }
2365 
2366 std::optional<int> iuse::pack_cbm( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
2367 {
2368  item_location bionic = g->inv_map_splice( []( const item & e ) {
2369  return e.is_bionic() && e.has_flag( flag_NO_PACKED );
2370  }, _( "Choose CBM to pack" ), PICKUP_RANGE, _( "You don't have any CBMs." ) );
2371 
2372  if( !bionic ) {
2373  return std::nullopt;
2374  }
2375  if( !bionic.get_item()->faults.empty() ) {
2376  if( p->query_yn( _( "This CBM is faulty. You should mend it first. Do you want to try?" ) ) ) {
2377  p->mend_item( std::move( bionic ) );
2378  }
2379  return 0;
2380  }
2381 
2382  const int success = round( p->get_skill_level( skill_firstaid ) ) - rng( 0, 6 );
2383  if( success > 0 ) {
2384  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You carefully prepare the CBM for sterilization." ) );
2385  bionic.get_item()->unset_flag( flag_NO_PACKED );
2386  } else {
2387  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You fail to properly prepare the CBM." ) );
2388  }
2389 
2390  std::vector<item_comp> comps;
2391  comps.emplace_back( it->typeId(), 1 );
2392  p->consume_items( comps, 1, is_crafting_component );
2393 
2394  return 0;
2395 }
2396 
2397 std::optional<int> iuse::pack_item( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
2398 {
2399  if( !p ) {
2400  debugmsg( "%s called action pack_item that requires character but no character is present",
2401  it->typeId().str() );
2402  }
2403  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
2404  return std::nullopt;
2405  }
2406 
2407  if( p->is_worn( *it ) ) {
2408  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't pack your %s until you take it off." ),
2409  it->tname() );
2410  return std::nullopt;
2411  } else { // Turning it off
2412  std::string oname = it->typeId().str();
2413  if( string_ends_with( oname, "_on" ) ) {
2414  oname.erase( oname.length() - 3, 3 );
2415  } else {
2416  debugmsg( "no item type to turn it into (%s)!", oname );
2417  return std::nullopt;
2418  }
2419  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
2420  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You pack your %s for storage." ), it->tname() );
2421  it->convert( itype_id( oname ), p ).active = false;
2422  }
2423  return 0;
2424 }
2425 
2426 std::optional<int> iuse::water_purifier( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
2427 {
2428  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
2429  return std::nullopt;
2430  }
2431  item_location obj = g->inv_map_splice( []( const item & e ) {
2432  return !e.empty() && e.has_item_with( []( const item & it ) {
2433  return it.typeId() == itype_water;
2434  } );
2435  }, _( "Purify what?" ), 1, _( "You don't have water to purify." ) );
2436 
2437  if( !obj ) {
2438  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't have that item!" ) );
2439  return std::nullopt;
2440  }
2441 
2442  const std::vector<item *> liquids = obj->items_with( []( const item & it ) {
2443  return it.typeId() == itype_water;
2444  } );
2445  int charges_of_water = 0;
2446  for( const item *water : liquids ) {
2447  charges_of_water += water->charges;
2448  }
2449  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p, charges_of_water ) ) {
2450  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "That volume of water is too large to purify." ) );
2451  return std::nullopt;
2452  }
2453 
2454  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
2455 
2456  for( item *water : liquids ) {
2457  water->convert( itype_water_clean, p ).poison = 0;
2458  }
2459  return charges_of_water;
2460 }
2461 
2462 std::optional<int> iuse::radio_off( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
2463 {
2464  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
2465  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "It's dead." ) );
2466  } else {
2467  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You turn the radio on." ) );
2468  it->convert( itype_radio_on, p ).active = true;
2469  }
2470  return 1;
2471 }
2472 
2473 std::optional<int> iuse::directional_antenna( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
2474 {
2475  // Find out if we have an active radio
2476  auto radios = p->cache_get_items_with( itype_radio_on );
2477  // If we don't wield the radio, also check on the ground
2478  if( radios.empty() ) {
2479  map_stack items = get_map().i_at( p->pos() );
2480  for( item &an_item : items ) {
2481  if( an_item.typeId() == itype_radio_on ) {
2482  radios.push_back( &an_item );
2483  }
2484  }
2485  }
2486  if( radios.empty() ) {
2487  add_msg( m_info, _( "You must have an active radio to check for signal direction." ) );
2488  return std::nullopt;
2489  }
2490  const item radio = *radios.front();
2491  // Find the radio station it's tuned to (if any)
2492  const radio_tower_reference tref = overmap_buffer.find_radio_station( radio.frequency );
2493  if( !tref ) {
2494  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't find the direction if your radio isn't tuned." ) );
2495  return std::nullopt;
2496  }
2497  // Report direction.
2498  const tripoint_abs_sm player_pos = p->global_sm_location();
2499  direction angle = direction_from( player_pos.xy(), tref.abs_sm_pos );
2500  add_msg( _( "The signal seems strongest to the %s." ), direction_name( angle ) );
2501  return 1;
2502 }
2503 
2504 // 0-100 percent chance of a character in a radio signal being obscured by static
2505 static int radio_static_chance( const radio_tower_reference &tref )
2506 {
2507  constexpr int HALF_RADIO_MIN = RADIO_MIN_STRENGTH / 2;
2508  const int signal_strength = tref.signal_strength;
2509  const int max_strength = tref.tower->strength;
2510  int dist = max_strength - signal_strength;
2511  // For towers whose strength is quite close to the min, make them act as though they are farther away
2512  if( RADIO_MIN_STRENGTH * 1.25 > max_strength ) {
2513  dist += 25;
2514  }
2515  // When we're close enough, there's no noise
2516  if( dist < HALF_RADIO_MIN ) {
2517  return 0;
2518  }
2519  // There's minimal, but increasing noise when quite close to the signal
2520  if( dist < RADIO_MIN_STRENGTH ) {
2521  return lerp( 1, 20, static_cast<float>( dist - HALF_RADIO_MIN ) / HALF_RADIO_MIN );
2522  }
2523  // Otherwise, just a rapid increase until the signal stops
2524  return lerp( 20, 100, static_cast<float>( dist - RADIO_MIN_STRENGTH ) /
2525  ( max_strength - RADIO_MIN_STRENGTH ) );
2526 }
2527 
2528 std::optional<int> iuse::radio_tick( Character *, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
2529 {
2530  std::string message = _( "Radio: Kssssssssssssh." );
2531  const radio_tower_reference tref = overmap_buffer.find_radio_station( it->frequency );
2532  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_RADIO, "Set freq: %d", it->frequency );
2533  if( tref ) {
2534  point_abs_omt dbgpos = project_to<coords::omt>( tref.abs_sm_pos );
2535  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_RADIO, "found broadcast (str %d) at (%d %d)",
2536  tref.signal_strength, dbgpos.x(), dbgpos.y() );
2537  const radio_tower *selected_tower = tref.tower;
2538  if( selected_tower->type == radio_type::MESSAGE_BROADCAST ) {
2539  message = selected_tower->message;
2540  } else if( selected_tower->type == radio_type::WEATHER_RADIO ) {
2541  message = weather_forecast( tref.abs_sm_pos );
2542  }
2543 
2544  const city *c = overmap_buffer.closest_city( tripoint_abs_sm( tref.abs_sm_pos, 0 ) ).city;
2545  //~ radio noise
