2546  const std::string cityname = c == nullptr ? _( "ksssh" ) : c->name;
2547 
2548  replace_city_tag( message, cityname );
2549  int static_chance = radio_static_chance( tref );
2550  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_RADIO, "Message: '%s' at %d%% noise", message, static_chance );
2551  message = obscure_message( message, [&static_chance]()->int {
2552  if( x_in_y( static_chance, 100 ) )
2553  {
2554  // Gradually replace random characters with noise as distance increases
2555  if( one_in( 3 ) && static_chance - rng( 0, 25 ) < 50 ) {
2556  // Replace with random character
2557  return 0;
2558  }
2559  // Replace with '#'
2560  return '#';
2561  }
2562  // Leave unchanged
2563  return -1;
2564  } );
2565 
2566  std::vector<std::string> segments = foldstring( message, RADIO_PER_TURN );
2567  int index = to_turn<int>( calendar::turn ) % segments.size();
2568  message = string_format( _( "radio: %s" ), segments[index] );
2569  }
2570  sounds::ambient_sound( pos, 6, sounds::sound_t::electronic_speech, message );
2571  if( !sfx::is_channel_playing( sfx::channel::radio ) ) {
2572  if( one_in( 10 ) ) {
2573  sfx::play_ambient_variant_sound( "radio", "static", 100, sfx::channel::radio, 300, -1, 0 );
2574  } else if( one_in( 10 ) ) {
2575  sfx::play_ambient_variant_sound( "radio", "inaudible_chatter", 100, sfx::channel::radio, 300, -1,
2576  0 );
2577  }
2578  }
2579  return 1;
2580 }
2581 
2582 std::optional<int> iuse::radio_on( Character *, item *it, const tripoint & )
2583 {
2584 
2585  const auto tower_desc = []( const int noise ) {
2586  if( noise == 0 ) {
2587  return SNIPPET.random_from_category( "radio_station_desc_noise_0" )->translated();
2588  } else if( noise <= 20 ) {
2589  return SNIPPET.random_from_category( "radio_station_desc_noise_20" )->translated();
2590  } else if( noise <= 40 ) {
2591  return SNIPPET.random_from_category( "radio_station_desc_noise_40" )->translated();
2592  } else if( noise <= 60 ) {
2593  return SNIPPET.random_from_category( "radio_station_desc_noise_60" )->translated();
2594  } else if( noise <= 80 ) {
2595  return SNIPPET.random_from_category( "radio_station_desc_noise_80" )->translated();
2596  }
2597  return SNIPPET.random_from_category( "radio_station_desc_noise_max" )->translated();
2598  };
2599 
2600  std::vector<radio_tower_reference> options = overmap_buffer.find_all_radio_stations();
2601  if( options.empty() ) {
2602  popup( SNIPPET.random_from_category( "radio_scan_no_stations" )->translated() );
2603  }
2604  uilist scanlist;
2605  scanlist.title = _( "Select a station" );
2606  scanlist.desc_enabled = true;
2607  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_RADIO, "Radio scan:" );
2608  for( size_t i = 0; i < options.size(); ++i ) {
2609  std::string selected_text;
2610  const radio_tower_reference &tref = options[i];
2611  if( it->frequency == tref.tower->frequency ) {
2612  selected_text = pgettext( "radio station", " (selected)" );
2613  }
2614  //~ Selected radio station, %d is a number in sequence (1,2,3...),
2615  //~ %s is ' (selected)' if this is the radio station playing, else nothing
2616  const std::string station_name = string_format( _( "Station %d%s" ), i + 1, selected_text );
2617  const int noise_chance = radio_static_chance( tref );
2618  scanlist.addentry_desc( i, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, station_name, tower_desc( noise_chance ) );
2619  const point_abs_omt dbgpos = project_to<coords::omt>( tref.abs_sm_pos );
2620  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_RADIO, " %d: %d at (%d %d) str [%d/%d]", i + 1, tref.tower->frequency,
2621  dbgpos.x(), dbgpos.y(), tref.signal_strength, tref.tower->strength );
2622  }
2623  scanlist.query();
2624  const int sel = scanlist.ret;
2625  if( sel >= 0 && static_cast<size_t>( sel ) < options.size() ) {
2626  it->frequency = options[sel].tower->frequency;
2627  }
2628  return 1;
2629 }
2630 
2631 std::optional<int> iuse::noise_emitter_on( Character *, item *, const tripoint &pos )
2632 {
2633  sounds::sound( pos, 30, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "KXSHHHHRRCRKLKKK!" ), true, "tool",
2634  "noise_emitter" );
2635  return 1;
2636 }
2637 
2638 std::optional<int> iuse::emf_passive_on( Character *, item *, const tripoint &pos )
2639 {
2640  // need to calculate distance to closest electrical thing
2641 
2642  // set distance as farther than the radius
2643  const int max = 10;
2644  int distance = max + 1;
2645 
2646  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
2647  map &here = get_map();
2648  // can't get a reading during a portal storm
2649  if( get_weather().weather_id == weather_portal_storm ) {
2650  sounds::sound( pos, 6, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "BEEEEE-CHHHHHHH-eeEEEEEEE-CHHHHHHHHHHHH" ), true,
2651  "tool", "emf_detector" );
2652  // skip continuing to check for locations
2653  return 1;
2654  }
2655 
2656  for( const tripoint &loc : closest_points_first( pos, max ) ) {
2657  const Creature *critter = creatures.creature_at( loc );
2658 
2659  // if the creature exists and is either a robot or electric
2660  bool found = critter != nullptr && critter->is_electrical();
2661 
2662  // check for an electrical field
2663  if( !found ) {
2664  for( const auto &fd : here.field_at( loc ) ) {
2665  if( fd.first->has_elec ) {
2666  found = true;
2667  break;
2668  }
2669  }
2670  }
2671 
2672  // if an electrical field or creature is nearby
2673  if( found ) {
2674  distance = rl_dist( pos, loc );
2675  if( distance <= 3 ) {
2676  sounds::sound( pos, 4, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "BEEEEEEP BEEEEEEP" ), true, "tool",
2677  "emf_detector" );
2678  } else if( distance <= 7 ) {
2679  sounds::sound( pos, 3, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "BEEP BEEP" ), true, "tool",
2680  "emf_detector" );
2681  } else if( distance <= 10 ) {
2682  sounds::sound( pos, 2, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "beep beep" ), true, "tool",
2683  "emf_detector" );
2684  }
2685  // skip continuing to check for locations
2686  return 1;
2687  }
2688  }
2689  return 1;
2690 }
2691 
2692 std::optional<int> iuse::ma_manual( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
2693 {
2694  // [CR] - should NPCs just be allowed to learn this stuff? Just like that?
2695 
2696  const matype_id style_to_learn = martial_art_learned_from( *it->type );
2697 
2698  if( !style_to_learn.is_valid() ) {
2699  debugmsg( "ERROR: Invalid martial art" );
2700  return std::nullopt;
2701  }
2702 
2703  p->martial_arts_data->learn_style( style_to_learn, p->is_avatar() );
2704 
2705  return 1;
2706 }
2707 
2708 // Remove after 0.G
2709 std::optional<int> iuse::hammer( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
2710 {
2711  return iuse::crowbar( p, it, pos );
2712 }
2713 
2714 std::optional<int> iuse::crowbar_weak( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
2715 {
2716  return iuse::crowbar( p, it, pos );
2717 }
2718 
2719 std::optional<int> iuse::crowbar( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
2720 {
2721  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
2722  return std::nullopt;
2723  }
2724 
2725  map &here = get_map();
2726  const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> f =
2727  [&here, p]( const tripoint & pnt ) {
2728  if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
2729  return false;
2730  } else if( here.has_furn( pnt ) ) {
2731  return here.furn( pnt )->prying->valid();
2732  } else if( !here.ter( pnt )->is_null() ) {
2733  return here.ter( pnt )->prying->valid();
2734  }
2735  return false;
2736  };
2737 
2738  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = ( pos != p->pos() ) ? pos : choose_adjacent_highlight(
2739  _( "Pry where?" ), _( "There is nothing to pry nearby." ), f, false );
2740  if( !pnt_ ) {
2741  return std::nullopt;
2742  }
2743 
2744  const tripoint &pnt = *pnt_;
2745 
2746  const pry_data *prying;
2747  if( here.has_furn( pnt ) ) {
2748  prying = &here.furn( pnt )->prying->prying_data();
2749  } else {
2750  prying = &here.ter( pnt )->prying->prying_data();
2751  }
2752 
2753  if( !f( pnt ) ) {
2754  if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
2755  if( it->typeId() == STATIC( itype_id( "hammer" ) ) ) {
2756  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You try to hit yourself with the hammer." ) );
2757  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "But you can't touch this." ) );
2758  } else {
2759  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You attempt to pry open your wallet, "
2760  "but alas. You are just too miserly." ) );
2761  }
2762  } else {
2763  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't pry that." ) );
2764  }
2765  return std::nullopt;
2766  }
2767 
2768  // previously iuse::hammer
2769  if( prying->prying_nails ) {
2770  p->assign_activity( prying_activity_actor( pnt, item_location{*p, it} ) );
2771  return std::nullopt;
2772  }
2773 
2774  // Doors need PRY 2 which is on a crowbar, crates need PRY 1 which is on a crowbar
2775  // & a claw hammer.
2776  // The iexamine function for crate supplies a hammer object.
2777  // So this stops the player (A)ctivating a Hammer with a Crowbar in their backpack
2778  // then managing to open a door.
2779  const int pry_level = it->get_quality( qual_PRY );
2780 
2781  if( pry_level < prying->prying_level ) {
2782  // This doesn't really make it clear to the player
2783  // why their attempt is failing.
2784  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't get sufficient leverage to open that with your %1$s." ),
2785  it->tname() );
2786  p->mod_moves( -50 ); // spend a few moves trying it.
2787  return std::nullopt;
2788  }
2789 
2790  p->assign_activity( prying_activity_actor( pnt, item_location{*p, it} ) );
2791 
2792  return std::nullopt;
2793 }
2794 
2795 std::optional<int> iuse::makemound( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
2796 {
2797  if( !p ) {
2798  debugmsg( "%s called action makemound that requires character but no character is present",
2799  it->typeId().str() );
2800  return std::nullopt;
2801  }
2802  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
2803  return std::nullopt;
2804  }
2805  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Till soil where?" ) );
2806  if( !pnt_ ) {
2807  return std::nullopt;
2808  }
2809  const tripoint pnt = *pnt_;
2810 
2811  if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
2812  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
2813  _( "You think about jumping on a shovel, but then change your mind." ) );
2814  return std::nullopt;
2815  }
2816 
2817  map &here = get_map();
2818  if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PLOWABLE, pnt ) &&
2819  !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PLANT, pnt ) ) {
2820  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You start churning up the earth here." ) );
2821  p->assign_activity( churn_activity_actor( 18000, item_location( *p, it ) ) );
2822  p->activity.placement = here.getglobal( pnt );
2823  return 1;
2824  } else {
2825  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't churn up this ground." ) );
2826  return std::nullopt;
2827  }
2828 }
2829 
2830 std::optional<int> iuse::dig( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
2831 {
2832  if( !p ) {
2833  debugmsg( "%s called action dig that requires character but no character is present",
2834  it->typeId().str() );
2835  return std::nullopt;
2836  }
2837  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
2838  return std::nullopt;
2839  }
2840 
2841  std::vector<construction> const &cnstr = get_constructions();
2842  auto const build = std::find_if( cnstr.begin(), cnstr.end(), []( const construction & it ) {
2843  return it.str_id == construction_constr_pit;
2844  } );
2845  auto const build_shallow = std::find_if( cnstr.begin(), cnstr.end(), []( const construction & it ) {
2846  return it.str_id == construction_constr_pit_shallow;
2847  } );
2848 
2849  place_construction( { build->group, build_shallow->group } );
2850 
2851  return 0;
2852 }
2853

2857  debugmsg( "%s called action dig_channel that requires character but no character is present",
2858  it->typeId().str() );
2859  return std::nullopt;
2860  }
2861  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
2862  return std::nullopt;
2863  }
2864 
2865  std::vector<construction> const &cnstr = get_constructions();
2866  auto const build = std::find_if( cnstr.begin(), cnstr.end(), []( const construction & it ) {
2867  return it.str_id == construction_constr_water_channel;
2868  } );
2869 
2870  place_construction( { build->group } );
2871  return 0;
2872 }

2874 std::optional<int> iuse::fill_pit( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
2875 {

2878  it->typeId().str() );

2880  }
2881  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
2882  return std::nullopt;
2883  }

2885  std::vector<construction> const &cnstr = get_constructions();

2887  return it.str_id == construction_constr_fill_pit;
2888  } );

2890  place_construction( { build->group } );
2891  return 0;

2894 std::optional<int> iuse::clear_rubble( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
2895 {
2896  if( !p ) {
2897  debugmsg( "%s called action clear_rubble that requires character but no character is present",
2898  it->typeId().str() );
2899  return std::nullopt;
2900  }
2901  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
2902  return std::nullopt;
2903  }
2904 
2905  std::vector<construction> const &cnstr = get_constructions();
2906  auto const build = std::find_if( cnstr.begin(), cnstr.end(), []( const construction & it ) {
2907  return it.str_id == construction_constr_clear_rubble;
2908  } );
2909 
2910  place_construction( { build->group } );
2911  return 0;
2912 }
2913 
2914 std::optional<int> iuse::siphon( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
2915 {
2916  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
2917  return std::nullopt;
2918  }
2919  map &here = get_map();
2920  const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> f = [&here]( const tripoint & pnt ) {
2921  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( pnt );
2922  return !!vp;
2923  };
2924 
2925  vehicle *v = nullptr;
2926  bool found_more_than_one = false;
2927  for( const tripoint &pos : here.points_in_radius( p->pos(), 1 ) ) {
2928  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( pos );
2929  if( !vp ) {
2930  continue;
2931  }
2932  vehicle *vfound = &vp->vehicle();
2933  if( v == nullptr ) {
2934  v = vfound;
2935  } else {
2936  //found more than one vehicle?
2937  if( v != vfound ) {
2938  v = nullptr;
2939  found_more_than_one = true;
2940  break;
2941  }
2942  }
2943  }
2944  if( found_more_than_one ) {
2945  std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight(
2946  _( "Siphon from where?" ), _( "There is nothing to siphon from nearby." ), f, false );
2947  if( !pnt_ ) {
2948  return std::nullopt;
2949  }
2950  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( *pnt_ );
2951  if( vp ) {
2952  v = &vp->vehicle();
2953  }
2954  }
2955 
2956  if( v == nullptr ) {
2957  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There's no vehicle there." ) );
2958  return std::nullopt;
2959  }
2960  act_vehicle_siphon( v );
2961  return 1;
2962 }
2963 
2964 std::optional<int> iuse::change_eyes( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
2965 {
2966  if( p->is_avatar() ) {
2967  p->customize_appearance( customize_appearance_choice::EYES );
2968  }
2969  return std::nullopt;
2970 }
2971 
2972 std::optional<int> iuse::change_skin( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
2973 {
2974  if( p->is_avatar() ) {
2975  p->customize_appearance( customize_appearance_choice::SKIN );
2976  }
2977  return std::nullopt;
2978 }
2979 
2980 static std::optional<int> dig_tool( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos,
2981  const activity_id activity,
2982  const std::string &prompt, const std::string &fail, const std::string &success,
2983  int extra_moves = 0 )
2984 {
2985  // use has_enough_charges to check for UPS availability
2986  // p is assumed to exist for iuse cases
2987  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
2988  return std::nullopt;
2989  }
2990  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
2991  return std::nullopt;
2992  }
2993  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
2994  return std::nullopt;
2995  }
2996 
2997  tripoint pnt = pos;
2998  if( pos == p->pos() ) {
2999  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( prompt );
3000  if( !pnt_ ) {
3001  return std::nullopt;
3002  }
3003  pnt = *pnt_;
3004  }
3005 
3006  map &here = get_map();
3007  const bool mineable_furn = here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_MINEABLE, pnt );
3008  const bool mineable_ter = here.has_flag_ter( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_MINEABLE, pnt );
3009  const int max_mining_ability = 70;
3010  if( !mineable_furn && !mineable_ter ) {
3011  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, fail );
3012  if( here.bash_resistance( pnt ) > max_mining_ability ) {
3013  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
3014  _( "The material is too hard for you to even make a dent." ) );
3015  }
3016  return std::nullopt;
3017  }
3018  if( here.veh_at( pnt ) ) {
3019  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There's a vehicle in the way!" ) );
3020  return std::nullopt;
3021  }
3022 
3023  int moves = to_moves<int>( 30_minutes );
3024 
3025  const std::vector<Character *> helpers = p->get_crafting_helpers();
3026  const std::size_t helpersize = p->get_num_crafting_helpers( 3 );
3027  moves *= ( 1.0f - ( helpersize / 10.0f ) );
3028  for( std::size_t i = 0; i < helpersize; i++ ) {
3029  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s helps with this task" ), helpers[i]->get_name() );
3030  }
3031 
3032  moves += extra_moves;
3033 
3034  if( here.move_cost( pnt ) == 2 ) {
3035  // We're breaking up some flat surface like pavement, which is much easier
3036  moves /= 2;
3037  }
3038 
3039  p->assign_activity( activity, moves );
3040  p->activity.targets.emplace_back( *p, it );
3041  p->activity.placement = here.getglobal( pnt );
3042 
3043  // You can mine either furniture or terrain, and furniture goes first,
3044  // according to @ref map::bash_ter_furn()
3045  std::string mining_what = mineable_furn ? here.furnname( pnt ) : here.tername( pnt );
3046  p->add_msg_if_player( success, mining_what, it->tname() );
3047 
3048  return 0; // handled when the activity finishes
3049 }
3050 
3051 std::optional<int> iuse::jackhammer( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
3052 {
3053  // use has_enough_charges to check for UPS availability
3054  // p is assumed to exist for iuse cases
3055  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
3056  return std::nullopt;
3057  }
3058 
3059  return dig_tool( p, it, pos, ACT_JACKHAMMER,
3060  _( "Drill where?" ), _( "You can't drill there." ),
3061  _( "You start drilling into the %1$s with your %2$s." ) );
3062 
3063 }
3064 
3065 std::optional<int> iuse::pick_lock( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
3066 {
3067  if( p->is_npc() ) {
3068  return std::nullopt;
3069  }
3070  avatar &you = dynamic_cast<avatar &>( *p );
3071 
3072  std::optional<tripoint> target;
3073  // Prompt for a target lock to pick, or use the given tripoint
3074  if( pos == you.pos() ) {
3075  target = lockpick_activity_actor::select_location( you );
3076  } else {
3077  target = pos;
3078  }
3079  if( !target.has_value() ) {
3080  return std::nullopt;
3081  }
3082 
3083  int qual = it->get_quality( qual_LOCKPICK );
3084  if( qual < 1 ) {
3085  debugmsg( "Item %s with 'PICK_LOCK' use action requires LOCKPICK quality of at least 1.",
3086  it->typeId().c_str() );
3087  qual = 1;
3088  }
3089 
3090  /** @EFFECT_DEX speeds up door lock picking */
3091  /** @EFFECT_LOCKPICK speeds up door lock picking */
3092  int duration_proficiency_factor = 10;
3093 
3094  if( you.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_lockpicking ) ) {
3095  duration_proficiency_factor = 5;
3096  }
3097  if( you.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_lockpicking_expert ) ) {
3098  duration_proficiency_factor = 1;
3099  }
3100  time_duration duration = 5_seconds;
3101  if( !it->has_flag( flag_PERFECT_LOCKPICK ) ) {
3102  duration = std::max( 30_seconds,
3103  ( 10_minutes - time_duration::from_minutes( qual + static_cast<float>( you.dex_cur ) / 4.0f +
3104  you.get_skill_level( skill_traps ) ) ) * duration_proficiency_factor );
3105  }
3106 
3107  you.assign_activity( lockpick_activity_actor::use_item( to_moves<int>( duration ),
3108  item_location( you, it ), get_map().getabs( *target ) ) );
3109  return 1;
3110 }
3111 
3112 std::optional<int> iuse::pickaxe( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
3113 {
3114  if( p->is_npc() ) {
3115  // Long action
3116  return std::nullopt;
3117  }
3118  /** @EFFECT_STR decreases time to dig with a pickaxe */
3119  int extra_moves = ( ( MAX_STAT + 4 ) -
3120  std::min( p->get_arm_str(), MAX_STAT ) ) * to_moves<int>( 5_minutes );
3121  return dig_tool( p, it, pos, ACT_PICKAXE,
3122  _( "Mine where?" ), _( "You can't mine there." ), _( "You strike the %1$s with your %2$s." ),
3123  extra_moves );
3124 
3125 }
3126 
3127 std::optional<int> iuse::geiger( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
3128 {
3129  int ch = uilist( _( "Geiger counter:" ), {
3130  _( "Scan yourself or other person" ), _( "Scan the ground" ), _( "Turn continuous scan on" )
3131  } );
3132  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
3133  switch( ch ) {
3134  case 0: {
3135  const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> f = [&]( const tripoint & pnt ) {
3136  return creatures.creature_at<Character>( pnt ) != nullptr;
3137  };
3138 
3139  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight( _( "Scan whom?" ),
3140  _( "There is no one to scan nearby." ), f, false );
3141  if( !pnt_ ) {
3142  return std::nullopt;
3143  }
3144  const tripoint &pnt = *pnt_;
3145  if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
3146  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your radiation level: %d mSv (%d mSv from items)" ), p->get_rad(),
3147  static_cast<int>( p->get_leak_level() ) );
3148  break;
3149  }
3150  if( npc *const person_ = creatures.creature_at<npc>( pnt ) ) {
3151  npc &person = *person_;
3152  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "%s's radiation level: %d mSv (%d mSv from items)" ),
3153  person.get_name(), person.get_rad(),
3154  static_cast<int>( person.get_leak_level() ) );
3155  }
3156  break;
3157  }
3158  case 1:
3159  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The ground's radiation level: %d mSv/h" ),
3160  get_map().get_radiation( p->pos() ) );
3161  break;
3162  case 2:
3163  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The geiger counter's scan LED turns on." ) );
3164  it->convert( itype_geiger_on, p ).active = true;
3165  break;
3166  default:
3167  return std::nullopt;
3168  }
3169  p->mod_moves( -100 );
3170 
3171  return 1;
3172 }
3173 
3174 std::optional<int> iuse::geiger_active( Character *, item *, const tripoint &pos )
3175 {
3176  const int rads = get_map().get_radiation( pos );
3177  if( rads == 0 ) {
3178  return 1;
3179  }
3180  std::string description = rads > 50 ? _( "buzzing" ) :
3181  rads > 25 ? _( "rapid clicking" ) : _( "clicking" );
3182  std::string sound_var = rads > 50 ? _( "geiger_high" ) :
3183  rads > 25 ? _( "geiger_medium" ) : _( "geiger_low" );
3184 
3185  sounds::sound( pos, 6, sounds::sound_t::alarm, description, true, "tool", sound_var );
3186  if( !get_avatar().can_hear( pos, 6 ) ) {
3187  // can not hear it, but may have alarmed other creatures
3188  return 1;
3189  }
3190  if( rads > 50 ) {
3191  add_msg( m_warning, _( "The geiger counter buzzes intensely." ) );
3192  } else if( rads > 35 ) {
3193  add_msg( m_warning, _( "The geiger counter clicks wildly." ) );
3194  } else if( rads > 25 ) {
3195  add_msg( m_warning, _( "The geiger counter clicks rapidly." ) );
3196  } else if( rads > 15 ) {
3197  add_msg( m_warning, _( "The geiger counter clicks steadily." ) );
3198  } else if( rads > 8 ) {
3199  add_msg( m_warning, _( "The geiger counter clicks slowly." ) );
3200  } else if( rads > 4 ) {
3201  add_msg( _( "The geiger counter clicks intermittently." ) );
3202  } else {
3203  add_msg( _( "The geiger counter clicks once." ) );
3204  }
3205  return 1;
3206 }
3207 
3208 std::optional<int> iuse::teleport( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
3209 {
3210  if( p->is_npc() ) {
3211  // That would be evil
3212  return std::nullopt;
3213  }
3214  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
3215  return std::nullopt;
3216  }
3217  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
3218  return std::nullopt;
3219  }
3220  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
3221  teleport::teleport( *p );
3222  return 1;
3223 }
3224 
3225 std::optional<int> iuse::can_goo( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
3226 {
3227  it->convert( itype_canister_empty );
3228  int tries = 0;
3229  tripoint goop;
3230  goop.z = p->posz();
3231  map &here = get_map();
3232  do {
3233  goop.x = p->posx() + rng( -2, 2 );
3234  goop.y = p->posy() + rng( -2, 2 );
3235  tries++;
3236  } while( here.impassable( goop ) && tries < 10 );
3237  if( tries == 10 ) {
3238  return std::nullopt;
3239  }
3240  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
3241  if( monster *const mon_ptr = creatures.creature_at<monster>( goop ) ) {
3242  monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
3243  add_msg_if_player_sees( goop, _( "Black goo emerges from the canister and envelopes the %s!" ),
3244  critter.name() );
3245  critter.poly( mon_blob );
3246 
3247  critter.set_speed_base( critter.get_speed_base() - rng( 5, 25 ) );
3248  critter.set_hp( critter.get_speed() );
3249  } else {
3250  add_msg_if_player_sees( goop, _( "Living black goo emerges from the canister!" ) );
3251  if( monster *const goo = g->place_critter_at( mon_blob, goop ) ) {
3252  goo->friendly = -1;
3253  }
3254  }
3255  if( x_in_y( 3.0, 4.0 ) ) {
3256  tries = 0;
3257  bool found = false;
3258  do {
3259  goop.x = p->posx() + rng( -2, 2 );
3260  goop.y = p->posy() + rng( -2, 2 );
3261  tries++;
3262  found = here.passable( goop ) && here.tr_at( goop ).is_null();
3263  } while( !found && tries < 10 );
3264  if( found ) {
3265  add_msg_if_player_sees( goop, m_warning, _( "A nearby splatter of goo forms into a goo pit." ) );
3266  here.trap_set( goop, tr_goo );
3267  } else {
3268  return 0;
3269  }
3270  }
3271  return 1;
3272 }
3273 
3274 std::optional<int> iuse::granade_act( Character *, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
3275 {
3276  if( pos.x == -999 || pos.y == -999 ) {
3277  return std::nullopt;
3278  }
3279  map &here = get_map();
3280  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
3281 
3282  int explosion_radius = 3;
3283  int effect_roll = rng( 1, 4 );
3284  auto buff_stat = [&]( int &current_stat, int modify_by ) {
3285  int modified_stat = current_stat + modify_by;
3286  current_stat = std::max( current_stat, std::min( 15, modified_stat ) );
3287  };
3288  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
3289  switch( effect_roll ) {
3290  case 1:
3291  sounds::sound( pos, 100, sounds::sound_t::electronic_speech, _( "BUGFIXES!" ),
3292  true, "speech", it->typeId().str() );
3293  explosion_handler::draw_explosion( pos, explosion_radius, c_light_cyan );
3294  for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( pos, explosion_radius ) ) {
3295  monster *const mon = creatures.creature_at<monster>( dest, true );
3296  if( mon && ( mon->type->in_species( species_INSECT ) || mon->is_hallucination() ) ) {
3297  mon->die_in_explosion( nullptr );
3298  }
3299  }
3300  break;
3301 
3302  case 2:
3303  sounds::sound( pos, 100, sounds::sound_t::electronic_speech, _( "BUFFS!" ),
3304  true, "speech", it->typeId().str() );
3305  explosion_handler::draw_explosion( pos, explosion_radius, c_green );
3306  for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( pos, explosion_radius ) ) {
3307  if( monster *const mon_ptr = creatures.creature_at<monster>( dest ) ) {
3308  monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
3309  critter.set_speed_base(
3310  critter.get_speed_base() * rng_float( 1.1, 2.0 ) );
3311  critter.set_hp( critter.get_hp() * rng_float( 1.1, 2.0 ) );
3312  } else if( npc *const person = creatures.creature_at<npc>( dest ) ) {
3313  /** @EFFECT_STR_MAX increases possible granade str buff for NPCs */
3314  buff_stat( person->str_max, rng( 0, person->str_max / 2 ) );
3315  /** @EFFECT_DEX_MAX increases possible granade dex buff for NPCs */
3316  buff_stat( person->dex_max, rng( 0, person->dex_max / 2 ) );
3317  /** @EFFECT_INT_MAX increases possible granade int buff for NPCs */
3318  buff_stat( person->int_max, rng( 0, person->int_max / 2 ) );
3319  /** @EFFECT_PER_MAX increases possible granade per buff for NPCs */
3320  buff_stat( person->per_max, rng( 0, person->per_max / 2 ) );
3321  } else if( player_character.pos() == dest ) {
3322  /** @EFFECT_STR_MAX increases possible granade str buff */
3323  buff_stat( player_character.str_max, rng( 0, player_character.str_max / 2 ) );
3324  /** @EFFECT_DEX_MAX increases possible granade dex buff */
3325  buff_stat( player_character.dex_max, rng( 0, player_character.dex_max / 2 ) );
3326  /** @EFFECT_INT_MAX increases possible granade int buff */
3327  buff_stat( player_character.int_max, rng( 0, player_character.int_max / 2 ) );
3328  /** @EFFECT_PER_MAX increases possible granade per buff */
3329  buff_stat( player_character.per_max, rng( 0, player_character.per_max / 2 ) );
3330  player_character.recalc_hp();
3331  for( const bodypart_id &bp : player_character.get_all_body_parts(
3332  get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
3333  player_character.set_part_hp_cur( bp, player_character.get_part_hp_cur( bp ) * rng_float( 1,
3334  1.2 ) );
3335  const int hp_max = player_character.get_part_hp_max( bp );
3336  if( player_character.get_part_hp_cur( bp ) > hp_max ) {
3337  player_character.set_part_hp_cur( bp, hp_max );
3338  }
3339  }
3340  }
3341  }
3342  break;
3343 
3344  case 3:
3345  sounds::sound( pos, 100, sounds::sound_t::electronic_speech, _( "NERFS!" ),
3346  true, "speech", it->typeId().str() );
3347  explosion_handler::draw_explosion( pos, explosion_radius, c_red );
3348  for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( pos, explosion_radius ) ) {
3349  if( monster *const mon_ptr = creatures.creature_at<monster>( dest ) ) {
3350  monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
3351  critter.set_speed_base(
3352  rng( 0, critter.get_speed_base() ) );
3353  critter.set_hp( rng( 1, critter.get_hp() ) );
3354  } else if( npc *const person = creatures.creature_at<npc>( dest ) ) {
3355  /** @EFFECT_STR_MAX increases possible granade str debuff for NPCs (NEGATIVE) */
3356  person->str_max -= rng( 0, person->str_max / 2 );
3357  /** @EFFECT_DEX_MAX increases possible granade dex debuff for NPCs (NEGATIVE) */
3358  person->dex_max -= rng( 0, person->dex_max / 2 );
3359  /** @EFFECT_INT_MAX increases possible granade int debuff for NPCs (NEGATIVE) */
3360  person->int_max -= rng( 0, person->int_max / 2 );
3361  /** @EFFECT_PER_MAX increases possible granade per debuff for NPCs (NEGATIVE) */
3362  person->per_max -= rng( 0, person->per_max / 2 );
3363  } else if( player_character.pos() == dest ) {
3364  /** @EFFECT_STR_MAX increases possible granade str debuff (NEGATIVE) */
3365  player_character.str_max -= rng( 0, player_character.str_max / 2 );
3366  /** @EFFECT_DEX_MAX increases possible granade dex debuff (NEGATIVE) */
3367  player_character.dex_max -= rng( 0, player_character.dex_max / 2 );
3368  /** @EFFECT_INT_MAX increases possible granade int debuff (NEGATIVE) */
3369  player_character.int_max -= rng( 0, player_character.int_max / 2 );
3370  /** @EFFECT_PER_MAX increases possible granade per debuff (NEGATIVE) */
3371  player_character.per_max -= rng( 0, player_character.per_max / 2 );
3372  player_character.recalc_hp();
3373  for( const bodypart_id &bp : player_character.get_all_body_parts(
3374  get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
3375  const int hp_cur = player_character.get_part_hp_cur( bp );
3376  if( hp_cur > 0 ) {
3377  player_character.set_part_hp_cur( bp, rng( 1, hp_cur ) );
3378  }
3379  }
3380  }
3381  }
3382  break;
3383 
3384  case 4:
3385  sounds::sound( pos, 100, sounds::sound_t::electronic_speech, _( "REVERTS!" ),
3386  true, "speech", it->typeId().str() );
3387  explosion_handler::draw_explosion( pos, explosion_radius, c_pink );
3388  for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( pos, explosion_radius ) ) {
3389  if( monster *const mon_ptr = creatures.creature_at<monster>( dest ) ) {
3390  monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
3391  critter.set_speed_base( critter.type->speed );
3392  critter.set_hp( critter.get_hp_max() );
3393  critter.clear_effects();
3394  } else if( npc *const person = creatures.creature_at<npc>( dest ) ) {
3395  person->environmental_revert_effect();
3396  } else if( player_character.pos() == dest ) {
3397  player_character.environmental_revert_effect();
3398  do_purify( player_character );
3399  }
3400  }
3401  break;
3402  }
3403  return 1;
3404 }
3405 
3406 std::optional<int> iuse::c4( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
3407 {
3408  int time;
3409  bool got_value = query_int( time, _( "Set the timer to how many seconds (0 to cancel)?" ) );
3410  if( !got_value || time <= 0 ) {
3411  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
3412  return std::nullopt;
3413  }
3414  p->add_msg_if_player( n_gettext( "You set the timer to %d second.",
3415  "You set the timer to %d seconds.", time ), time );
3416  it->convert( itype_c4armed );
3417  it->countdown_point = calendar::turn + time_duration::from_seconds( time );
3418  it->active = true;
3419  return 1;
3420 }
3421 
3422 std::optional<int> iuse::acidbomb_act( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
3423 {
3424  if( !p ) {
3425  it->charges = -1;
3426  map &here = get_map();
3427  for( const tripoint &tmp : here.points_in_radius( pos, 1 ) ) {
3428  here.add_field( tmp, fd_acid, 3 );
3429  }
3430  return 1;
3431  }
3432  return std::nullopt;
3433 }
3434 
3435 std::optional<int> iuse::grenade_inc_act( Character *p, item *, const tripoint &pos )
3436 {
3437  if( pos.x == -999 || pos.y == -999 ) {
3438  return std::nullopt;
3439  }
3440 
3441  map &here = get_map();
3442  int num_flames = rng( 3, 5 );
3443  for( int current_flame = 0; current_flame < num_flames; current_flame++ ) {
3444  tripoint dest( pos + point( rng( -5, 5 ), rng( -5, 5 ) ) );
3445  std::vector<tripoint> flames = line_to( pos, dest, 0, 0 );
3446  for( tripoint &flame : flames ) {
3447  here.add_field( flame, fd_fire, rng( 0, 2 ) );
3448  }
3449  }
3450  explosion_handler::explosion( p, pos, 8, 0.8, true );
3451  for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( pos, 2 ) ) {
3452  here.add_field( dest, fd_incendiary, 3 );
3453  }
3454 
3455  avatar &player = get_avatar();
3456  if( player.has_trait( trait_PYROMANIA ) && player.sees( pos ) ) {
3457  player.add_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_STARTFIRE, 15, 15, 8_hours, 6_hours );
3458  player.rem_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_NOFIRE );
3459  add_msg( m_good, _( "Fire Good" ) );
3460  }
3461  return 0;
3462 }
3463 
3464 std::optional<int> iuse::molotov_lit( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
3465 {
3466 
3467  if( !p ) {
3468  // It was thrown or dropped, so burst into flames
3469  map &here = get_map();
3470  for( const tripoint &pt : here.points_in_radius( pos, 1, 0 ) ) {
3471  const int intensity = 1 + one_in( 3 ) + one_in( 5 );
3472  here.add_field( pt, fd_fire, intensity );
3473  }
3474  avatar &player = get_avatar();
3475  if( player.has_trait( trait_PYROMANIA ) && player.sees( pos ) ) {
3476  player.add_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_STARTFIRE, 15, 15, 8_hours, 6_hours );
3477  player.rem_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_NOFIRE );
3478  add_msg( m_good, _( "Fire Good" ) );
3479  }
3480  return 1;
3481  }
3482 
3483  // 20% chance of going out harmlessly.
3484  if( one_in( 5 ) ) {
3485  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Your lit Molotov goes out." ) );
3486  it->convert( itype_molotov, p ).active = false;
3487  }
3488  return 0;
3489 }
3490 
3491 std::optional<int> iuse::firecracker_pack( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
3492 {
3493  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
3494  return std::nullopt;
3495  }
3496  if( !p->has_charges( itype_fire, 1 ) ) {
3497  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need a source of fire!" ) );
3498  return std::nullopt;
3499  }
3500  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You light the pack of firecrackers." ) );
3501  it->convert( itype_firecracker_pack_act, p );
3502  it->countdown_point = calendar::turn + 27_seconds;
3503  it->set_age( 0_turns );
3504  it->active = true;
3505  return 0; // don't use any charges at all. it has became a new item
3506 }
3507 
3508 std::optional<int> iuse::firecracker_pack_act( Character *, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
3509 {
3510  // Two seconds of lit fuse burning
3511  // Followed by random number of explosions (4-6) per turn until 25 epxlosions have happened
3512  // Finally item despawns since countdown has ended
3513  if( it->age() < 2_seconds ) {
3514  sounds::sound( pos, 0, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "ssss" ), true, "misc", "lit_fuse" );
3515  } else {
3516  // Time left to countdown_point is used to track of number of explosions
3517  int explosions = rng( 4, 6 );
3518  int i = 0;
3519  explosions = std::min( explosions, to_seconds<int>( it->countdown_point - calendar::turn ) );
3520  for( i = 0; i < explosions; i++ ) {
3521  sounds::sound( pos, 20, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "Bang!" ), false, "explosion", "small" );
3522  }
3523  it->countdown_point -= ( explosions - 1 ) * 1_seconds;
3524  }
3525  return 0;
3526 }
3527 
3528 std::optional<int> iuse::firecracker( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
3529 {
3530  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
3531  return std::nullopt;
3532  }
3533  if( !p->use_charges_if_avail( itype_fire, 1 ) ) {
3534  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need a source of fire!" ) );
3535  return std::nullopt;
3536  }
3537  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You light the firecracker." ) );
3538  it->convert( itype_firecracker_act, p );
3539  it->countdown_point = calendar::turn + 2_seconds;
3540  it->active = true;
3541  return 1;
3542 }
3543 
3544 std::optional<int> iuse::mininuke( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
3545 {
3546  int time;
3547  bool got_value = query_int( time, _( "Set the timer to ___ turns (0 to cancel)?" ) );
3548  if( !got_value || time <= 0 ) {
3549  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
3550  return std::nullopt;
3551  }
3552  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You set the timer to %s." ),
3553  to_string( time_duration::from_turns( time ) ) );
3554  get_event_bus().send<event_type::activates_mininuke>( p->getID() );
3555  it->convert( itype_mininuke_act, p );
3556  it->countdown_point = calendar::turn + time_duration::from_seconds( time );
3557  it->active = true;
3558  return 1;
3559 }
3560 
3561 std::optional<int> iuse::portal( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
3562 {
3563  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
3564  return std::nullopt;
3565  }
3566  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
3567  return std::nullopt;
3568  }
3569  tripoint t( p->posx() + rng( -2, 2 ), p->posy() + rng( -2, 2 ), p->posz() );
3570  get_map().trap_set( t, tr_portal );
3571  return 1;
3572 }
3573 
3574 std::optional<int> iuse::tazer( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
3575 {
3576  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
3577  return std::nullopt;
3578  }
3579 
3580  tripoint pnt = pos;
3581  if( pos == p->pos() ) {
3582  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Shock where?" ) );
3583  if( !pnt_ ) {
3584  return std::nullopt;
3585  }
3586  pnt = *pnt_;
3587  }
3588 
3589  if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
3590  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Umm. No." ) );
3591  return std::nullopt;
3592  }
3593 
3594  Creature *target = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( pnt, true );
3595  if( target == nullptr ) {
3596  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There's nothing to zap there!" ) );
3597  return std::nullopt;
3598  }
3599 
3600  npc *foe = dynamic_cast<npc *>( target );
3601  if( foe != nullptr &&
3602  !foe->is_enemy() &&
3603  !p->query_yn( _( "Do you really want to shock %s?" ), target->disp_name() ) ) {
3604  return std::nullopt;
3605  }
3606 
3607  const float hit_roll = p->hit_roll();
3608  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
3609 
3610  const bool tazer_was_dodged = target->dodge_check( p->hit_roll() );
3611  const bool tazer_was_armored = hit_roll < target->get_armor_type( STATIC(
3612  damage_type_id( "bash" ) ), bodypart_id( "torso" ) );
3613  if( tazer_was_dodged ) {
3614  p->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You attempt to shock %s, but miss." ),
3615  _( "<npcname> attempts to shock %s, but misses." ),
3616  target->disp_name() );
3617  } else if( tazer_was_armored ) {
3618  p->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You attempt to shock %s, but are blocked by armor." ),
3619  _( "<npcname> attempts to shock %s, but is blocked by armor." ),
3620  target->disp_name() );
3621  } else {
3622  // Stun duration scales harshly inversely with big creatures
3623  if( target->get_size() == creature_size::tiny ) {
3624  target->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * rng_float( 1.5, 2.5 ) );
3625  } else if( target->get_size() == creature_size::small ) {
3626  target->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * rng_float( 1.25, 2.0 ) );
3627  } else if( target->get_size() == creature_size::large ) {
3628  target->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * rng_float( 0.95, 1.15 ) );
3629  } else if( target->get_size() == creature_size::huge ) {
3630  target->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * rng_float( 0.5, 0.8 ) );
3631  } else {
3632  target->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * rng_float( 1.1, 1.5 ) );
3633  }
3634  p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
3635  _( "You shock %s!" ),
3636  _( "<npcname> shocks %s!" ),
3637  target->disp_name() );
3638  }
3639 
3640  if( foe != nullptr ) {
3641  foe->on_attacked( *p );
3642  }
3643 
3644  return 1;
3645 }
3646 
3647 std::optional<int> iuse::tazer2( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
3648 {
3649  if( it->ammo_remaining( p, true ) >= 2 ) {
3650  // Instead of having a ctrl+c+v of the function above, spawn a fake tazer and use it
3651  // Ugly, but less so than copied blocks
3652  item fake( "tazer", calendar::turn_zero );
3653  fake.charges = 2;
3654  return tazer( p, &fake, pos );
3655  } else {
3656  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Insufficient power" ) );
3657  }
3658 
3659  return std::nullopt;
3660 }
3661 
3662 std::optional<int> iuse::shocktonfa_off( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
3663 {
3664  if( !p ) {
3665  debugmsg( "%s called action shocktonfa_off that requires character but no character is present",
3666  it->typeId().str() );
3667  }
3668  int choice = uilist( _( "tactical tonfa" ), {
3669  _( "Zap something" ), _( "Turn on light" )
3670  } );
3671 
3672  switch( choice ) {
3673  case 0: {
3674  return iuse::tazer2( p, it, pos );
3675  }
3676  case 1: {
3677  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
3678  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The batteries are dead." ) );
3679  return std::nullopt;
3680  } else {
3681  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You turn the light on." ) );
3682  it->convert( itype_shocktonfa_on, p ).active = true;
3683  return 1;
3684  }
3685  }
3686  }
3687  return 0;
3688 }
3689 
3690 std::optional<int> iuse::shocktonfa_on( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
3691 {
3692  if( !p ) { // Effects while simply on
3693  debugmsg( "%s called action shocktonfa_on that requires character but no character is present",
3694  it->typeId().str() );
3695  } else {
3696  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
3697  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your tactical tonfa is out of power." ) );
3698  it->convert( itype_shocktonfa_off, p ).active = false;
3699  } else {
3700  int choice = uilist( _( "tactical tonfa" ), {
3701  _( "Zap something" ), _( "Turn off light" )
3702  } );
3703 
3704  switch( choice ) {
3705  case 0: {
3706  return iuse::tazer2( p, it, pos );
3707  }
3708  case 1: {
3709  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You turn off the light." ) );
3710  it->convert( itype_shocktonfa_off, p ).active = false;
3711  }
3712  }
3713  }
3714  }
3715  return 0;
3716 }
3717 
3718 std::optional<int> iuse::mp3( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
3719 {
3720  // TODO: avoid item id hardcoding to make this function usable for pure json-defined devices.
3721  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
3722  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The device's batteries are dead." ) );
3723  } else if( p->has_active_item( itype_mp3_on ) || p->has_active_item( itype_smartphone_music ) ||
3724  p->has_active_item( itype_afs_atomic_smartphone_music ) ||
3725  p->has_active_item( itype_afs_atomic_wraitheon_music ) ) {
3726  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You are already listening to music!" ) );
3727  } else {
3728  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You put in the earbuds and start listening to music." ) );
3729  if( it->typeId() == itype_mp3 ) {
3730  it->convert( itype_mp3_on, p ).active = true;
3731  } else if( it->typeId() == itype_smart_phone ) {
3732  it->convert( itype_smartphone_music, p ).active = true;
3733  } else if( it->typeId() == itype_afs_atomic_smartphone ) {
3734  it->convert( itype_afs_atomic_smartphone_music, p ).active = true;
3735  } else if( it->typeId() == itype_afs_wraitheon_smartphone ) {
3736  it->convert( itype_afs_atomic_wraitheon_music, p ).active = true;
3737  }
3738  p->mod_moves( -200 );
3739  }
3740  return 1;
3741 }
3742 
3743 static std::string get_music_description()
3744 {
3745  const std::array<std::string, 5> descriptions = {{
3746  translate_marker( "a sweet guitar solo!" ),
3747  translate_marker( "a funky bassline." ),
3748  translate_marker( "some amazing vocals." ),
3749  translate_marker( "some pumping bass." ),
3750  translate_marker( "dramatic classical music." )
3751  }
3752  };
3753 
3754  if( one_in( 50 ) ) {
3755  return _( "some bass-heavy post-glam speed polka." );
3756  }
3757 
3758  size_t i = static_cast<size_t>( rng( 0, descriptions.size() * 2 ) );
3759  if( i < descriptions.size() ) {
3760  return _( descriptions[i] );
3761  }
3762  // Not one of the hard-coded versions, let's apply a random string made up
3763  // of snippets {a, b, c}, but only a 50% chance
3764  // Actual chance = 24.5% of being selected
3765  if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
3766  return SNIPPET.expand( SNIPPET.random_from_category( "<music_description>" ).value_or(
3767  translation() ).translated() );
3768  }
3769 
3770  return _( "a sweet guitar solo!" );
3771 }
3772 
3773 void iuse::play_music( Character *p, const tripoint &source, const int volume,
3774  const int max_morale )
3775 {
3776  // TODO: what about other "player", e.g. when a NPC is listening or when the PC is listening,
3777  // the other characters around should be able to profit as well.
3778  const bool do_effects = p && p->can_hear( source, volume ) && !p->in_sleep_state();
3779  std::string sound = "music";
3780 
3781  if( calendar::once_every( time_duration::from_minutes(
3782  get_option<int>( "DESCRIBE_MUSIC_FREQUENCY" ) ) ) ) {
3783  // Every X minutes, describe the music
3784  const std::string music = get_music_description();
3785  if( !music.empty() ) {
3786  sound = music;
3787  // descriptions aren't printed for sounds at our position
3788  if( do_effects && p->pos() == source ) {
3789  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You listen to %s" ), music );
3790  }
3791  }
3792  }
3793 
3794  if( volume != 0 ) {
3795  sounds::ambient_sound( source, volume, sounds::sound_t::music, sound );
3796  }
3797 
3798  if( do_effects ) {
3799  p->add_effect( effect_music, 1_turns );
3800  p->add_morale( MORALE_MUSIC, 1, max_morale, 5_minutes, 2_minutes, true );
3801  // mp3 player reduces hearing
3802  if( volume == 0 ) {
3803  p->add_effect( effect_earphones, 1_turns );
3804  }
3805  }
3806 }
3807 
3808 std::optional<int> iuse::mp3_on( Character *p, item *, const tripoint &pos )
3809 {
3810  // mp3 player in inventory, we can listen
3811  play_music( p, pos, 0, 20 );
3812  music::activate_music_id( music::music_id::mp3 );
3813  return 1;
3814 }
3815 
3816 std::optional<int> iuse::mp3_deactivate( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
3817 {
3818 
3819  if( it->typeId() == itype_mp3_on ) {
3820  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The mp3 player turns off." ) );
3821  it->convert( itype_mp3, p ).active = false;
3822  } else if( it->typeId() == itype_smartphone_music ) {
3823  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The phone turns off." ) );
3824  it->convert( itype_smart_phone, p ).active = false;
3825  } else if( it->typeId() == itype_afs_atomic_smartphone_music ) {
3826  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The phone turns off." ) );
3827  it->convert( itype_afs_atomic_smartphone, p ).active = false;
3828  } else if( it->typeId() == itype_afs_atomic_wraitheon_music ) {
3829  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The phone turns off." ) );
3830  it->convert( itype_afs_wraitheon_smartphone, p ).active = false;
3831  }
3832  p->mod_moves( -200 );
3833  music::deactivate_music_id( music::music_id::mp3 );
3834 
3835  return 0;
3836 
3837 }
3838 
3839 std::optional<int> iuse::rpgdie( Character *you, item *die, const tripoint & )
3840 {
3841  if( you->cant_do_mounted() ) {
3842  return std::nullopt;
3843  }
3844  int num_sides = die->get_var( "die_num_sides", 0 );
3845  if( num_sides == 0 ) {
3846  const std::vector<int> sides_options = { 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 20, 50 };
3847  const int sides = sides_options[ rng( 0, sides_options.size() - 1 ) ];
3848  num_sides = sides;
3849  die->set_var( "die_num_sides", sides );
3850  }
3851  const int roll = rng( 1, num_sides );
3852  //~ %1$d: roll number, %2$d: side number of a die, %3$s: die item name
3853  you->add_msg_if_player( pgettext( "dice", "You roll a %1$d on your %2$d sided %3$s" ), roll,
3854  num_sides, die->tname() );
3855  if( roll == num_sides ) {
3856  add_msg( m_good, _( "Critical!" ) );
3857  }
3858  return roll;
3859 }
3860 
3861 std::optional<int> iuse::dive_tank( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
3862 {
3863  if( p && p->is_worn( *it ) ) {
3864  if( p->is_underwater() && p->oxygen < 10 ) {
3865  p->oxygen += 20;
3866  }
3867  if( one_in( 15 ) ) {
3868  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You take a deep breath from your %s." ), it->tname() );
3869  }
3870  if( it->ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
3871  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Air in your %s runs out." ), it->tname() );
3872  it->erase_var( "overwrite_env_resist" );
3873  it->convert( *it->type->revert_to ).active = false;
3874  }
3875  } else { // not worn = off thanks to on-demand regulator
3876  it->erase_var( "overwrite_env_resist" );
3877  it->convert( *it->type->revert_to ).active = false;
3878  }
3879 
3880  return 1;
3881 }
3882 
3883 std::optional<int> iuse::dive_tank_activate( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
3884 {
3885  if( it->ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
3886  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s is empty." ), it->tname() );
3887  } else if( it->active ) { //off
3888  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You turn off the regulator and close the air valve." ) );
3889  it->erase_var( "overwrite_env_resist" );
3890  it->convert( *it->type->revert_to ).active = false;
3891  } else { //on
3892  if( !p->is_worn( *it ) ) {
3893  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You should wear it first." ) );
3894  } else {
3895  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You turn on the regulator and open the air valve." ) );
3896  it->set_var( "overwrite_env_resist", it->get_base_env_resist_w_filter() );
3897  it->convert( itype_id( it->typeId().str() + "_on" ) ).active = true;
3898  }
3899  }
3900  return 1;
3901 }
3902 
3903 std::optional<int> iuse::solarpack( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
3904 {
3905  if( !p ) {
3906  debugmsg( "%s called action solarpack that requires character but no character is present",
3907  it->typeId().str() );
3908  return std::nullopt;
3909  }
3910  const bionic_id rem_bid = p->get_remote_fueled_bionic();
3911  if( rem_bid.is_empty() ) { // Cable CBM required
3912  p->add_msg_if_player(
3913  _( "You have no cable charging system to plug it into, so you leave it alone." ) );
3914  return std::nullopt;
3915  } else if( !p->has_active_bionic( rem_bid ) ) { // when OFF it takes no effect
3916  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Activate your cable charging system to take advantage of it." ) );
3917  }
3918 
3919  if( it->is_armor() && !p->is_worn( *it ) ) {
3920  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You need to wear the %1$s before you can unfold it." ),
3921  it->tname() );
3922  return std::nullopt;
3923  }
3924  // no doubled sources of power
3925  if( p->worn_with_flag( flag_SOLARPACK_ON ) ) {
3926  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You can't use the %1$s with another of its kind." ),
3927  it->tname() );
3928  return std::nullopt;
3929  }
3930  p->add_msg_if_player(
3931  _( "You unfold the solar array from the pack. You still need to connect it with a cable." ) );
3932 
3933  it->convert( itype_id( it->typeId().str() + "_on" ), p );
3934  return 0;
3935 }
3936 
3937 std::optional<int> iuse::solarpack_off( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
3938 {
3939  if( !p ) {
3940  debugmsg( "%s called action solarpack_off that requires character but no character is present",
3941  it->typeId().str() );
3942  return std::nullopt;
3943  }
3944  if( !p->is_worn( *it ) ) { // folding when not worn
3945  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You fold your portable solar array into the pack." ) );
3946  } else {
3947  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You unplug your portable solar array, and fold it into the pack." ) );
3948  }
3949 
3950  it->erase_var( "cable" );
3951 
3952  // 3 = "_on"
3953  it->convert( itype_id( it->typeId().str().substr( 0,
3954  it->typeId().str().size() - 3 ) ), p ).active = false;
3955  p->process_items(); // Process carried items to disconnect any connected cables
3956  return 0;
3957 }
3958 
3959 std::optional<int> iuse::gasmask_activate( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
3960 {
3961  if( it->ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
3962  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s doesn't have a filter." ), it->tname() );
3963  } else {
3964  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You prepare your %s." ), it->tname() );
3965  it->active = true;
3966  it->set_var( "overwrite_env_resist", it->get_base_env_resist_w_filter() );
3967  }
3968 
3969  return 0;
3970 }
3971 
3972 std::optional<int> iuse::gasmask( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
3973 {
3974  if( p && p->is_worn( *it ) ) {
3975  // calculate amount of absorbed gas per filter charge
3976  const field &gasfield = get_map().field_at( pos );
3977  for( const auto &dfield : gasfield ) {
3978  const field_entry &entry = dfield.second;
3979  int gas_abs_factor = to_turns<int>( entry.get_field_type()->gas_absorption_factor );
3980  // Not set, skip this field
3981  if( gas_abs_factor == 0 ) {
3982  continue;
3983  }
3984  const field_intensity_level &int_level = entry.get_intensity_level();
3985  // 6000 is the amount of "gas absorbed" charges in a full 100 capacity gas mask cartridge.
3986  // factor/concentration gives an amount of seconds the cartidge is expected to last in current conditions.
3987  /// 6000/that is the amount of "gas absorbed" charges to tick up every second in order to reach that number.
3988  float gas_absorbed = 6000 / ( static_cast<float>( gas_abs_factor ) / static_cast<float>
3989  ( int_level.concentration ) );
3990  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_IUSE, "Absorbing %g/60 from field: 6000 / (%d * %d)", gas_absorbed,
3991  gas_abs_factor, int_level.concentration );
3992  if( gas_absorbed > 0 ) {
3993  it->set_var( "gas_absorbed", it->get_var( "gas_absorbed", 0 ) + gas_absorbed );
3994  }
3995  }
3996  if( it->get_var( "gas_absorbed", 0 ) >= 60 ) {
3997  it->ammo_consume( 1, pos, p );
3998  it->set_var( "gas_absorbed", 0 );
3999  if( it->ammo_remaining() < 10 ) {
4000  p->add_msg_player_or_npc(
4001  m_bad,
4002  _( "Your %s is getting hard to breathe in!" ),
4003  _( "<npcname>'s gas mask is getting hard to breathe in!" )
4004  , it->tname() );
4005  }
4006  }
4007  if( it->ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
4008  p->add_msg_player_or_npc(
4009  m_bad,
4010  _( "Your %s requires new filters!" ),
4011  _( "<npcname> needs new gas mask filters!" )
4012  , it->tname() );
4013  }
4014  }
4015 
4016  if( it->ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
4017  it->set_var( "overwrite_env_resist", 0 );
4018  it->active = false;
4019  }
4020  return 0;
4021 }
4022 
4023 std::optional<int> iuse::portable_game( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
4024 {
4025  if( p->is_npc() ) {
4026  // Long action
4027  return std::nullopt;
4028  }
4029  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
4030  return std::nullopt;
4031  }
4032  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
4033  return std::nullopt;
4034  }
4035  if( p->has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
4036  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You're illiterate!" ) );
4037  return std::nullopt;
4038  } else if( it->typeId() != itype_arcade_machine && !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
4039  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The %s's batteries are dead." ), it->tname() );
4040  return std::nullopt;
4041  } else {
4042  std::string loaded_software = "robot_finds_kitten";
4043  // number of nearby friends with gaming devices
4044  std::vector<npc *> friends_w_game = g->get_npcs_if( [&it, p]( const npc & n ) {
4045  return n.is_player_ally() && p->sees( n ) &&
4046  n.can_hear( p->pos(), p->get_shout_volume() ) &&
4047  n.has_item_with( [&it]( const item & i ) {
4048  return i.typeId() == it->typeId() && i.ammo_sufficient( nullptr );
4049  } );
4050  } );
4051 
4052  uilist as_m;
4053  as_m.text = _( "What do you want to play?" );
4054  as_m.entries.emplace_back( 1, true, '1', _( "robotfindskitten" ) );
4055  as_m.entries.emplace_back( 2, true, '2', _( "S N A K E" ) );
4056  as_m.entries.emplace_back( 3, true, '3', _( "Sokoban" ) );
4057  as_m.entries.emplace_back( 4, true, '4', _( "Minesweeper" ) );
4058  as_m.entries.emplace_back( 5, true, '5', _( "Lights on!" ) );
4059  if( friends_w_game.empty() ) {
4060  as_m.entries.emplace_back( 6, true, '6', _( "Play anything for a while" ) );
4061  } else {
4062  as_m.entries.emplace_back( 6, true, '6', _( "Play something with friends" ) );
4063  as_m.entries.emplace_back( 7, true, '7', _( "Play something alone" ) );
4064  }
4065  as_m.query();
4066 
4067  bool w_friends = false;
4068  switch( as_m.ret ) {
4069  case 1:
4070  loaded_software = "robot_finds_kitten";
4071  break;
4072  case 2:
4073  loaded_software = "snake_game";
4074  break;
4075  case 3:
4076  loaded_software = "sokoban_game";
4077  break;
4078  case 4:
4079  loaded_software = "minesweeper_game";
4080  break;
4081  case 5:
4082  loaded_software = "lightson_game";
4083  break;
4084  case 6:
4085  loaded_software = "null";
4086  w_friends = !friends_w_game.empty();
4087  break;
4088  case 7: {
4089  if( friends_w_game.empty() ) {
4090  return std::nullopt;
4091  }
4092  loaded_software = "null";
4093  }
4094  break;
4095  default:
4096  //Cancel
4097  return std::nullopt;
4098  }
4099 
4100  //Play in 15-minute chunks
4101  const int moves = to_moves<int>( 15_minutes );
4102  size_t num_friends = w_friends ? friends_w_game.size() : 0;
4103  int winner = rng( 0, num_friends );
4104  if( winner == 0 ) {
4105  winner = get_player_character().getID().get_value();
4106  } else {
4107  winner = friends_w_game[winner - 1]->getID().get_value();
4108  }
4109  player_activity game_act( ACT_GENERIC_GAME, to_moves<int>( 1_hours ), num_friends,
4110  p->get_item_position( it ), w_friends ? "gaming with friends" : "gaming" );
4111  game_act.values.emplace_back( winner );
4112 
4113  if( w_friends ) {
4114  std::string it_name = it->type_name( num_friends + 1 );
4115  if( num_friends > 1 ) {
4116  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You and your %1$u friends play on your %2$s for a while." ), num_friends,
4117  it_name );
4118  } else {
4119  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You and your friend play on your %s for a while." ), it_name );
4120  }
4121  for( npc *n : friends_w_game ) {
4122  std::vector<item *> nit = n->cache_get_items_with( it->typeId(), []( const item & i ) {
4123  return i.ammo_sufficient( nullptr );
4124  } );
4125  n->assign_activity( game_act );
4126  n->activity.targets.emplace_back( *n, nit.front() );
4127  n->activity.position = n->get_item_position( nit.front() );
4128  }
4129  } else {
4130  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You play on your %s for a while." ), it->tname() );
4131  }
4132  if( loaded_software == "null" ) {
4133  p->assign_activity( game_act );
4134  p->activity.targets.emplace_back( *p, it );
4135  return 0;
4136  }
4137  p->assign_activity( ACT_GAME, moves, -1, 0, "gaming" );
4138  p->activity.targets.emplace_back( *p, it );
4139  std::map<std::string, std::string> game_data;
4140  game_data.clear();
4141  int game_score = 0;
4142 
4143  play_videogame( loaded_software, game_data, game_score );
4144 
4145  if( game_data.find( "end_message" ) != game_data.end() ) {
4146  p->add_msg_if_player( game_data["end_message"] );
4147  }
4148 
4149  if( game_score != 0 ) {
4150  if( game_data.find( "moraletype" ) != game_data.end() ) {
4151  std::string moraletype = game_data.find( "moraletype" )->second;
4152  if( moraletype == "MORALE_GAME_FOUND_KITTEN" ) {
4153  p->add_morale( MORALE_GAME_FOUND_KITTEN, game_score, 110 );
4154  } /*else if ( ...*/
4155  } else {
4156  p->add_morale( MORALE_GAME, game_score, 110 );
4157  }
4158  }
4159 
4160  }
4161  return 0;
4162 }
4163 
4164 std::optional<int> iuse::fitness_check( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
4165 {
4166  if( p->has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
4167  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't know what you're looking at." ) );
4168  return std::nullopt;
4169  } else {
4170  //What else should block using f-band?
4171  std::string msg;
4172  msg.append( "*** " );
4173  msg.append( string_format( _( "You check your health metrics on your %s." ), it->tname( 1,
4174  false ) ) );
4175  msg.append( " ***\n\n" );
4176  const int bpm = p->heartrate_bpm();
4177  msg.append( "-> " );
4178  msg.append( string_format( _( "Your heart rate is %i bpm." ), bpm ) );
4179  if( bpm > 179 ) {
4180  msg.append( "\n" );
4181  msg.append( "-> " );
4182  msg.append( _( "WARNING! Slow down! Your pulse is getting too high, champion!" ) );
4183  }
4184  const std::string exercise = p->activity_level_str();
4185  msg.append( "\n" );
4186  msg.append( "-> " );
4187  if( exercise == "NO_EXERCISE" ) {
4188  msg.append( _( "You haven't really been active today. Try going for a walk!" ) );
4189  } else if( exercise == "LIGHT_EXERCISE" ) {
4190  msg.append( _( "Good start! Keep it up and move more." ) );
4191  } else if( exercise == "MODERATE_EXERCISE" ) {
4192  msg.append( _( "Doing good! Don't stop, push the limit!" ) );
4193  } else if( exercise == "ACTIVE_EXERCISE" ) {
4194  msg.append( _( "Great job! Take a break and don't forget about hydration!" ) );
4195  } else {
4196  msg.append( _( "You are too active! Avoid overexertion for your safety and health." ) );
4197  }
4198  msg.append( "\n" );
4199  msg.append( "-> " );
4200  msg.append( string_format( _( "You consumed %d kcal today and %d kcal yesterday." ),
4201  p->as_avatar()->get_daily_ingested_kcal( false ),
4202  p->as_avatar()->get_daily_ingested_kcal( true ) ) );
4203  msg.append( "\n" );
4204  msg.append( "-> " );
4205  msg.append( string_format( _( "You burned %d kcal today and %d kcal yesterday." ),
4206  p->as_avatar()->get_daily_spent_kcal( false ),
4207  p->as_avatar()->get_daily_spent_kcal( true ) ) );
4208  //TODO add whatever else makes sense (steps, sleep quality, health level approximation?)
4209  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, msg );
4210  popup( msg );
4211  }
4212  return 1;
4213 }
4214 
4215 std::optional<int> iuse::hand_crank( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
4216 {
4217  if( p->is_npc() ) {
4218  // Long action
4219  return std::nullopt;
4220  }
4221  if( p->is_underwater() ) {
4222  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "It's not waterproof enough to work underwater." ) );
4223  return std::nullopt;
4224  }
4225  if( p->get_sleepiness() >= sleepiness_levels::DEAD_TIRED ) {
4226  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You're too exhausted to keep cranking." ) );
4227  return std::nullopt;
4228  }
4229  item *magazine = it->magazine_current();
4230  if( magazine && magazine->has_flag( flag_RECHARGE ) ) {
4231  // 1600 minutes. It shouldn't ever run this long, but it's an upper bound.
4232  // expectation is it runs until the player is too tired.
4233  int moves = to_moves<int>( 1600_minutes );
4234  if( it->ammo_capacity( ammo_battery ) > it->ammo_remaining() ) {
4235  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You start cranking the %s to charge its %s." ), it->tname(),
4236  it->magazine_current()->tname() );
4237  p->assign_activity( ACT_HAND_CRANK, moves, -1, 0, "hand-cranking" );
4238  p->activity.targets.emplace_back( *p, it );
4239  } else {
4240  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You could use the %s to charge its %s, but it's already charged." ),
4241  it->tname(), magazine->tname() );
4242  }
4243  } else {
4244  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need a rechargeable battery cell to charge." ) );
4245  }
4246  return 0;
4247 }
4248 
4249 std::optional<int> iuse::vibe( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
4250 {
4251  if( p->is_npc() ) {
4252  // Long action
4253  // Also, that would be creepy as fuck, seriously
4254  return std::nullopt;
4255  }
4256  if( p->is_mounted() ) {
4257  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while mounted." ) );
4258  return std::nullopt;
4259  }
4260  if( p->is_underwater() && ( !( p->has_trait( trait_GILLS ) ||
4261  p->is_wearing( itype_rebreather_on ) ||
4262  p->is_wearing( itype_rebreather_xl_on ) ||
4263  p->is_wearing( itype_mask_h20survivor_on ) ) ) ) {
4264  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "It might be waterproof, but your lungs aren't." ) );
4265  return std::nullopt;
4266  }
4267  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
4268  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The %s's batteries are dead." ), it->tname() );
4269  return std::nullopt;
4270  }
4271  if( p->get_sleepiness() >= sleepiness_levels::DEAD_TIRED ) {
4272  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "*Your* batteries are dead." ) );
4273  return std::nullopt;
4274  } else {
4275  int moves = to_moves<int>( 20_minutes );
4276  if( it->ammo_remaining() > 0 ) {
4277  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You fire up your %s and start getting the tension out." ),
4278  it->tname() );
4279  } else {
4280  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You whip out your %s and start getting the tension out." ),
4281  it->tname() );
4282  }
4283  p->assign_activity( ACT_VIBE, moves, -1, 0, "de-stressing" );
4284  p->activity.targets.emplace_back( *p, it );
4285  }
4286  return 1;
4287 }
4288 
4289 std::optional<int> iuse::vortex( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
4290 {
4291  std::vector<point> spawn;
4292  for( int i = -3; i <= 3; i++ ) {
4293  spawn.emplace_back( -3, i );
4294  spawn.emplace_back( +3, i );
4295  spawn.emplace_back( i, -3 );
4296  spawn.emplace_back( i, +3 );
4297  }
4298 
4299  while( !spawn.empty() ) {
4300  const tripoint offset( random_entry_removed( spawn ), 0 );
4301  monster *const mon = g->place_critter_at( mon_vortex, offset + p->pos() );
4302  if( !mon ) {
4303  continue;
4304  }
4305  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Air swirls all over" ) );
4306  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
4307  it->convert( itype_spiral_stone, p );
4308  mon->friendly = -1;
4309  return 1;
4310  }
4311 
4312  // Only reachable when no monster has been spawned.
4313  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Air swirls around you for a moment." ) );
4314  return 0;
4315 }
4316 
4317 std::optional<int> iuse::dog_whistle( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
4318 {
4319  if( !p->is_avatar() ) {
4320  return std::nullopt;
4321  }
4322  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
4323  return std::nullopt;
4324  }
4325  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You blow your dog whistle." ) );
4326 
4327  // Can the Character hear the dog whistle?
4328  auto hearing_check = [p]( const Character & who ) -> bool {
4329  return !who.is_deaf() && p->sees( who ) &&
4330  who.has_trait( STATIC( trait_id( "THRESH_LUPINE" ) ) );
4331  };
4332 
4333  for( const npc &subject : g->all_npcs() ) {
4334  if( !( one_in( 3 ) && hearing_check( subject ) ) ) {
4335  continue;
4336  }
4337 
4338  std::optional<translation> npc_message;
4339 
4340  if( p->attitude_to( subject ) == Creature::Attitude::HOSTILE ) {
4341  npc_message = SNIPPET.random_from_category( "dogwhistle_message_npc_hostile" );
4342  } else {
4343  npc_message = SNIPPET.random_from_category( "dogwhistle_message_npc_not_hostile" );
4344  }
4345 
4346  if( npc_message ) {
4347  subject.say( npc_message.value().translated() );
4348  }
4349  }
4350 
4351  if( hearing_check( *p ) && one_in( 3 ) ) {
4352  std::optional<translation> your_message = SNIPPET.random_from_category( "dogwhistle_message_you" );
4353  if( your_message ) {
4354  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, your_message.value().translated() );
4355  }
4356  }
4357 
4358  for( monster &critter : g->all_monsters() ) {
4359  if( critter.friendly != 0 && critter.has_flag( mon_flag_DOGFOOD ) ) {
4360  bool u_see = get_player_view().sees( critter );
4361  if( critter.has_effect( effect_docile ) ) {
4362  if( u_see ) {
4363  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s looks ready to attack." ), critter.name() );
4364  }
4365  critter.remove_effect( effect_docile );
4366  } else {
4367  if( u_see ) {
4368  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s goes docile." ), critter.name() );
4369  }
4370  critter.add_effect( effect_docile, 1_turns, true );
4371  }
4372  }
4373  }
4374  return 1;
4375 }
4376 
4377 std::optional<int> iuse::call_of_tindalos( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
4378 {
4379  map &here = get_map();
4380  for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( p->pos(), 12 ) ) {
4381  if( here.is_cornerfloor( dest ) ) {
4382  here.add_field( dest, fd_tindalos_rift, 3 );
4383  add_msg( m_info, _( "You hear a low-pitched echoing howl." ) );
4384  }
4385  }
4386  return 1;
4387 }
4388 
4389 std::optional<int> iuse::blood_draw( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
4390 {
4391  if( p->is_npc() ) {
4392  return std::nullopt; // No NPCs for now!
4393  }
4394  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
4395  return std::nullopt;
4396  }
4397  if( !it->empty() ) {
4398  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "That %s is full!" ), it->tname() );
4399  return std::nullopt;
4400  }
4401 
4402  item blood( "blood", calendar::turn );
4403  bool drew_blood = false;
4404  bool acid_blood = false;
4405  bool vampire = false;
4406  units::temperature blood_temp = units::from_kelvin( -1.0f ); //kelvins
4407  for( item &map_it : get_map().i_at( point( p->posx(), p->posy() ) ) ) {
4408  if( map_it.is_corpse() &&
4409  query_yn( _( "Draw blood from %s?" ),
4410  colorize( map_it.tname(), map_it.color_in_inventory() ) ) ) {
4411  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You drew blood from the %s" ), map_it.tname() );
4412  drew_blood = true;
4413  blood_temp = map_it.temperature;
4414 
4415  field_type_id bloodtype( map_it.get_mtype()->bloodType() );
4416  if( bloodtype.obj().has_acid ) {
4417  acid_blood = true;
4418  } else {
4419  blood.set_mtype( map_it.get_mtype() );
4420 
4421  for( const harvest_entry &entry : map_it.get_mtype()->harvest.obj() ) {
4422  if( entry.type == harvest_drop_blood ) {
4423  blood.convert( itype_id( entry.drop ) );
4424  break;
4425  }
4426  }
4427  }
4428  }
4429  }
4430 
4431  if( !drew_blood && query_yn( _( "Draw your own blood?" ) ) ) {
4432  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You drew your own blood" ) );
4433  drew_blood = true;
4434  blood_temp = units::from_celsius( 37 );
4435  if( p->has_trait( trait_ACIDBLOOD ) ) {
4436  acid_blood = true;
4437  }
4438  if( p->has_trait( trait_VAMPIRE ) ) {
4439  vampire = true;
4440  }
4441  // From wikipedia,
4442  // "To compare, this (volume of blood loss that causes death) is five to eight times
4443  // as much blood as people usually give in a blood donation.[2]"
4444  // This is half a TU, hence I'm setting it to 1/10th of a lethal exsanguination.
4445  p->vitamin_mod( vitamin_redcells, vitamin_redcells->min() / 10 );
4446  p->vitamin_mod( vitamin_blood, vitamin_blood->min() / 10 );
4447  p->mod_pain( 3 );
4448  }
4449 
4450  if( acid_blood ) {
4451  item acid( "blood_acid", calendar::turn );
4452  acid.set_item_temperature( blood_temp );
4453  it->put_in( acid, pocket_type::CONTAINER );
4454  if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
4455  if( it->inc_damage() ) {
4456  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "but acidic blood melts the %s, destroying it!" ),
4457  it->tname() );
4458  p->i_rem( it );
4459  return 0;
4460  }
4461  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "but acidic blood damages the %s!" ), it->tname() );
4462  }
4463  }
4464 
4465  if( vampire ) {
4466  p->vitamin_mod( vitamin_human_blood_vitamin, -500 );
4467  }
4468 
4469  if( !drew_blood ) {
4470  return std::nullopt;;
4471  }
4472 
4473  blood.set_item_temperature( blood_temp );
4474  it->put_in( blood, pocket_type::CONTAINER );
4475  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 5_seconds ) );
4476  return 1;
4477 }
4478 
4479 void iuse::cut_log_into_planks( Character &p )
4480 {
4481  if( p.cant_do_mounted() ) {
4482  return;
4483  }
4484  const int moves = to_moves<int>( 20_minutes );
4485  p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You cut the log into planks." ) );
4486 
4487  p.assign_activity( chop_planks_activity_actor( moves ) );
4488  p.activity.placement = get_map().getglobal( p.pos() );
4489 }
4490 
4491 std::optional<int> iuse::lumber( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
4492 {
4493  if( !p ) {
4494  debugmsg( "%s called action lumber that requires character but no character is present",
4495  it->typeId().str() );
4496  return std::nullopt;
4497  }
4498  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
4499  return std::nullopt;
4500  }
4501  map &here = get_map();
4502  // Check if player is standing on any lumber
4503  for( item &i : here.i_at( p->pos() ) ) {
4504  if( i.typeId() == itype_log ) {
4505  here.i_rem( p->pos(), &i );
4506  cut_log_into_planks( *p );
4507  return 1;
4508  }
4509  }
4510 
4511  // If the player is not standing on a log, check inventory
4512  avatar *you = p->as_avatar();
4513  item_location loc;
4514  auto filter = []( const item & it ) {
4515  return it.typeId() == itype_log;
4516  };
4517  if( you != nullptr ) {
4518  loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( filter, *you, _( "Cut up what?" ) );
4519  }
4520 
4521  if( !loc ) {
4522  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't have that item!" ) );
4523  return std::nullopt;
4524  }
4525  p->i_rem( &*loc );
4526  cut_log_into_planks( *p );
4527  return 1;
4528 }
4529 
4530 static int chop_moves( Character *p, item *it )
4531 {
4532  // quality of tool
4533  const int quality = it->get_quality( qual_AXE );
4534 
4535  // attribute; regular tools - based on STR, powered tools - based on DEX
4536  const int attr = it->has_flag( flag_POWERED ) ? p->dex_cur : p->get_arm_str();
4537 
4538  int moves = to_moves<int>( time_duration::from_minutes( 60 - attr ) / std::pow( 2, quality - 1 ) );
4539  const int helpersize = p->get_num_crafting_helpers( 3 );
4540  moves *= ( 1.0f - ( helpersize / 10.0f ) );
4541  return moves;
4542 }
4543 
4544 std::optional<int> iuse::chop_tree( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
4545 {
4546  if( !p ) {
4547  debugmsg( "%s called action chop_tree that requires character but no character is present",
4548  it->typeId().str() );
4549  return std::nullopt;
4550  }
4551  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
4552  return std::nullopt;
4553  }
4554  map &here = get_map();
4555  const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> f = [&here, p]( const tripoint & pnt ) {
4556  if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
4557  return false;
4558  }
4559  return here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_TREE, pnt );
4560  };
4561 
4562  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight(
4563  _( "Chop down which tree?" ), _( "There is no tree to chop down nearby." ), f, false );
4564  if( !pnt_ ) {
4565  return std::nullopt;
4566  }
4567  const tripoint &pnt = *pnt_;
4568  if( !f( pnt ) ) {
4569  if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
4570  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You're not stern enough to shave yourself with THIS." ) );
4571  } else {
4572  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't chop down that." ) );
4573  }
4574  return std::nullopt;
4575  }
4576  int moves = chop_moves( p, it );
4577  const std::vector<Character *> helpers = p->get_crafting_helpers();
4578  for( std::size_t i = 0; i < helpers.size() && i < 3; i++ ) {
4579  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s helps with this task" ), helpers[i]->get_name() );
4580  }
4581  p->assign_activity( chop_tree_activity_actor( moves, item_location( *p, it ) ) );
4582  p->activity.placement = here.getglobal( pnt );
4583 
4584  return 1;
4585 }
4586 
4587 std::optional<int> iuse::chop_logs( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
4588 {
4589  if( !p ) {
4590  debugmsg( "%s called action chop_logs that requires character but no character is present",
4591  it->typeId().str() );
4592  return std::nullopt;
4593  }
4594  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
4595  return std::nullopt;
4596  }
4597 
4598  const std::set<ter_str_id> allowed_ter_id {
4599  ter_t_trunk,
4600  ter_t_stump
4601  };
4602  map &here = get_map();
4603  const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> f = [&allowed_ter_id, &here]( const tripoint & pnt ) {
4604  const ter_id type = here.ter( pnt );
4605  const bool is_allowed_terrain = allowed_ter_id.find( type.id() ) != allowed_ter_id.end();
4606  return is_allowed_terrain;
4607  };
4608 
4609  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight(
4610  _( "Chop which tree trunk?" ), _( "There is no tree trunk to chop nearby." ), f, false );
4611  if( !pnt_ ) {
4612  return std::nullopt;
4613  }
4614  const tripoint &pnt = *pnt_;
4615  if( !f( pnt ) ) {
4616  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't chop that." ) );
4617  return std::nullopt;
4618  }
4619 
4620  int moves = chop_moves( p, it );
4621  const std::vector<Character *> helpers = p->get_crafting_helpers();
4622  for( std::size_t i = 0; i < helpers.size() && i < 3; i++ ) {
4623  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s helps with this task" ), helpers[i]->get_name() );
4624  }
4625  p->assign_activity( chop_logs_activity_actor( moves, item_location( *p, it ) ) );
4626  p->activity.placement = here.getglobal( pnt );
4627 
4628  return 1;
4629 }
4630 
4631 std::optional<int> iuse::oxytorch( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
4632 {
4633  if( p->is_npc() ) {
4634  // Long action
4635  return std::nullopt;
4636  }
4637  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
4638  return std::nullopt;
4639  }
4640  if( !p->has_quality( qual_GLARE, 1 ) ) {
4641  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need welding goggles to do that." ) );
4642  return std::nullopt;
4643  }
4644 
4645  map &here = get_map();
4646  const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> f =
4647  [&here, p]( const tripoint & pnt ) {
4648  if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
4649  return false;
4650  } else if( here.has_furn( pnt ) ) {
4651  return here.furn( pnt )->oxytorch->valid();
4652  } else if( !here.ter( pnt )->is_null() ) {
4653  return here.ter( pnt )->oxytorch->valid();
4654  }
4655  return false;
4656  };
4657 
4658  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight(
4659  _( "Cut up metal where?" ), _( "There is no metal to cut up nearby." ), f, false );
4660  if( !pnt_ ) {
4661  return std::nullopt;
4662  }
4663  const tripoint &pnt = *pnt_;
4664  if( !f( pnt ) ) {
4665  if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
4666  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Yuck. Acetylene gas smells weird." ) );
4667  } else {
4668  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't cut that." ) );
4669  }
4670  return std::nullopt;
4671  }
4672 
4673  p->assign_activity( oxytorch_activity_actor( pnt, item_location{*p, it} ) );
4674 
4675  return std::nullopt;
4676 }
4677 
4678 std::optional<int> iuse::hacksaw( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &it_pnt )
4679 {
4680  if( !p ) {
4681  debugmsg( "%s called action hacksaw that requires character but no character is present",
4682  it->typeId().str() );
4683  return std::nullopt;
4684  }
4685  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
4686  return std::nullopt;
4687  }
4688 
4689  map &here = get_map();
4690  const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> f =
4691  [&here, p]( const tripoint & pnt ) {
4692  if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
4693  return false;
4694  } else if( here.has_furn( pnt ) ) {
4695  return here.furn( pnt )->hacksaw->valid();
4696  } else if( !here.ter( pnt )->is_null() ) {
4697  return here.ter( pnt )->hacksaw->valid();
4698  }
4699  return false;
4700  };
4701 
4702  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight(
4703  _( "Cut up metal where?" ), _( "There is no metal to cut up nearby." ), f, false );
4704  if( !pnt_ ) {
4705  return std::nullopt;
4706  }
4707  const tripoint &pnt = *pnt_;
4708  if( !f( pnt ) ) {
4709  if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
4710  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Why would you do that?" ) );
