4711  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You're not even chained to a boiler." ) );
4712  } else {
4713  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't cut that." ) );
4714  }
4715  return std::nullopt;
4716  }
4717  if( p->pos() == it_pnt ) {
4718  p->assign_activity( hacksaw_activity_actor( pnt, item_location{ *p, it } ) );
4719  } else {
4720  p->assign_activity( hacksaw_activity_actor( pnt, it->typeId(), it_pnt ) );
4721  }
4722 
4723  return std::nullopt;
4724 }
4725 
4726 std::optional<int> iuse::boltcutters( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
4727 {
4728  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
4729  return std::nullopt;
4730  }
4731 
4732  map &here = get_map();
4733  const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> f =
4734  [&here, p]( const tripoint & pnt ) {
4735  if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
4736  return false;
4737  } else if( here.has_furn( pnt ) ) {
4738  return here.furn( pnt )->boltcut->valid();
4739  } else if( !here.ter( pnt )->is_null() ) {
4740  return here.ter( pnt )->boltcut->valid();
4741  }
4742  return false;
4743  };
4744 
4745  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight(
4746  _( "Cut up metal where?" ), _( "There is no metal to cut up nearby." ), f, false );
4747  if( !pnt_ ) {
4748  return std::nullopt;
4749  }
4750  const tripoint &pnt = *pnt_;
4751  if( !f( pnt ) ) {
4752  if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
4753  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
4754  _( "You neatly sever all of the veins and arteries in your body. Oh, wait; never mind." ) );
4755  } else {
4756  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't cut that." ) );
4757  }
4758  return std::nullopt;
4759  }
4760 
4761  p->assign_activity( boltcutting_activity_actor( pnt, item_location{*p, it} ) );
4762  return std::nullopt;
4763 }
4764 
4765 std::optional<int> iuse::mop( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
4766 {
4767  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
4768  return std::nullopt;
4769  }
4770  map &here = get_map();
4771  const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> f = [&here]( const tripoint & pnt ) {
4772  // TODO: fix point types
4773  return here.terrain_moppable( tripoint_bub_ms( pnt ) );
4774  };
4775 
4776  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight(
4777  _( "Mop where?" ), _( "There is nothing to mop nearby." ), f, false );
4778  if( !pnt_ ) {
4779  return std::nullopt;
4780  }
4781  // TODO: fix point types
4782  const tripoint_bub_ms pnt( *pnt_ );
4783  // TODO: fix point types
4784  if( !f( pnt.raw() ) ) {
4785  if( pnt == p->pos_bub() ) {
4786  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You mop yourself up." ) );
4787  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The universe implodes and reforms around you." ) );
4788  } else {
4789  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "There's nothing to mop there." ) );
4790  }
4791  return std::nullopt;
4792  }
4793  if( p->is_blind() ) {
4794  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You move the mop around, unsure whether it's doing any good." ) );
4795  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * 0.15 );
4796  if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
4797  here.mop_spills( pnt );
4798  }
4799  } else if( here.mop_spills( pnt ) ) {
4800  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You mop up the spill." ) );
4801  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * 0.15 );
4802  } else {
4803  return std::nullopt;
4804  }
4805  return 1;
4806 }
4807 
4808 std::optional<int> iuse::spray_can( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
4809 {
4810  const std::optional<tripoint> dest_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Spray where?" ) );
4811  if( !dest_ ) {
4812  return std::nullopt;
4813  }
4814  return handle_ground_graffiti( *p, it, _( "Spray what?" ), dest_.value() );
4815 }
4816 
4817 std::optional<int> iuse::handle_ground_graffiti( Character &p, item *it, const std::string &prefix,
4818  const tripoint &where )
4819 {
4820  map &here = get_map();
4821  string_input_popup popup;
4822  std::string message = popup
4823  .description( prefix + " " + _( "(To delete, clear the text and confirm)" ) )
4824  .text( here.has_graffiti_at( where ) ? here.graffiti_at( where ) : std::string() )
4825  .identifier( "graffiti" )
4826  .query_string();
4827  if( popup.canceled() ) {
4828  return std::nullopt;
4829  }
4830 
4831  bool grave = here.ter( where ) == ter_t_grave_new;
4832  int move_cost;
4833  if( message.empty() ) {
4834  if( here.has_graffiti_at( where ) ) {
4835  move_cost = 3 * here.graffiti_at( where ).length();
4836  here.delete_graffiti( where );
4837  if( grave ) {
4838  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You blur the inscription on the grave." ) );
4839  } else {
4840  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You manage to get rid of the message on the surface." ) );
4841  }
4842  } else {
4843  return std::nullopt;
4844  }
4845  } else {
4846  here.set_graffiti( where, message );
4847  if( grave ) {
4848  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You carve an inscription on the grave." ) );
4849  } else {
4850  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You write a message on the surface." ) );
4851  }
4852  move_cost = 2 * message.length();
4853  }
4854  p.mod_moves( -move_cost );
4855  if( it != nullptr ) {
4856  return 1;
4857  } else {
4858  return 0;
4859  }
4860 }
4861 
4862 /**
4863  * Heats up a food item.
4864  * @return 1 if an item was heated, false if nothing was heated.
4865  */
4866 static bool heat_item( Character &p )
4867 {
4868  item_location loc = g->inv_map_splice( []( const item_location & itm ) {
4869  return itm->has_temperature() && !itm->has_own_flag( flag_HOT ) &&
4870  ( !itm->made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID ) ||
4871  itm.where() == item_location::type::container ||
4872  get_map().has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_LIQUIDCONT, itm.position() ) );
4873  }, _( "Heat up what?" ), 1, _( "You don't have any appropriate food to heat up." ) );
4874 
4875  item *heat = loc.get_item();
4876  if( heat == nullptr ) {
4877  add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
4878  return false;
4879  }
4880  // simulates heat capacity of food, more weight = longer heating time
4881  // this is x2 to simulate larger delta temperature of frozen food in relation to
4882  // heating non-frozen food (x1); no real life physics here, only approximations
4883  int duration = to_turns<int>( time_duration::from_seconds( to_gram( heat->weight() ) ) ) * 10;
4884  if( heat->has_own_flag( flag_FROZEN ) && !heat->has_flag( flag_EATEN_COLD ) ) {
4885  duration *= 2;
4886  }
4887  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You start heating up the food." ) );
4888  p.assign_activity( ACT_HEATING, duration );
4889  p.activity.targets.emplace_back( p, heat );
4890  return true;
4891 }
4892 
4893 std::optional<int> iuse::heatpack( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
4894 {
4895  if( heat_item( *p ) ) {
4896  it->convert( itype_heatpack_used, p );
4897  }
4898  return 0;
4899 }
4900 
4901 std::optional<int> iuse::heat_food( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
4902 {
4903  if( get_map().has_nearby_fire( p->pos() ) ) {
4904  heat_item( *p );
4905  return 0;
4906  } else if( p->has_active_bionic( bio_tools ) && p->get_power_level() > 10_kJ &&
4907  query_yn( _( "There is no fire around; use your integrated toolset instead?" ) ) ) {
4908  if( heat_item( *p ) ) {
4909  p->mod_power_level( -10_kJ );
4910  return 0;
4911  }
4912  } else {
4913  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
4914  _( "You need to be next to a fire to heat something up with the %s." ),
4915  it->tname() );
4916  }
4917  return std::nullopt;
4918 }
4919 
4920 std::optional<int> iuse::hotplate( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
4921 {
4922  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
4923  return std::nullopt;
4924  }
4925  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
4926  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The %s's batteries are dead." ), it->tname() );
4927  return std::nullopt;
4928  }
4929 
4930  if( heat_item( *p ) ) {
4931  return 1;
4932  }
4933  return std::nullopt;
4934 }
4935 
4936 std::optional<int> iuse::hotplate_atomic( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
4937 {
4938  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
4939  return std::nullopt;
4940  }
4941  if( it->typeId() == itype_atomic_coffeepot ) {
4942  heat_item( *p );
4943  }
4944 
4945  return std::nullopt;
4946 }
4947 
4948 std::optional<int> iuse::towel( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
4949 {
4950  return towel_common( p, it, false );
4951 }
4952 
4953 int iuse::towel_common( Character *p, item *it, bool )
4954 {
4955  if( !p ) {
4956  debugmsg( "%s called action towel that requires character but no character is present",
4957  it->typeId().str() );
4958  return 0;
4959  }
4960  bool slime = p->has_effect( effect_slimed );
4961  bool boom = p->has_effect( effect_boomered );
4962  bool glow = p->has_effect( effect_glowing );
4963  int mult = slime + boom + glow; // cleaning off more than one at once makes it take longer
4964  bool towelUsed = false;
4965  const std::string name = it ? it->tname() : _( "towel" );
4966 
4967  // can't use an already wet towel!
4968  if( it && it->is_filthy() ) {
4969  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "That %s is too filthy to clean anything!" ),
4970  it->tname() );
4971  } else if( it && it->has_flag( flag_WET ) ) {
4972  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "That %s is too wet to soak up any more liquid!" ),
4973  it->tname() );
4974  // clean off the messes first, more important
4975  } else if( slime || boom || glow ) {
4976  p->remove_effect( effect_slimed ); // able to clean off all at once
4977  p->remove_effect( effect_boomered );
4978  p->remove_effect( effect_glowing );
4979  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You use the %s to clean yourself off, saturating it with slime!" ),
4980  name );
4981 
4982  towelUsed = true;
4983  if( it && it->typeId() == itype_towel ) {
4984  it->set_flag( flag_FILTHY );
4985  }
4986 
4987  // dry off from being wet
4988  } else if( p->has_atleast_one_wet_part() ) {
4989  p->rem_morale( MORALE_WET );
4990  p->set_all_parts_wetness( 0 );
4991  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You use the %s to dry off, saturating it with water!" ),
4992  name );
4993 
4994  towelUsed = true;
4995  if( it && it->typeId() == itype_towel ) {
4996  it->item_counter = to_turns<int>( 30_minutes );
4997  // change "towel" to a "towel_wet" (different flavor text/color)
4998  it->convert( itype_towel_wet, p );
4999  }
5000 
5001  // default message
5002  } else {
5003  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You are already dry; the %s does nothing." ), name );
5004  }
5005 
5006  // towel was used
5007  if( towelUsed ) {
5008  if( mult == 0 ) {
5009  mult = 1;
5010  }
5011  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * 0.5 * mult );
5012  if( it ) {
5013  // WET, active items have their timer decremented every turn
5014  it->set_flag( flag_WET );
5015  it->active = true;
5016  }
5017  }
5018  return it ? 1 : 0;
5019 }
5020 
5021 std::optional<int> iuse::unfold_generic( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
5022 {
5023  p->assign_activity( vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor( *it ) );
5024  p->i_rem( it );
5025  return 0;
5026 }
5027 
5028 std::optional<int> iuse::adrenaline_injector( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
5029 {
5030  if( p->is_npc() && p->get_effect_dur( effect_adrenaline ) >= 30_minutes ) {
5031  return std::nullopt;
5032  }
5033 
5034  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
5035  p->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You inject yourself with adrenaline." ),
5036  _( "<npcname> injects themselves with adrenaline." ) );
5037 
5038  item syringe( "syringe", it->birthday() );
5039  p->i_add( syringe );
5040  if( p->has_effect( effect_adrenaline ) ) {
5041  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your heart spasms!" ) );
5042  // Note: not the mod, the health
5043  p->mod_livestyle( -20 );
5044  }
5045 
5046  p->add_effect( effect_adrenaline, 20_minutes );
5047 
5048  return 1;
5049 }
5050 
5051 std::optional<int> iuse::jet_injector( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
5052 {
5053  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
5054  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The jet injector is empty." ) );
5055  return std::nullopt;
5056  } else {
5057  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You inject yourself with the jet injector." ) );
5058  // Intensity is 2 here because intensity = 1 is the comedown
5059  p->add_effect( effect_jetinjector, 20_minutes, false, 2 );
5060  p->mod_painkiller( 20 );
5061  p->mod_stim( 10 );
5062  p->healall( 20 );
5063  }
5064 
5065  if( p->has_effect( effect_jetinjector ) ) {
5066  if( p->get_effect_dur( effect_jetinjector ) > 20_minutes ) {
5067  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Your heart is beating alarmingly fast!" ) );
5068  }
5069  }
5070  return 1;
5071 }
5072 
5073 std::optional<int> iuse::stimpack( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
5074 {
5075  if( p->get_item_position( it ) >= -1 ) {
5076  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
5077  _( "You must wear the stimulant delivery system before you can activate it." ) );
5078  return std::nullopt;
5079  }
5080 
5081  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
5082  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The stimulant delivery system is empty." ) );
5083  return std::nullopt;
5084  } else {
5085  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You inject yourself with the stimulants." ) );
5086  // Intensity is 2 here because intensity = 1 is the comedown
5087  p->add_effect( effect_stimpack, 25_minutes, false, 2 );
5088  p->mod_painkiller( 2 );
5089  p->mod_stim( 20 );
5090  p->mod_sleepiness( -100 );
5091  p->set_stamina( p->get_stamina_max() );
5092  }
5093  return 1;
5094 }
5095 
5096 std::optional<int> iuse::radglove( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
5097 {
5098  if( p->get_item_position( it ) >= -1 ) {
5099  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
5100  _( "You must wear the radiation biomonitor before you can activate it." ) );
5101  return std::nullopt;
5102  } else if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
5103  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The radiation biomonitor needs batteries to function." ) );
5104  return std::nullopt;
5105  } else {
5106  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You activate your radiation biomonitor." ) );
5107  if( p->get_rad() >= 1 ) {
5108  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You are currently irradiated." ) );
5109  p->add_msg_player_or_say( m_info,
5110  _( "Your radiation level: %d mSv." ),
5111  _( "It says here that my radiation level is %d mSv." ),
5112  p->get_rad() );
5113  } else {
5114  p->add_msg_player_or_say( m_info,
5115  _( "You aren't currently irradiated." ),
5116  _( "It says I'm not irradiated." ) );
5117  }
5118  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Have a nice day!" ) );
5119  }
5120 
5121  return 1;
5122 }
5123 
5124 std::optional<int> iuse::talking_doll( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
5125 {
5126  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
5127  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The %s's batteries are dead." ), it->tname() );
5128  return std::nullopt;
5129  }
5130  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You press a button on the doll to make it talk." ) );
5131  const SpeechBubble speech = get_speech( it->typeId().str() );
5132 
5133  sounds::sound( p->pos(), speech.volume, sounds::sound_t::electronic_speech,
5134  speech.text.translated(), true, "speech", it->typeId().str() );
5135 
5136  return 1;
5137 }
5138 
5139 std::optional<int> iuse::gun_repair( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
5140 {
5141  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
5142  return std::nullopt;
5143  }
5144  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
5145  return std::nullopt;
5146  }
5147  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
5148  return std::nullopt;
5149  }
5150  /** @EFFECT_MECHANICS >1 allows gun repair */
5151  if( p->get_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) < 2 ) {
5152  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need a mechanics skill of 2 to use this repair kit." ) );
5153  return std::nullopt;
5154  }
5155  item_location loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( []( const item_location & loc ) {
5156  return loc->is_firearm() && !loc->has_flag( flag_NO_REPAIR );
5157  }, get_avatar(), _( "Select the firearm to repair:" ) );
5158  if( !loc ) {
5159  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't have that item!" ) );
5160  return std::nullopt;
5161  }
5162  return ::gun_repair( p, it, loc );
5163 }
5164 
5165 std::optional<int> gun_repair( Character *p, item *, item_location &loc )
5166 {
5167  item &fix = *loc;
5168  if( p->fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
5169  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't see to do that!" ) );
5170  return std::nullopt;
5171  }
5172  if( fix.damage() <= fix.degradation() ) {
5173  const char *msg = fix.damage_level() > 0 ?
5174  _( "You can't improve your %s any more, considering the degradation." ) :
5175  _( "You can't improve your %s any more this way." );
5176  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, msg, fix.tname() );
5177  return std::nullopt;
5178  }
5179  const std::string startdurability = fix.durability_indicator( true );
5180  sounds::sound( p->pos(), 8, sounds::sound_t::activity, "crunch", true, "tool", "repair_kit" );
5181  p->practice( skill_mechanics, 10 );
5182  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 20_seconds ) );
5183 
5184  fix.mod_damage( -itype::damage_scale );
5185 
5186  const std::string msg = fix.damage_level() == 0
5187  ? _( "You repair your %s completely! ( %s-> %s)" )
5188  : _( "You repair your %s! ( %s-> %s)" );
5189  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, msg, fix.tname( 1, false ), startdurability,
5190  fix.durability_indicator( true ) );
5191  return 1;
5192 }
5193 
5194 std::optional<int> iuse::gunmod_attach( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
5195 {
5196  if( !it || !it->is_gunmod() ) {
5197  debugmsg( "tried to attach non-gunmod" );
5198  return std::nullopt;
5199  }
5200 
5201  if( !p ) {
5202  return std::nullopt;
5203  }
5204 
5205  do {
5206  item_location loc = game_menus::inv::gun_to_modify( *p->as_character(), *it );
5207 
5208  if( !loc ) {
5209  add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
5210  return std::nullopt;
5211  }
5212 
5213  if( !loc->is_gunmod_compatible( *it ).success() ) {
5214  return std::nullopt;
5215  }
5216 
5217  const item mod_copy( *it );
5218  item modded_gun( *loc );
5219 
5220  modded_gun.put_in( mod_copy, pocket_type::MOD );
5221 
5222  if( !game_menus::inv::compare_items( *loc, modded_gun, _( "Attach modification?" ) ) ) {
5223  continue;
5224  }
5225 
5226  p->gunmod_add( *loc, *it );
5227  return 0;
5228  } while( true );
5229 }
5230 
5231 std::optional<int> iuse::toolmod_attach( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
5232 {
5233  if( !it || !it->is_toolmod() ) {
5234  debugmsg( "tried to attach non-toolmod" );
5235  return std::nullopt;
5236  }
5237 
5238  if( !p ) {
5239  return std::nullopt;
5240  }
5241 
5242  auto filter = [&it]( const item & e ) {
5243  // don't allow ups or bionic battery mods on a UPS or UPS-powered/bionic-powered tools
5244  if( ( it->has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) || it->has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) &&
5245  ( e.has_flag( flag_IS_UPS ) || e.has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) ||
5246  e.has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) ) {
5247  return false;
5248  }
5249 
5250  // can't mod non-tool, or a tool with existing mods, or a battery currently installed
5251  if( !e.is_tool() || !e.toolmods().empty() || e.magazine_current() ) {
5252  return false;
5253  }
5254 
5255  // can only attach to unmodified tools that use compatible ammo
5256  return std::any_of( it->type->mod->acceptable_ammo.begin(),
5257  it->type->mod->acceptable_ammo.end(), [&]( const ammotype & at ) {
5258  return e.type->tool->ammo_id.count( at );
5259  } );
5260  };
5261 
5262  item_location loc = g->inv_map_splice( filter, _( "Select tool to modify:" ), 1,
5263  _( "You don't have compatible tools." ) );
5264 
5265  if( !loc ) {
5266  add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
5267  return std::nullopt;
5268  }
5269 
5270  if( loc->ammo_remaining() ) {
5271  if( !p->unload( loc ) ) {
5272  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cancel unloading the tool." ) );
5273  return std::nullopt;
5274  }
5275  }
5276 
5277  p->toolmod_add( std::move( loc ), item_location( *p, it ) );
5278  return 0;
5279 }
5280 
5281 std::optional<int> iuse::bell( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
5282 {
5283  if( it->typeId() == itype_cow_bell ) {
5284  sounds::sound( p->pos(), 12, sounds::sound_t::music, _( "Clank! Clank!" ), true, "misc",
5285  "cow_bell" );
5286  if( !p->is_deaf() ) {
5287  auto cattle_level =
5288  p->mutation_category_level.find( mutation_category_CATTLE );
5289  const int cow_factor = 1 + ( cattle_level == p->mutation_category_level.end() ?
5290  0 : cattle_level->second );
5291  if( x_in_y( cow_factor, 1 + cow_factor ) ) {
5292  p->add_morale( MORALE_MUSIC, 1, std::min( cow_factor, 100 ) );
5293  }
5294  }
5295  } else {
5296  sounds::sound( p->pos(), 4, sounds::sound_t::music, _( "Ring! Ring!" ), true, "misc", "bell" );
5297  }
5298  return 1;
5299 }
5300 
5301 std::optional<int> iuse::seed( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
5302 {
5303  if( p->is_npc() ||
5304  query_yn( _( "Are you sure you want to eat the %s? You could plant it in a mound of dirt." ),
5305  colorize( it->tname(), it->color_in_inventory() ) ) ) {
5306  return 1; //This eats the seed object.
5307  }
5308  return std::nullopt;
5309 }
5310 
5311 bool iuse::robotcontrol_can_target( Character *p, const monster &m )
5312 {
5313  return !m.is_dead()
5314  && m.type->in_species( species_ROBOT )
5315  && m.friendly == 0
5316  && rl_dist( p->pos(), m.pos() ) <= 10;
5317 }
5318 
5319 std::optional<int> iuse::robotcontrol( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
5320 {
5321 
5322  bool isComputer = !it->has_flag( flag_MAGICAL );
5323  int choice = 0;
5324 
5325  if( isComputer ) {
5326  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
5327  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s's batteries are dead." ), it->tname() );
5328  return std::nullopt;
5329  }
5330 
5331  if( p->has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
5332  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't read a computer screen." ) );
5333  return std::nullopt;
5334  }
5335 
5336  if( p->has_flag( json_flag_HYPEROPIC ) && !p->worn_with_flag( flag_FIX_FARSIGHT ) &&
5337  !p->has_effect( effect_contacts ) && !p->has_effect( effect_transition_contacts ) &&
5338  !p->has_flag( json_flag_ENHANCED_VISION ) ) {
5339  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
5340  _( "You'll need to put on reading glasses before you can see the screen." ) );
5341  return std::nullopt;
5342  }
5343 
5344  choice = uilist( _( "Welcome to hackPRO!" ), {
5345  _( "Prepare IFF protocol override" ),
5346  _( "Set friendly robots to passive mode" ),
5347  _( "Set friendly robots to combat mode" )
5348  } );
5349  } else {
5350  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
5351  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s lacks charge to function." ), it->tname() );
5352  return std::nullopt;
5353  }
5354  choice = uilist( _( "You prepare to manipulate nearby robots!" ), {
5355  _( "Prepare IFF protocol override" ),
5356  _( "Set friendly robots to passive mode" ),
5357  _( "Set friendly robots to combat mode" )
5358  } );
5359  }
5360  switch( choice ) {
5361  case 0: { // attempt to make a robot friendly
5362  uilist pick_robot;
5363  pick_robot.text = _( "Choose an endpoint to hack." );
5364  // Build a list of all unfriendly robots in range.
5365  // TODO: change into vector<Creature*>
5366  std::vector< shared_ptr_fast< monster> > mons;
5367  std::vector< tripoint > locations;
5368  int entry_num = 0;
5369  for( const monster &candidate : g->all_monsters() ) {
5370  if( robotcontrol_can_target( p, candidate ) ) {
5371  mons.push_back( g->shared_from( candidate ) );
5372  pick_robot.addentry( entry_num++, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, candidate.name() );
5373  tripoint seen_loc;
5374  // Show locations of seen robots, center on player if robot is not seen
5375  if( p->sees( candidate ) ) {
5376  seen_loc = candidate.pos();
5377  } else {
5378  seen_loc = p->pos();
5379  }
5380  locations.push_back( seen_loc );
5381  }
5382  }
5383  if( mons.empty() ) {
5384  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "No enemy robots in range." ) );
5385  return 1;
5386  }
5387  pointmenu_cb callback( locations );
5388  pick_robot.callback = &callback;
5389  pick_robot.query();
5390  if( pick_robot.ret < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( pick_robot.ret ) >= mons.size() ) {
5391  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Never mind" ) );
5392  return 1;
5393  }
5394  const size_t mondex = pick_robot.ret;
5395  shared_ptr_fast< monster > z = mons[mondex];
5396  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You start reprogramming the %s into an ally." ), z->name() );
5397 
5398  /** @EFFECT_INT speeds up hacking preparation */
5399  /** @EFFECT_COMPUTER speeds up hacking preparation */
5400  int move_cost = std::max( 100,
5401  1000 - static_cast<int>( p->int_cur * 10 - p->get_skill_level( skill_computer ) * 10 ) );
5402  player_activity act( ACT_ROBOT_CONTROL, move_cost );
5403  act.monsters.emplace_back( z );
5404 
5405  p->assign_activity( act );
5406 
5407  return 1;
5408  }
5409  case 1: { //make all friendly robots stop their purposeless extermination of (un)life.
5410  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
5411  int f = 0; //flag to check if you have robotic allies
5412  for( monster &critter : g->all_monsters() ) {
5413  if( critter.friendly != 0 && critter.type->in_species( species_ROBOT ) ) {
5414  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "A following %s goes into passive mode." ),
5415  critter.name() );
5416  critter.add_effect( effect_docile, 1_turns, true );
5417  f = 1;
5418  }
5419  }
5420  if( f == 0 ) {
5421  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You aren't commanding any robots." ) );
5422  return std::nullopt;
5423  }
5424  return 1;
5425  }
5426  case 2: { //make all friendly robots terminate (un)life with extreme prejudice
5427  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
5428  int f = 0; //flag to check if you have robotic allies
5429  for( monster &critter : g->all_monsters() ) {
5430  if( critter.friendly != 0 && critter.has_flag( mon_flag_ELECTRONIC ) ) {
5431  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "A following %s goes into combat mode." ),
5432  critter.name() );
5433  critter.remove_effect( effect_docile );
5434  f = 1;
5435  }
5436  }
5437  if( f == 0 ) {
5438  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You aren't commanding any robots." ) );
5439  return std::nullopt;
5440  }
5441  return 1;
5442  }
5443  }
5444  return 0;
5445 }
5446 
5447 static int get_quality_from_string( const std::string_view s )
5448 {
5449  const ret_val<int> try_quality = try_parse_integer<int>( s, false );
5450  if( try_quality.success() ) {
5451  return try_quality.value();
5452  } else {
5453  debugmsg( "Error parsing photo quality: %s", try_quality.str() );
5454  return 0;
5455  }
5456 }
5457 
5458 static std::string photo_quality_name( const int index )
5459 {
5460  static const std::array<std::string, 6> names {
5461  {
5462  //~ photo quality adjective
5463  { translate_marker( "awful" ) }, { translate_marker( "bad" ) }, { translate_marker( "not bad" ) }, { translate_marker( "good" ) }, { translate_marker( "fine" ) }, { translate_marker( "exceptional" ) }
5464  }
5465  };
5466  return _( names[index] );
5467 }
5468 
5469 void item::extended_photo_def::deserialize( const JsonObject &obj )
5470 {
5471  quality = obj.get_int( "quality" );
5472  name = obj.get_string( "name" );
5473  description = obj.get_string( "description" );
5474 }
5475 
5476 void item::extended_photo_def::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5477 {
5478  jsout.start_object();
5479  jsout.member( "quality", quality );
5480  jsout.member( "name", name );
5481  jsout.member( "description", description );
5482  jsout.end_object();
5483 }
5484 
5485 std::optional<int> iuse::epic_music( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
5486 {
5487  if( !it->get_var( "EIPC_MUSIC_ON" ).empty() &&
5488  it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
5489 
5490  //the more varied music, the better max mood.
5491  const int songs = it->get_var( "EIPC_MUSIC", 0 );
5492  play_music( p, pos, 8, std::min( 25, songs ) );
5493  }
5494  return std::nullopt;
5495 }
5496 
5497 std::optional<int> iuse::einktabletpc( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
5498 {
5499 
5500  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
5501  return std::nullopt;
5502  } else if( !p->is_npc() ) {
5503 
5504  enum {
5505  ei_invalid, ei_photo, ei_music, ei_recipe, ei_uploaded_photos, ei_monsters, ei_download,
5506  };
5507 
5508  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
5509  return std::nullopt;
5510  }
5511  if( p->has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
5512  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't read a computer screen." ) );
5513  return std::nullopt;
5514  }
5515  if( p->has_flag( json_flag_HYPEROPIC ) && !p->worn_with_flag( flag_FIX_FARSIGHT ) &&
5516  !p->has_effect( effect_contacts ) && !p->has_effect( effect_transition_contacts ) &&
5517  !p->has_flag( json_flag_ENHANCED_VISION ) ) {
5518  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
5519  _( "You'll need to put on reading glasses before you can see the screen." ) );
5520  return std::nullopt;
5521  }
5522 
5523  if( !it->active ) {
5524  it->erase_var( "EIPC_MUSIC_ON" );
5525  }
5526  uilist amenu;
5527 
5528  amenu.text = _( "Choose menu option:" );
5529 
5530  const int photos = it->get_var( "EIPC_PHOTOS", 0 );
5531  if( photos > 0 ) {
5532  amenu.addentry( ei_photo, true, 'p', _( "Unsorted photos [%d]" ), photos );
5533  } else {
5534  amenu.addentry( ei_photo, false, 'p', _( "No photos on device" ) );
5535  }
5536 
5537  const int songs = it->get_var( "EIPC_MUSIC", 0 );
5538  if( songs > 0 ) {
5539  if( it->has_var( "EIPC_MUSIC_ON" ) ) {
5540  amenu.addentry( ei_music, true, 'm', _( "Turn music off" ) );
5541  } else {
5542  amenu.addentry( ei_music, true, 'm', _( "Turn music on [%d]" ), songs );
5543  }
5544  } else {
5545  amenu.addentry( ei_music, false, 'm', _( "No music on device" ) );
5546  }
5547 
5548  if( !it->get_saved_recipes().empty() ) {
5549  amenu.addentry( ei_recipe, true, 'r', _( "List stored recipes" ) );
5550  }
5551 
5552  if( !it->get_var( "EIPC_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" ).empty() ) {
5553  amenu.addentry( ei_uploaded_photos, true, 'l', _( "Your photos" ) );
5554  }
5555 
5556  if( !it->get_var( "EINK_MONSTER_PHOTOS" ).empty() ) {
5557  amenu.addentry( ei_monsters, true, 'y', _( "Your collection of monsters" ) );
5558  } else {
5559  amenu.addentry( ei_monsters, false, 'y', _( "Collection of monsters is empty" ) );
5560  }
5561 
5562  amenu.addentry( ei_download, true, 'w', _( "Download data from memory cards" ) );
5563  amenu.query();
5564 
5565  const int choice = amenu.ret;
5566 
5567  if( ei_photo == choice ) {
5568 
5569  const int photos = it->get_var( "EIPC_PHOTOS", 0 );
5570  const int viewed = std::min( photos, static_cast<int>( rng( 10, 30 ) ) );
5571  const int count = photos - viewed;
5572  if( count == 0 ) {
5573  it->erase_var( "EIPC_PHOTOS" );
5574  } else {
5575  it->set_var( "EIPC_PHOTOS", count );
5576  }
5577 
5578  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( rng( 3_seconds, 7_seconds ) ) );
5579 
5580  if( p->has_trait( trait_PSYCHOPATH ) ) {
5581  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Wasted time. These pictures do not provoke your senses." ) );
5582  } else {
5583  p->add_morale( MORALE_PHOTOS, rng( 15, 30 ), 100 );
5584  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, "%s",
5585  SNIPPET.random_from_category( "examine_photo_msg" ).value_or( translation() ) );
5586  }
5587 
5588  return 1;
5589  }
5590 
5591  if( ei_music == choice ) {
5592 
5593  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * 0.3 );
5594  // Turn on the screen before playing musics
5595  if( !it->active ) {
5596  if( it->is_transformable() ) {
5597  const use_function *readinglight = it->type->get_use( "transform" );
5598  if( readinglight ) {
5599  readinglight->call( p, *it, p->pos() );
5600  }
5601  }
5602  it->activate();
5603  }
5604  // If transformable we use transform action to turn off the device
5605  else if( !it->is_transformable() ) {
5606  it->deactivate();
5607  }
5608 
5609  if( it->has_var( "EIPC_MUSIC_ON" ) ) {
5610  it->erase_var( "EIPC_MUSIC_ON" );
5611 
5612  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You turned off the music on your %s." ), it->tname() );
5613  } else {
5614  it->set_var( "EIPC_MUSIC_ON", "1" );
5615  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You turned on the music on your %s." ), it->tname() );
5616  }
5617 
5618  return 1;
5619  }
5620 
5621  if( ei_recipe == choice ) {
5622  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * 0.5 );
5623 
5624  uilist rmenu;
5625  for( const recipe_id &rid : it->get_saved_recipes() ) {
5626  rmenu.addentry( 0, true, 0, rid->result_name( /* decorated = */ true ) );
5627  }
5628 
5629  rmenu.text = _( "List recipes:" );
5630  rmenu.query();
5631 
5632  return 1;
5633  }
5634 
5635  if( ei_uploaded_photos == choice ) {
5636  show_photo_selection( *p, *it, "EIPC_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" );
5637  return 1;
5638  }
5639 
5640  if( ei_monsters == choice ) {
5641 
5642  uilist pmenu;
5643 
5644  pmenu.text = _( "Your collection of monsters:" );
5645 
5646  std::vector<mtype_id> monster_photos;
5647 
5648  std::istringstream f( it->get_var( "EINK_MONSTER_PHOTOS" ) );
5649  std::string s;
5650  int k = 0;
5651  while( getline( f, s, ',' ) ) {
5652  if( s.empty() ) {
5653  continue;
5654  }
5655  monster_photos.emplace_back( s );
5656  std::string menu_str;
5657  const monster dummy( monster_photos.back() );
5658  menu_str = dummy.name();
5659  getline( f, s, ',' );
5660  const int quality = get_quality_from_string( s );
5661  menu_str += " [" + photo_quality_name( quality ) + "]";
5662  pmenu.addentry( k++, true, -1, menu_str.c_str() );
5663  }
5664 
5665  int choice;
5666  do {
5667  pmenu.query();
5668  choice = pmenu.ret;
5669 
5670  if( choice < 0 ) {
5671  break;
5672  }
5673 
5674  const monster dummy( monster_photos[choice] );
5675  popup( dummy.type->get_description() );
5676  } while( true );
5677  return 1;
5678  }
5679 
5680  if( ei_download == choice ) {
5681  if( !p->has_item( *it ) ) {
5682  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't have that item!" ) );
5683  return std::nullopt; // need posession of reader item for item_location to work right
5684  }
5685  if( !p->is_avatar() ) {
5686  return std::nullopt; // npc triggered iuse?
5687  }
5688  inventory_filter_preset preset( []( const item_location & it ) {
5689  return it->has_flag( flag_MC_HAS_DATA ) || it->type->memory_card_data;
5690  } );
5691  inventory_multiselector inv_s( *p, preset );
5692 
5693  inv_s.set_title( _( "Choose memory cards to download data from:" ) );
5694  inv_s.set_display_stats( true );
5695  inv_s.add_character_items( *p );
5696  inv_s.add_nearby_items( 1 );
5697 
5698  const std::list<std::pair<item_location, int>> locs = inv_s.execute();
5699  if( locs.empty() ) {
5700  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Nevermind." ) );
5701  return std::nullopt;
5702  }
5703  std::vector<item_location> targets;
5704  for( const auto& [item_loc, count] : locs ) {
5705  targets.emplace_back( item_loc );
5706  }
5707  const item_location reader( *p, it );
5708  const data_handling_activity_actor actor( reader, targets );
5709  p->assign_activity( player_activity( actor ) );
5710  }
5711  }
5712  return std::nullopt;
5713 }
5714 
5715 static std::string colorized_trap_name_at( const tripoint &point )
5716 {
5717  const trap &trap = get_map().tr_at( point );
5718  std::string name;
5719  if( trap.can_see( point, get_player_character() ) ) {
5720  name = colorize( trap.name(), trap.color ) + _( " on " );
5721  }
5722  return name;
5723 }
5724 
5725 static const std::unordered_map<description_affix, std::string> description_affixes = {
5726  { description_affix::DESCRIPTION_AFFIX_IN, translate_marker( " in %s" ) },
5727  { description_affix::DESCRIPTION_AFFIX_COVERED_IN, translate_marker( " covered in %s" ) },
5728  { description_affix::DESCRIPTION_AFFIX_ON, translate_marker( " on %s" ) },
5729  { description_affix::DESCRIPTION_AFFIX_UNDER, translate_marker( " under %s" ) },
5730  { description_affix::DESCRIPTION_AFFIX_ILLUMINATED_BY, translate_marker( " in %s" ) },
5731 };
5732 
5733 static std::string colorized_field_description_at( const tripoint &point )
5734 {
5735  std::string field_text;
5736  const field &field = get_map().field_at( point );
5737  const field_entry *entry = field.find_field( field.displayed_field_type() );
5738  if( entry ) {
5739  field_text = string_format( _( description_affixes.at( field.displayed_description_affix() ) ),
5740  colorize( entry->name(), entry->color() ) );
5741  }
5742  return field_text;
5743 }
5744 
5745 static std::string colorized_item_name( const item &item )
5746 {
5747  nc_color color = item.color_in_inventory();
5748  std::string damtext = item.damage() != 0 ? item.durability_indicator() : "";
5749  return damtext + colorize( item.tname( 1, false ), color );
5750 }
5751 
5752 static std::string colorized_item_description( const item &item )
5753 {
5754  std::vector<iteminfo> dummy;
5755  iteminfo_query query = iteminfo_query(
5756  std::vector<iteminfo_parts> {
5757  iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION,
5758  iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_NOTES,
5759  iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_CONTENTS
5760  } );
5761  return item.info( dummy, &query, 1 );
5762 }
5763 
5764 static item get_top_item_at_point( const tripoint &point,
5765  const units::volume &min_visible_volume )
5766 {
5767  map_stack items = get_map().i_at( point );
5768  // iterate from topmost item down to ground
5769  for( const item &it : items ) {
5770  if( it.volume() > min_visible_volume ) {
5771  // return top (or first big enough) item to the list
5772  return it;
5773  }
5774  }
5775  return item();
5776 }
5777 
5778 static std::string colorized_ter_name_flags_at( const tripoint &point,
5779  const std::vector<std::string> &flags, const std::vector<ter_str_id> &ter_whitelist )
5780 {
5781  map &here = get_map();
5782  const ter_id ter = here.ter( point );
5783  std::string name = colorize( ter->name(), ter->color() );
5784  const std::string &graffiti_message = here.graffiti_at( point );
5785 
5786  if( !graffiti_message.empty() ) {
5787  name += string_format( _( " with graffiti \"%s\"" ), graffiti_message );
5788  return name;
5789  }
5790  if( ter_whitelist.empty() && flags.empty() ) {
5791  return name;
5792  }
5793  if( !ter->open.is_null() || ( ter->has_examine( iexamine::none ) &&
5794  ter->has_examine( iexamine::fungus ) &&
5795  ter->has_examine( iexamine::water_source ) &&
5796  ter->has_examine( iexamine::dirtmound ) ) ) {
5797  return name;
5798  }
5799  for( const ter_str_id &ter_good : ter_whitelist ) {
5800  if( ter->id == ter_good ) {
5801  return name;
5802  }
5803  }
5804  for( const std::string &flag : flags ) {
5805  if( ter->has_flag( flag ) ) {
5806  return name;
5807  }
5808  }
5809 
5810  return std::string();
5811 }
5812 
5813 static std::string colorized_feature_description_at( const tripoint &center_point, bool &item_found,
5814  const units::volume &min_visible_volume )
5815 {
5816  item_found = false;
5817  map &here = get_map();
5818  const furn_id furn = here.furn( center_point );
5819  if( furn != furn_str_id::NULL_ID() && furn.is_valid() ) {
5820  std::string furn_str = colorize( furn->name(), c_yellow );
5821  std::string sign_message = here.get_signage( center_point );
5822  if( !sign_message.empty() ) {
5823  furn_str += string_format( _( " with message \"%s\"" ), sign_message );
5824  }
5825  if( !furn->has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_CONTAINER ) &&
5826  !furn->has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SEALED ) ) {
5827  const item item = get_top_item_at_point( center_point, min_visible_volume );
5828  if( !item.is_null() ) {
5829  furn_str += string_format( _( " with %s on it" ), colorized_item_name( item ) );
5830  item_found = true;
5831  }
5832  }
5833  return furn_str;
5834  }
5835  return std::string();
5836 }
5837 
5838 static std::string format_object_pair( const std::pair<std::string, int> &pair,
5839  const std::string &article )
5840 {
5841  if( pair.second == 1 ) {
5842  return article + pair.first;
5843  } else if( pair.second > 1 ) {
5844  return string_format( "%i %s", pair.second, pair.first );
5845  }
5846  return std::string();
5847 }
5848 static std::string format_object_pair_article( const std::pair<std::string, int> &pair )
5849 {
5850  return format_object_pair( pair, pgettext( "Article 'a', replace it with empty "
5851  "string if it is not used in language", "a " ) );
5852 }
5853 static std::string format_object_pair_no_article( const std::pair<std::string, int> &pair )
5854 {
5855  return format_object_pair( pair, "" );
5856 }
5857 
5858 static std::string effects_description_for_creature( Creature *const creature, std::string &pose,
5859  const std::string &pronoun_gender )
5860 {
5861  struct ef_con { // effect constraint
5862  translation status;
5863  translation pose;
5864  int intensity_lower_limit;
5865  ef_con( const translation &status, const translation &pose, int intensity_lower_limit ) :
5866  status( status ), pose( pose ), intensity_lower_limit( intensity_lower_limit ) {}
5867  ef_con( const translation &status, const translation &pose ) :
5868  status( status ), pose( pose ), intensity_lower_limit( 0 ) {}
5869  ef_con( const translation &status, int intensity_lower_limit ) :
5870  status( status ), intensity_lower_limit( intensity_lower_limit ) {}
5871  explicit ef_con( const translation &status ) :
5872  status( status ), intensity_lower_limit( 0 ) {}
5873  };
5874  static const std::unordered_map<efftype_id, ef_con> vec_effect_status = {
5875  { effect_onfire, ef_con( to_translation( " is on <color_red>fire</color>. " ) ) },
5876  { effect_bleed, ef_con( to_translation( " is <color_red>bleeding</color>. " ), 1 ) },
5877  { effect_happy, ef_con( to_translation( " looks <color_green>happy</color>. " ), 13 ) },
5878  { effect_downed, ef_con( translation(), to_translation( "downed" ) ) },
5879  { effect_in_pit, ef_con( translation(), to_translation( "stuck" ) ) },
5880  { effect_stunned, ef_con( to_translation( " is <color_blue>stunned</color>. " ) ) },
5881  { effect_dazed, ef_con( to_translation( " is <color_blue>dazed</color>. " ) ) },
5882  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-text-style): spaces required for concatenation
5883  { effect_beartrap, ef_con( to_translation( " is stuck in beartrap. " ) ) },
5884  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-text-style): spaces required for concatenation
5885  { effect_laserlocked, ef_con( to_translation( " have tiny <color_red>red dot</color> on body. " ) ) },
5886  { effect_boomered, ef_con( to_translation( " is covered in <color_magenta>bile</color>. " ) ) },
5887  { effect_glowing, ef_con( to_translation( " is covered in <color_yellow>glowing goo</color>. " ) ) },
5888  { effect_slimed, ef_con( to_translation( " is covered in <color_green>thick goo</color>. " ) ) },
5889  { effect_corroding, ef_con( to_translation( " is covered in <color_light_green>acid</color>. " ) ) },
5890  { effect_sap, ef_con( to_translation( " is coated in <color_brown>sap</color>. " ) ) },
5891  { effect_webbed, ef_con( to_translation( " is covered in <color_dark_gray>webs</color>. " ) ) },
5892  { effect_spores, ef_con( to_translation( " is covered in <color_green>spores</color>. " ), 1 ) },
5893  { effect_crushed, ef_con( to_translation( " lies under <color_dark_gray>collapsed debris</color>. " ), to_translation( "lies" ) ) },
5894  { effect_lack_sleep, ef_con( to_translation( " looks <color_dark_gray>very tired</color>. " ) ) },
5895  { effect_lying_down, ef_con( to_translation( " is <color_dark_blue>sleeping</color>. " ), to_translation( "lies" ) ) },
5896  { effect_sleep, ef_con( to_translation( " is <color_dark_blue>sleeping</color>. " ), to_translation( "lies" ) ) },
5897  { effect_haslight, ef_con( to_translation( " is <color_yellow>lit</color>. " ) ) },
5898  { effect_monster_saddled, ef_con( to_translation( " is <color_dark_gray>saddled</color>. " ) ) },
5899  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-text-style): spaces required for concatenation
5900  { effect_harnessed, ef_con( to_translation( " is being <color_dark_gray>harnessed</color> by a vehicle. " ) ) },
5901  { effect_monster_armor, ef_con( to_translation( " is <color_dark_gray>wearing armor</color>. " ) ) },
5902  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-text-style): spaces required for concatenation
5903  { effect_has_bag, ef_con( to_translation( " have <color_dark_gray>bag</color> attached. " ) ) },
5904  { effect_tied, ef_con( to_translation( " is <color_dark_gray>tied</color>. " ) ) },
5905  { effect_bouldering, ef_con( translation(), to_translation( "balancing" ) ) }
5906  };
5907 
5908  std::string figure_effects;
5909  if( creature ) {
5910  for( const auto &pair : vec_effect_status ) {
5911  if( creature->get_effect_int( pair.first ) > pair.second.intensity_lower_limit ) {
5912  if( !pair.second.status.empty() ) {
5913  figure_effects += pronoun_gender + pair.second.status;
5914  }
5915  if( !pair.second.pose.empty() ) {
5916  pose = pair.second.pose.translated();
5917  }
5918  }
5919  }
5920  if( creature->has_effect( effect_sad ) ) {
5921  int intensity = creature->get_effect_int( effect_sad );
5922  if( intensity > 500 && intensity <= 950 ) {
5923  figure_effects += pronoun_gender + pgettext( "Someone", " looks <color_blue>sad</color>. " );
5924  } else if( intensity > 950 ) {
5925  figure_effects += pronoun_gender + pgettext( "Someone", " looks <color_blue>depressed</color>. " );
5926  }
5927  }
5928  float pain = creature->get_pain() / 10.f;
5929  if( pain > 3 ) {
5930  figure_effects += pronoun_gender + pgettext( "Someone",
5931  " is writhing in <color_red>pain</color>. " );
5932  }
5933  if( creature->has_effect( effect_riding ) ) {
5934  pose = _( "rides" );
5935  monster *const mon = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( creature->pos(), false );
5936  figure_effects += pronoun_gender + string_format( _( " is riding %s. " ),
5937  colorize( mon->name(), c_light_blue ) );
5938  }
5939  if( creature->has_effect( effect_glowy_led ) ) {
5940  figure_effects += _( "A bionic LED is <color_yellow>glowing</color> softly. " );
5941  }
5942  }
5943  while( !figure_effects.empty() && figure_effects.back() == ' ' ) { // remove last spaces
5944  figure_effects.erase( figure_effects.end() - 1 );
5945  }
5946  return figure_effects;
5947 }
5948 
5949 struct object_names_collection {
5950  std::unordered_map<std::string, int>
5951  furniture,
5952  vehicles,
5953  items,
5954  terrain;
5955 
5956  std::string figure_text;
5957  std::string obj_nearby_text;
5958 };
5959 
5960 static object_names_collection enumerate_objects_around_point( const tripoint &point,
5961  const int radius, const tripoint &bounds_center_point, const int bounds_radius,
5962  const tripoint &camera_pos, const units::volume &min_visible_volume, bool create_figure_desc,
5963  std::unordered_set<tripoint> &ignored_points,
5964  std::unordered_set<const vehicle *> &vehicles_recorded )
5965 {
5966  map &here = get_map();
5967  const tripoint_range<tripoint> bounds =
5968  here.points_in_radius( bounds_center_point, bounds_radius );
5969  const tripoint_range<tripoint> points_in_radius = here.points_in_radius( point, radius );
5970  int dist = rl_dist( camera_pos, point );
5971 
5972  bool item_found = false;
5973  std::unordered_set<const vehicle *> local_vehicles_recorded( vehicles_recorded );
5974  object_names_collection ret_obj;
5975 
5976  std::string description_part_on_figure;
5977  std::string description_furniture_on_figure;
5978  std::string description_terrain_on_figure;
5979 
5980  // store objects in radius
5981  for( const tripoint &point_around_figure : points_in_radius ) {
5982  if( !bounds.is_point_inside( point_around_figure ) ||
5983  !here.sees( camera_pos, point_around_figure, dist + radius ) ||
5984  ( ignored_points.find( point_around_figure ) != ignored_points.end() &&
5985  !( point_around_figure == point && create_figure_desc ) ) ) {
5986  continue; // disallow photos with not visible objects
5987  }
5988  units::volume volume_to_search = point_around_figure == bounds_center_point ? 0_ml :
5989  min_visible_volume;
5990 
5991  std::string furn_desc = colorized_feature_description_at( point_around_figure, item_found,
5992  volume_to_search );
5993 
5994  const item item = get_top_item_at_point( point_around_figure, volume_to_search );
5995 
5996  const optional_vpart_position veh_part_pos = here.veh_at( point_around_figure );
5997  std::string unusual_ter_desc = colorized_ter_name_flags_at( point_around_figure,
5998  camera_ter_whitelist_flags,
5999  camera_ter_whitelist_types );
6000  std::string ter_desc = colorized_ter_name_flags_at( point_around_figure );
6001 
6002  const std::string trap_name = colorized_trap_name_at( point_around_figure );
6003  const std::string field_desc = colorized_field_description_at( point_around_figure );
6004 
6005  auto augment_description = [&]( std::string & desc ) {
6006  desc = str_cat( trap_name, desc, field_desc );
6007  };
6008 
6009  if( !furn_desc.empty() ) {
6010  augment_description( furn_desc );
6011  if( point == point_around_figure && create_figure_desc ) {
6012  description_furniture_on_figure = furn_desc;
6013  } else {
6014  ret_obj.furniture[ furn_desc ] ++;
6015  }
6016  } else if( veh_part_pos.has_value() ) {
6017  const vehicle &veh = veh_part_pos->vehicle();
6018  const std::string veh_name = colorize( veh.disp_name(), c_light_blue );
6019  const vehicle *veh_hash = &veh_part_pos->vehicle();
6020 
6021  if( local_vehicles_recorded.find( veh_hash ) == local_vehicles_recorded.end() &&
6022  point != point_around_figure ) {
6023  // new vehicle, point is not center
6024  ret_obj.vehicles[ veh_name ] ++;
6025  } else if( point == point_around_figure ) {
6026  // point is center
6027  //~ %1$s: vehicle part name, %2$s: vehicle name
6028  description_part_on_figure = string_format( pgettext( "vehicle part", "%1$s from %2$s" ),
6029  veh_part_pos.part_displayed()->part().name(), veh_name );
6030  if( ret_obj.vehicles.find( veh_name ) != ret_obj.vehicles.end() &&
6031  local_vehicles_recorded.find( veh_hash ) != local_vehicles_recorded.end() ) {
6032  // remove vehicle name only if we previously added THIS vehicle name (in case of same name)
6033  ret_obj.vehicles[ veh_name ] --;
6034  if( ret_obj.vehicles[ veh_name ] <= 0 ) {
6035  ret_obj.vehicles.erase( veh_name );
6036  }
6037  }
6038  }
6039  vehicles_recorded.insert( veh_hash );
6040  local_vehicles_recorded.insert( veh_hash );
6041  } else if( !item.is_null() ) {
6042  std::string item_name = colorized_item_name( item );
6043  augment_description( item_name );
6044  if( point == point_around_figure && create_figure_desc ) {
6045  //~ %1$s: terrain description, %2$s: item name
6046  description_terrain_on_figure = string_format( pgettext( "terrain and item", "%1$s with a %2$s" ),
6047  ter_desc, item_name );
6048  } else {
6049  ret_obj.items[ item_name ] ++;
6050  }
6051  } else if( !unusual_ter_desc.empty() ) {
6052  augment_description( unusual_ter_desc );
6053  if( point == point_around_figure && create_figure_desc ) {
6054  description_furniture_on_figure = unusual_ter_desc;
6055  } else {
6056  ret_obj.furniture[ unusual_ter_desc ] ++;
6057  }
6058  } else if( !ter_desc.empty() && ( !field_desc.empty() || !trap_name.empty() ) ) {
6059  augment_description( ter_desc );
6060  if( point == point_around_figure && create_figure_desc ) {
6061  description_terrain_on_figure = ter_desc;
6062  } else {
6063  ret_obj.terrain[ ter_desc ] ++;
6064  }
6065  } else {
6066  augment_description( ter_desc );
6067  if( point == point_around_figure && create_figure_desc ) {
6068  description_terrain_on_figure = ter_desc;
6069  }
6070  }
6071  ignored_points.insert( point_around_figure );
6072  }
6073 
6074  if( create_figure_desc ) {
6075  std::vector<std::string> objects_combined_desc;
6076  int objects_combined_num = 0;
6077  std::array<std::unordered_map<std::string, int>, 4> vecs_to_retrieve = {
6078  ret_obj.furniture, ret_obj.vehicles, ret_obj.items, ret_obj.terrain
6079  };
6080 
6081  for( int i = 0; i < 4; i++ ) {
6082  for( const auto &p : vecs_to_retrieve[ i ] ) {
6083  objects_combined_desc.push_back( i == 1 ? // vehicle name already includes "the"
6084  format_object_pair_no_article( p ) : format_object_pair_article( p ) );
6085  objects_combined_num += p.second;
6086  }
6087  }
6088 
6089  const char *transl_str = pgettext( "someone stands/sits *on* something", " on a %s." );
6090  if( !description_part_on_figure.empty() ) {
6091  ret_obj.figure_text = string_format( transl_str, description_part_on_figure );
6092  } else {
6093  if( !description_furniture_on_figure.empty() ) {
6094  ret_obj.figure_text = string_format( transl_str, description_furniture_on_figure );
6095  } else {
6096  ret_obj.figure_text = string_format( transl_str, description_terrain_on_figure );
6097  }
6098  }
6099  if( !objects_combined_desc.empty() ) {
6100  // store objects to description_figures_status
6101  std::string objects_text = enumerate_as_string( objects_combined_desc );
6102  ret_obj.obj_nearby_text = string_format( n_gettext( "Nearby is %s.", "Nearby are %s.",
6103  objects_combined_num ), objects_text );
6104  }
6105  }
6106  return ret_obj;
6107 }
6108 
6109 static item::extended_photo_def photo_def_for_camera_point( const tripoint &aim_point,
6110  const tripoint &camera_pos,
6111  std::vector<monster *> &monster_vec, std::vector<Character *> &character_vec )
6112 {
6113  // look for big items on top of stacks in the background for the selfie description
6114  const units::volume min_visible_volume = 490_ml;
6115 
6116  std::unordered_set<tripoint> ignored_points;
6117  std::unordered_set<const vehicle *> vehicles_recorded;
6118 
6119  std::unordered_map<std::string, std::string> description_figures_appearance;
6120  std::vector<std::pair<std::string, std::string>> description_figures_status;
6121 
6122  std::string timestamp = to_string( time_point( calendar::turn ) );
6123  int dist = rl_dist( camera_pos, aim_point );
6124  map &here = get_map();
6125  const tripoint_range<tripoint> bounds = here.points_in_radius( aim_point, 2 );
6126  item::extended_photo_def photo;
6127  bool need_store_weather = false;
6128  int outside_tiles_num = 0;
6129  int total_tiles_num = 0;
6130 
6131  const auto map_deincrement_or_erase = []( std::unordered_map<std::string, int> &obj_map,
6132  const std::string & key ) {
6133  if( obj_map.find( key ) != obj_map.end() ) {
6134  obj_map[ key ] --;
6135  if( obj_map[ key ] <= 0 ) {
6136  obj_map.erase( key );
6137  }
6138  }
6139  };
6140 
6141  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
6142  // first scan for critters and mark nearby furniture, vehicles and items
6143  for( const tripoint &current : bounds ) {
6144  if( !here.sees( camera_pos, current, dist + 3 ) ) {
6145  continue; // disallow photos with non-visible objects
6146  }
6147  monster *const mon = creatures.creature_at<monster>( current, false );
6148  Character *guy = creatures.creature_at<Character>( current );
6149 
6150  total_tiles_num++;
6151  if( here.is_outside( current ) ) {
6152  need_store_weather = true;
6153  outside_tiles_num++;
6154  }
6155 
6156  if( guy || mon ) {
6157  std::string figure_appearance;
6158  std::string figure_name;
6159  std::string pose;
6160  std::string pronoun_gender;
6161  std::string figure_effects;
6162  Creature *creature;
6163  if( mon && mon->has_effect( effect_ridden ) ) {
6164  // only player can ride, see monexamine::mount_pet
6165  guy = &get_avatar();
6166  description_figures_appearance[ mon->name() ] = "\"" + mon->type->get_description() + "\"";
6167  }
6168 
6169  if( guy ) {
6170  if( guy->is_hallucination() ) {
6171  continue; // do not include hallucinations
6172  }
6173  if( guy->is_crouching() ) {
6174  pose = _( "sits" );
6175  } else {
6176  pose = _( "stands" );
6177  }
6178  const std::vector<std::string> vec = guy->short_description_parts();
6179  figure_appearance = string_join( vec, "\n\n" );
6180  figure_name = guy->get_name();
6181  pronoun_gender = guy->male ? _( "He" ) : _( "She" );
6182  creature = guy;
6183  character_vec.push_back( guy );
6184  } else {
6185  if( mon->is_hallucination() || mon->type->in_species( species_HALLUCINATION ) ) {
6186  continue; // do not include hallucinations
6187  }
6188  pose = _( "stands" );
6189  figure_appearance = "\"" + mon->type->get_description() + "\"";
6190  figure_name = mon->name();
6191  pronoun_gender = pgettext( "Pronoun", "It" );
6192  creature = mon;
6193  monster_vec.push_back( mon );
6194  }
6195 
6196  figure_effects = effects_description_for_creature( creature, pose, pronoun_gender );
6197  description_figures_appearance[ figure_name ] = figure_appearance;
6198 
6199  object_names_collection obj_collection = enumerate_objects_around_point( current, 1, aim_point, 2,
6200  camera_pos, min_visible_volume, true,
6201  ignored_points, vehicles_recorded );
6202  std::string figure_text = pose + obj_collection.figure_text;
6203 
6204  if( !figure_effects.empty() ) {
6205  figure_text += " " + figure_effects;
6206  }
6207  if( !obj_collection.obj_nearby_text.empty() ) {
6208  figure_text += " " + obj_collection.obj_nearby_text;
6209  }
6210  auto name_text_pair = std::pair<std::string, std::string>( figure_name, figure_text );
6211  if( current == aim_point ) {
6212  description_figures_status.insert( description_figures_status.begin(), name_text_pair );
6213  } else {
6214  description_figures_status.push_back( name_text_pair );
6215  }
6216  }
6217  }
6218 
6219  // scan for everything NOT near critters
6220  object_names_collection obj_coll = enumerate_objects_around_point( aim_point, 2, aim_point, 2,
6221  camera_pos, min_visible_volume, false,
6222  ignored_points, vehicles_recorded );
6223 
6224  std::string photo_text = _( "This is a photo of " );
6225 
6226  bool found_item_aim_point;
6227  std::string furn_desc = colorized_feature_description_at( aim_point, found_item_aim_point,
6228  0_ml );
6229  const item item = get_top_item_at_point( aim_point, 0_ml );
6230  const std::string trap_name = colorized_trap_name_at( aim_point );
6231  std::string ter_name = colorized_ter_name_flags_at( aim_point, {}, {} );
6232  const std::string field_desc = colorized_field_description_at( aim_point );
6233 
6234  bool found_vehicle_aim_point = here.veh_at( aim_point ).has_value();
6235  bool found_furniture_aim_point = !furn_desc.empty();
6236  // colorized_feature_description_at do not update flag if no furniture found, so need to check again
6237  if( !found_furniture_aim_point ) {
6238  found_item_aim_point = !item.is_null();
6239  }
6240 
6241  const ter_id ter_aim = here.ter( aim_point );
6242  const furn_id furn_aim = here.furn( aim_point );
6243 
6244  if( !description_figures_status.empty() ) {
6245  std::string names = enumerate_as_string( description_figures_status.begin(),
6246  description_figures_status.end(),
6247  []( const std::pair<std::string, std::string> &it ) {
6248  return colorize( it.first, c_light_blue );
6249  } );
6250 
6251  photo.name = names;
6252  photo_text += names + ".";
6253 
6254  for( const auto &figure_status : description_figures_status ) {
6255  photo_text += "\n\n" + colorize( figure_status.first, c_light_blue )
6256  + " " + figure_status.second;
6257  }
6258  } else if( found_vehicle_aim_point ) {
6259  const optional_vpart_position veh_part_pos = here.veh_at( aim_point );
6260  const std::string veh_name = colorize( veh_part_pos->vehicle().disp_name(), c_light_blue );
6261  photo.name = veh_name;
6262  photo_text += veh_name + ".";
6263  map_deincrement_or_erase( obj_coll.vehicles, veh_name );
6264  } else if( found_furniture_aim_point || found_item_aim_point ) {
6265  std::string item_name = colorized_item_name( item );
6266  if( found_furniture_aim_point ) {
6267  furn_desc = trap_name + furn_desc + field_desc;
6268  photo.name = furn_desc;
6269  photo_text += photo.name + ".";
6270  map_deincrement_or_erase( obj_coll.furniture, furn_desc );
6271  } else if( found_item_aim_point ) {
6272  item_name = trap_name + item_name + field_desc;
6273  photo.name = item_name;
6274  photo_text += item_name + ". " + string_format( _( "It lies on the %s." ),
6275  ter_name );
6276  map_deincrement_or_erase( obj_coll.items, item_name );
6277  }
6278  if( found_furniture_aim_point && !furn_aim->description.empty() ) {
6279  photo_text += "\n\n" + colorize( furn_aim->name(), c_yellow ) + ":\n" + furn_aim->description;
6280  }
6281  if( found_item_aim_point ) {
6282  photo_text += "\n\n" + item_name + ":\n" + colorized_item_description( item );
6283  }
6284  } else {
6285  ter_name = trap_name + ter_name + field_desc;
6286  photo.name = ter_name;
6287  photo_text += photo.name + ".";
6288  map_deincrement_or_erase( obj_coll.terrain, ter_name );
6289  map_deincrement_or_erase( obj_coll.furniture, ter_name );
6290 
6291  if( !ter_aim->description.empty() ) {
6292  photo_text += "\n\n" + photo.name + ":\n" + ter_aim->description;
6293  }
6294  }
6295 
6296  auto num_of = []( const std::unordered_map<std::string, int> &m ) -> int {
6297  int ret = 0;
6298  for( const auto &it : m )
6299  {
6300  ret += it.second;
6301  }
6302  return ret;
6303  };
6304 
6305  if( !obj_coll.items.empty() ) {
6306  std::string obj_list = enumerate_as_string( obj_coll.items.begin(), obj_coll.items.end(),
6307  format_object_pair_article );
6308  photo_text += "\n\n" + string_format( n_gettext( "There is something lying on the ground: %s.",
6309  "There are some things lying on the ground: %s.", num_of( obj_coll.items ) ),
6310  obj_list );
6311  }
6312  if( !obj_coll.furniture.empty() ) {
6313  std::string obj_list = enumerate_as_string( obj_coll.furniture.begin(), obj_coll.furniture.end(),
6314  format_object_pair_article );
6315  photo_text += "\n\n" + string_format( n_gettext( "Something is visible in the background: %s.",
6316  "Some objects are visible in the background: %s.", num_of( obj_coll.furniture ) ),
6317  obj_list );
6318  }
6319  if( !obj_coll.vehicles.empty() ) {
6320  std::string obj_list = enumerate_as_string( obj_coll.vehicles.begin(), obj_coll.vehicles.end(),
6321  format_object_pair_no_article );
6322  photo_text += "\n\n" + string_format( n_gettext( "There is %s parked in the background.",
6323  "There are %s parked in the background.", num_of( obj_coll.vehicles ) ),
6324  obj_list );
6325  }
6326  if( !obj_coll.terrain.empty() ) {
6327  std::string obj_list = enumerate_as_string( obj_coll.terrain.begin(), obj_coll.terrain.end(),
6328  format_object_pair_article );
6329  photo_text += "\n\n" + string_format( n_gettext( "There is %s in the background.",
6330  "There are %s in the background.", num_of( obj_coll.terrain ) ),
6331  obj_list );
6332  }
6333 
6334  // TODO: fix point types
6335  const oter_id &cur_ter =
6336  overmap_buffer.ter( tripoint_abs_omt( ms_to_omt_copy( here.getabs( aim_point ) ) ) );
6337  std::string overmap_desc = string_format( _( "In the background you can see a %s." ),
6338  colorize( cur_ter->get_name(), cur_ter->get_color() ) );
6339  if( outside_tiles_num == total_tiles_num ) {
6340  photo_text += _( "\n\nThis photo was taken <color_dark_gray>outside</color>." );
6341  } else if( outside_tiles_num == 0 ) {
6342  photo_text += _( "\n\nThis photo was taken <color_dark_gray>inside</color>." );
6343  overmap_desc += _( " interior" );
6344  } else if( outside_tiles_num < total_tiles_num / 2.0 ) {
6345  photo_text += _( "\n\nThis photo was taken mostly <color_dark_gray>inside</color>,"
6346  " but <color_dark_gray>outside</color> can be seen." );
6347  overmap_desc += _( " interior" );
6348  } else if( outside_tiles_num >= total_tiles_num / 2.0 ) {
6349  photo_text += _( "\n\nThis photo was taken mostly <color_dark_gray>outside</color>,"
6350  " but <color_dark_gray>inside</color> can be seen." );
6351  }
6352  photo_text += "\n" + overmap_desc + ".";
6353 
6354  if( get_map().get_abs_sub().z() >= 0 && need_store_weather ) {
6355  photo_text += "\n\n";
6356  if( is_dawn( calendar::turn ) ) {
6357  photo_text += _( "It is <color_yellow>sunrise</color>. " );
6358  } else if( is_dusk( calendar::turn ) ) {
6359  photo_text += _( "It is <color_light_red>sunset</color>. " );
6360  } else if( is_night( calendar::turn ) ) {
6361  photo_text += _( "It is <color_dark_gray>night</color>. " );
6362  } else {
6363  photo_text += _( "It is day. " );
6364  }
6365  photo_text += string_format( _( "The weather is %s." ), colorize( get_weather().weather_id->name,
6366  get_weather().weather_id->color ) );
6367  }
6368 
6369  for( const auto &figure : description_figures_appearance ) {
6370  photo_text += "\n\n" + string_format( _( "%s appearance:" ),
6371  colorize( figure.first, c_light_blue ) ) + "\n" + figure.second;
6372  }
6373 
6374  photo_text += "\n\n" + string_format( pgettext( "Date", "The photo was taken on %s." ),
6375  colorize( timestamp, c_light_blue ) );
6376 
6377  photo.description = photo_text;
6378 
6379  return photo;
6380 }
6381 
6382 static void item_save_monsters( Character &p, item &it, const std::vector<monster *> &monster_vec,
6383  const int photo_quality )
6384 {
6385  std::string monster_photos = it.get_var( "CAMERA_MONSTER_PHOTOS" );
6386  if( monster_photos.empty() ) {
6387  monster_photos = ",";
6388  }
6389 
6390  for( monster * const &monster_p : monster_vec ) {
6391  const std::string mtype = monster_p->type->id.str();
6392  const std::string name = monster_p->name();
6393 
6394  // position of <monster type string>
6395  const size_t mon_str_pos = monster_photos.find( "," + mtype + "," );
6396 
6397  // monster gets recorded by the character, add to known types
6398  p.set_knows_creature_type( monster_p->type->id );
6399 
6400  if( mon_str_pos == std::string::npos ) { // new monster
6401  monster_photos += string_format( "%s,%d,", mtype, photo_quality );
6402  } else { // replace quality character, if new photo is better
6403  const size_t quality_num_pos = mon_str_pos + mtype.size() + 2;
6404  const size_t next_comma = monster_photos.find( ',', quality_num_pos );
6405  const int old_quality =
6406  get_quality_from_string( monster_photos.substr( quality_num_pos, next_comma - quality_num_pos ) );
6407 
6408  if( photo_quality > old_quality ) {
6409  const std::string quality_s = string_format( "%d", photo_quality );
6410  cata_assert( quality_s.size() == 1 );
6411  monster_photos[quality_num_pos] = quality_s.front();
6412  }
6413  if( !p.is_blind() ) {
6414  if( photo_quality > old_quality ) {
6415  p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The quality of %s image is better than the previous one." ),
6416  colorize( name, c_light_blue ) );
6417  } else if( old_quality == 5 ) {
6418  p.add_msg_if_player( _( "The quality of the stored %s image is already maximally detailed." ),
6419  colorize( name, c_light_blue ) );
6420  } else {
6421  p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "But the quality of %s image is worse than the previous one." ),
6422  colorize( name, c_light_blue ) );
6423  }
6424  }
6425  }
6426  }
6427  it.set_var( "CAMERA_MONSTER_PHOTOS", monster_photos );
6428 }
6429 
6430 // throws exception
6431 bool item::read_extended_photos( std::vector<extended_photo_def> &extended_photos,
6432  const std::string &var_name, bool insert_at_begin ) const
6433 {
6434  bool result = false;
6435  std::optional<JsonValue> json_opt = json_loader::from_string_opt( get_var( var_name ) );
6436  if( !json_opt.has_value() ) {
6437  return result;
6438  }
6439  JsonValue &json = *json_opt;
6440  if( insert_at_begin ) {
6441  std::vector<extended_photo_def> temp_vec;
6442  result = json.read( temp_vec );
6443  extended_photos.insert( std::begin( extended_photos ), std::begin( temp_vec ),
6444  std::end( temp_vec ) );
6445  } else {
6446  result = json.read( extended_photos );
6447  }
6448  return result;
6449 }
6450 
6451 // throws exception
6452 void item::write_extended_photos( const std::vector<extended_photo_def> &extended_photos,
6453  const std::string &var_name )
6454 {
6455  std::ostringstream extended_photos_data;
6456  JsonOut json( extended_photos_data );
6457  json.write( extended_photos );
6458  set_var( var_name, extended_photos_data.str() );
6459 }
6460 
6461 static bool show_photo_selection( Character &p, item &it, const std::string &var_name )
6462 {
6463  if( p.is_blind() ) {
6464  p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't see the camera screen, you're blind." ) );
6465  return false;
6466  }
6467 
6468  uilist pmenu;
6469  pmenu.text = _( "Photos saved on camera:" );
6470 
6471  std::vector<std::string> descriptions;
6472  std::vector<item::extended_photo_def> extended_photos;
6473 
6474  try {
6475  it.read_extended_photos( extended_photos, var_name, false );
6476  } catch( const JsonError &e ) {
6477  debugmsg( "Error reading photos: %s", e.c_str() );
6478  }
6479  try { // if there is old photos format, append them; delete old and save new
6480  if( it.read_extended_photos( extended_photos, "CAMERA_NPC_PHOTOS", true ) ) {
6481  it.erase_var( "CAMERA_NPC_PHOTOS" );
6482  it.write_extended_photos( extended_photos, var_name );
6483  }
6484  } catch( const JsonError &e ) {
6485  debugmsg( "Error migrating old photo format: %s", e.c_str() );
6486  }
6487 
6488  int k = 0;
6489  for( const item::extended_photo_def &extended_photo : extended_photos ) {
6490  std::string menu_str = extended_photo.name;
6491 
6492  size_t index = menu_str.find( p.name );
6493  if( index != std::string::npos ) {
6494  menu_str.replace( index, p.name.length(), _( "You" ) );
6495  }
6496 
6497  descriptions.push_back( extended_photo.description );
6498  menu_str += " [" + photo_quality_name( extended_photo.quality ) + "]";
6499 
6500  pmenu.addentry( k++, true, -1, menu_str.c_str() );
6501  }
6502 
6503  int choice;
6504  do {
6505  pmenu.query();
6506  choice = pmenu.ret;
6507 
6508  if( choice < 0 ) {
6509  break;
6510  }
6511  popup( "%s", descriptions[choice].c_str() );
6512 
6513  } while( true );
6514  return true;
6515 }
6516 
6517 std::optional<int> iuse::camera( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
6518 {
6519  enum {c_shot, c_photos, c_monsters, c_upload};
6520 
6521  // From item processing
6522  if( !p ) {
6523  debugmsg( "%s called action camera that requires character but no character is present",
6524  it->typeId().str() );
6525  return std::nullopt;
6526  }
6527 
6528  // CAMERA_NPC_PHOTOS is old save variable
6529  bool found_extended_photos = !it->get_var( "CAMERA_NPC_PHOTOS" ).empty() ||
6530  !it->get_var( "CAMERA_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" ).empty();
6531  bool found_monster_photos = !it->get_var( "CAMERA_MONSTER_PHOTOS" ).empty();
6532 
6533  uilist amenu;
6534  amenu.text = _( "What to do with camera?" );
6535  amenu.addentry( c_shot, true, 't', _( "Take a photo" ) );
6536  if( !found_extended_photos && !found_monster_photos ) {
6537  amenu.addentry( c_photos, false, 'l', _( "No photos in memory" ) );
6538  } else {
6539  if( found_extended_photos ) {
6540  amenu.addentry( c_photos, true, 'l', _( "List photos" ) );
6541  }
6542  if( found_monster_photos ) {
6543  amenu.addentry( c_monsters, true, 'm', _( "Your collection of monsters" ) );
6544  }
6545  amenu.addentry( c_upload, true, 'u', _( "Upload photos to memory card" ) );
6546  }
6547 
6548  amenu.query();
6549  const int choice = amenu.ret;
6550 
6551  if( choice < 0 ) {
6552  return std::nullopt;
6553  }
6554 
6555  map &here = get_map();
6556  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
6557  if( c_shot == choice ) {
6558  const std::optional<tripoint> aim_point_ = g->look_around();
6559 
6560  if( !aim_point_ ) {
6561  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
6562  return std::nullopt;
6563  }
6564  tripoint aim_point = *aim_point_;
6565  bool incorrect_focus = false;
6566  tripoint_range<tripoint> aim_bounds = here.points_in_radius( aim_point, 2 );
6567 
6568  std::vector<tripoint> trajectory = line_to( p->pos(), aim_point, 0, 0 );
6569  trajectory.push_back( aim_point );
6570 
6571  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * 0.5 );
6572  sounds::sound( p->pos(), 8, sounds::sound_t::activity, _( "Click." ), true, "tool",
6573  "camera_shutter" );
6574 
6575  for( std::vector<tripoint>::iterator point_it = trajectory.begin();
6576  point_it != trajectory.end();
6577  ++point_it ) {
6578  const tripoint trajectory_point = *point_it;
6579  if( point_it != trajectory.end() ) {
6580  const tripoint next_point = *( point_it + 1 ); // Trajectory ends on last visible tile
6581  if( !here.sees( p->pos(), next_point, rl_dist( p->pos(), next_point ) + 3 ) ) {
6582  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You have the wrong camera focus." ) );
6583  incorrect_focus = true;
6584  // recalculate target point
6585  aim_point = trajectory_point;
6586  aim_bounds = here.points_in_radius( trajectory_point, 2 );
6587  }
6588  }
6589 
6590  monster *const mon = creatures.creature_at<monster>( trajectory_point, true );
6591  Character *const guy = creatures.creature_at<Character>( trajectory_point );
6592  if( mon || guy || trajectory_point == aim_point ) {
6593  int dist = rl_dist( p->pos(), trajectory_point );
6594 
6595  int camera_bonus = it->has_flag( flag_CAMERA_PRO ) ? 10 : 0;
6596  int photo_quality = 20 - rng( dist, dist * 2 ) * 2 + rng( camera_bonus / 2, camera_bonus );
6597  if( photo_quality > 5 ) {
6598  photo_quality = 5;
6599  }
6600  if( photo_quality < 0 ) {
6601  photo_quality = 0;
6602  }
6603  if( p->is_blind() ) {
6604  photo_quality /= 2;
6605  }
6606 
6607  if( mon ) {
6608  monster &z = *mon;
6609 
6610  // shoot past small monsters and hallucinations
6611  if( trajectory_point != aim_point && ( z.type->size <= creature_size::small ||
6612  z.is_hallucination() ||
6613  z.type->in_species( species_HALLUCINATION ) ) ) {
6614  continue;
6615  }
6616  if( !aim_bounds.is_point_inside( trajectory_point ) ) {
6617  // take a photo of the monster that's in the way
6618  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "A %s got in the way of your photo." ), z.name() );
6619  incorrect_focus = true;
6620  } else if( trajectory_point != aim_point ) { // shoot past mon that will be in photo anyway
6621  continue;
6622  }
6623  // get a special message if the target is a hallucination
6624  if( trajectory_point == aim_point && ( z.is_hallucination() ||
6625  z.type->in_species( species_HALLUCINATION ) ) ) {
6626  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Strange there's nothing in the center of this picture?" ) );
6627  }
6628  } else if( guy ) {
6629  if( trajectory_point == aim_point && guy->is_hallucination() ) {
6630  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Strange %s isn't visible on the picture?" ), guy->get_name() );
6631  } else if( !aim_bounds.is_point_inside( trajectory_point ) ) {
6632  // take a photo of the monster that's in the way
6633  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "%s got in the way of your photo." ), guy->get_name() );
6634  incorrect_focus = true;
6635  } else if( trajectory_point != aim_point ) { // shoot past guy that will be in photo anyway
6636  continue;
6637  }
6638  }
6639  if( incorrect_focus ) {
6640  photo_quality = photo_quality == 0 ? 0 : photo_quality - 1;
6641  }
6642 
6643  std::vector<item::extended_photo_def> extended_photos;
6644  std::vector<monster *> monster_vec;
6645  std::vector<Character *> character_vec;
6646  item::extended_photo_def photo = photo_def_for_camera_point( trajectory_point, p->pos(),
6647  monster_vec, character_vec );
6648  photo.quality = photo_quality;
6649 
6650  try {
6651  it->read_extended_photos( extended_photos, "CAMERA_EXTENDED_PHOTOS", false );
6652  extended_photos.push_back( photo );
6653  it->write_extended_photos( extended_photos, "CAMERA_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" );
6654  } catch( const JsonError &e ) {
6655  debugmsg( "Error when adding new photo (loaded photos = %i): %s", extended_photos.size(),
6656  e.c_str() );
6657  }
6658 
6659  const bool selfie = std::find( character_vec.begin(), character_vec.end(),
6660  p ) != character_vec.end();
6661 
6662  if( selfie ) {
6663  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You took a selfie." ) );
6664  } else {
6665  if( p->is_blind() ) {
6666  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You took a photo of %s." ), photo.name );
6667  } else {
6668  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You took a photo of %1$s. It is %2$s." ), photo.name,
6669  photo_quality_name( photo_quality ) );
6670  }
6671  std::vector<std::string> blinded_names;
6672  for( monster * const &monster_p : monster_vec ) {
6673  if( dist < 4 && one_in( dist + 2 ) && monster_p->has_flag( mon_flag_SEES ) ) {
6674  monster_p->add_effect( effect_blind, rng( 5_turns, 10_turns ) );
6675  blinded_names.push_back( monster_p->name() );
6676  }
6677  }
6678  for( Character * const &character_p : character_vec ) {
6679  if( dist < 4 && one_in( dist + 2 ) && !character_p->is_blind() ) {
6680  character_p->add_effect( effect_blind, rng( 5_turns, 10_turns ) );
6681  blinded_names.push_back( character_p->get_name() );
6682  }
6683  }
6684  if( !blinded_names.empty() ) {
6685  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "%s looks blinded." ), enumerate_as_string( blinded_names.begin(),
6686  blinded_names.end(), []( const std::string & it ) {
6687  return colorize( it, c_light_blue );
6688  } ) );
6689  }
6690  }
6691  if( !monster_vec.empty() ) {
6692  item_save_monsters( *p, *it, monster_vec, photo_quality );
6693  }
6694  return 1;
6695  }
6696  }
6697  return 1;
6698  }
6699 
6700  if( c_photos == choice ) {
6701  show_photo_selection( *p, *it, "CAMERA_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" );
6702  return 1;
6703  }
6704 
6705  if( c_monsters == choice ) {
6706  if( p->is_blind() ) {
6707  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't see the camera screen, you're blind." ) );
6708  return 0;
6709  }
6710  uilist pmenu;
6711 
6712  pmenu.text = _( "Your collection of monsters:" );
6713 
6714  std::vector<mtype_id> monster_photos;
6715  std::vector<std::string> descriptions;
6716 
6717  std::istringstream f_mon( it->get_var( "CAMERA_MONSTER_PHOTOS" ) );
6718  std::string s;
6719  int k = 0;
6720  while( getline( f_mon, s, ',' ) ) {
6721 
6722  if( s.empty() ) {
6723  continue;
6724  }
6725 
6726  monster_photos.emplace_back( s );
6727 
6728  std::string menu_str;
6729 
6730  const monster dummy( monster_photos.back() );
6731  menu_str = dummy.name();
6732  descriptions.push_back( dummy.type->get_description() );
6733 
6734  getline( f_mon, s, ',' );
6735  const int quality = get_quality_from_string( s );
6736 
6737  menu_str += " [" + photo_quality_name( quality ) + "]";
6738 
6739  pmenu.addentry( k++, true, -1, menu_str.c_str() );
6740  }
6741 
6742  int choice;
6743  do {
6744  pmenu.query();
6745  choice = pmenu.ret;
6746 
6747  if( choice < 0 ) {
6748  break;
6749  }
6750 
6751  popup( "%s", descriptions[choice].c_str() );
6752 
6753  } while( true );
6754 
6755  return 1;
6756  }
6757 
6758  if( c_upload == choice ) {
6759 
6760  if( p->is_blind() ) {
6761  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't see the camera screen, you're blind." ) );
6762  return std::nullopt;
6763  }
6764 
6765  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
6766 
6767  avatar *you = p->as_avatar();
6768  item_location loc;
6769  if( you != nullptr ) {
6770  loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( []( const item & it ) {
6771  return it.has_flag( flag_MC_MOBILE );
6772  }, *you, _( "Insert memory card" ) );
6773  }
6774  if( !loc ) {
6775  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't have that item!" ) );
6776  return 1;
6777  }
6778  item &mc = *loc;
6779 
6780  if( mc.has_flag( flag_MC_HAS_DATA ) ) {
6781  if( !query_yn( _( "Are you sure you want to clear the old data on the card?" ) ) ) {
6782  return 1;
6783  }
6784  }
6785 
6786  mc.convert( itype_memory_card );
6787  mc.clear_vars();
6788  mc.unset_flags();
6789  mc.set_flag( flag_MC_HAS_DATA );
6790 
6791  mc.set_var( "MC_MONSTER_PHOTOS", it->get_var( "CAMERA_MONSTER_PHOTOS" ) );
6792  mc.set_var( "MC_EXTENDED_PHOTOS", it->get_var( "CAMERA_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" ) );
6793  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
6794  _( "You upload your photos and monster collection to the memory card." ) );
6795 
6796  return 1;
6797  }
6798 
6799  return 1;
6800 }
6801 
6802 std::optional<int> iuse::ehandcuffs_tick( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
6803 {
6804 
6805  if( get_map().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, pos.xy() ) ) {
6806  it->unset_flag( flag_NO_UNWIELD );
6807  it->ammo_unset();
6808  it->active = false;
6809  add_msg( m_good, _( "%s automatically turned off!" ), it->tname() );
6810  return 1;
6811  }
6812 
6813  if( !p ) {
6814  // Active but not in use. Deactivate
