6815  sounds::sound( pos, 2, sounds::sound_t::combat, "Click.", true, "tools", "handcuffs" );
6816  it->unset_flag( flag_NO_UNWIELD );
6817  it->active = false;
6818  return 1;
6819  }
6820 
6821  if( it->charges == 0 ) {
6822  sounds::sound( pos, 2, sounds::sound_t::combat, "Click.", true, "tools", "handcuffs" );
6823  it->unset_flag( flag_NO_UNWIELD );
6824  it->active = false;
6825 
6826  if( p ) {
6827  add_msg( m_good, _( "%s on your wrists opened!" ), it->tname() );
6828  }
6829 
6830  return 1;
6831  }
6832 
6833  if( p->has_active_bionic( bio_shock ) && p->get_power_level() >= bio_shock->power_trigger &&
6834  one_in( 5 ) ) {
6835  p->mod_power_level( -bio_shock->power_trigger );
6836 
6837  it->unset_flag( flag_NO_UNWIELD );
6838  it->charges = 0;
6839  it->active = false;
6840  add_msg( m_good, _( "The %s crackle with electricity from your bionic, then come off your hands!" ),
6841  it->tname() );
6842 
6843  return 1;
6844  }
6845 
6846  if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
6847  sounds::sound( pos, 10, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "a police siren, whoop WHOOP." ), true,
6848  "environment", "police_siren" );
6849  }
6850 
6851  const point p2( it->get_var( "HANDCUFFS_X", 0 ), it->get_var( "HANDCUFFS_Y", 0 ) );
6852 
6853  if( ( it->ammo_remaining() > it->type->maximum_charges() - 1000 ) && ( p2.x != pos.x ||
6854  p2.y != pos.y ) ) {
6855 
6856  if( p->is_elec_immune() ) {
6857  if( one_in( 10 ) ) {
6858  add_msg( m_good, _( "The cuffs try to shock you, but you're protected from electricity." ) );
6859  }
6860  } else {
6861  add_msg( m_bad, _( "Ouch, the cuffs shock you!" ) );
6862 
6863  p->apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "arm_l" ), rng( 0, 2 ) );
6864  p->apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "arm_r" ), rng( 0, 2 ) );
6865  p->mod_pain( rng( 2, 5 ) );
6866 
6867  }
6868 
6869  it->charges -= 50;
6870  if( it->charges < 1 ) {
6871  it->charges = 1;
6872  }
6873 
6874  it->set_var( "HANDCUFFS_X", pos.x );
6875  it->set_var( "HANDCUFFS_Y", pos.y );
6876 
6877  return 1;
6878 
6879  }
6880 
6881  return 1;
6882 }
6883 
6884 std::optional<int> iuse::ehandcuffs( Character *, item *it, const tripoint & )
6885 {
6886  if( it->active ) {
6887  add_msg( _( "The %s are clamped tightly on your wrists. You can't take them off." ),
6888  it->tname() );
6889  } else {
6890  add_msg( _( "The %s have discharged and can be taken off." ), it->tname() );
6891  }
6892 
6893  return 1;
6894 }
6895 
6896 std::optional<int> iuse::afs_translocator( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
6897 {
6898  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
6899  return std::nullopt;
6900  }
6901 
6902  const std::optional<tripoint> dest_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Create buoy where?" ) );
6903  if( !dest_ ) {
6904  return std::nullopt;
6905  }
6906 
6907  tripoint dest = *dest_;
6908 
6909  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
6910 
6911  map &here = get_map();
6912  if( here.impassable( dest ) || here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NO_FLOOR, dest ) ||
6913  here.has_furn( dest ) ) {
6914  add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s, emits a short angry beep." ), it->tname() );
6915  return std::nullopt;
6916  } else {
6917  here.furn_set( dest, furn_f_translocator_buoy );
6918  add_msg( m_info, _( "Space warps momentarily as the %s is created." ),
6919  furn_f_translocator_buoy.obj().name() );
6920  return 1;
6921  }
6922 }
6923 
6924 std::optional<int> iuse::foodperson_voice( Character *, item *, const tripoint &pos )
6925 {
6926  if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
6927  const SpeechBubble &speech = get_speech( "foodperson_mask" );
6928  sounds::sound( pos, speech.volume, sounds::sound_t::alarm, speech.text.translated(), true, "speech",
6929  "foodperson_mask" );
6930  }
6931  return 0;
6932 }
6933 
6934 std::optional<int> iuse::foodperson( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
6935 {
6936  // Prevent crash if battery was somehow removed.
6937  if( !it->magazine_current() ) {
6938  return std::nullopt;
6939  }
6940 
6941  time_duration shift = time_duration::from_turns( it->magazine_current()->ammo_remaining() *
6942  it->type->tool->turns_per_charge );
6943 
6944  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your HUD lights-up: \"Your shift ends in %s\"." ),
6945  to_string( shift ) );
6946  return 0;
6947 }
6948 
6949 std::optional<int> iuse::radiocar( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
6950 {
6951  int choice = -1;
6952  item *bomb_it = it->get_item_with( []( const item & c ) {
6953  return c.has_flag( flag_RADIOCARITEM );
6954  } );
6955  if( bomb_it == nullptr ) {
6956  choice = uilist( _( "Using RC car:" ), {
6957  _( "Turn on" ), _( "Put a bomb to car" )
6958  } );
6959  } else {
6960  choice = uilist( _( "Using RC car:" ), {
6961  _( "Turn on" ), bomb_it->tname()
6962  } );
6963  }
6964  if( choice < 0 ) {
6965  return std::nullopt;
6966  }
6967 
6968  if( choice == 0 ) { //Turn car ON
6969  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
6970  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The RC car's batteries seem to be dead." ) );
6971  return std::nullopt;
6972  }
6973 
6974  it->convert( itype_radio_car_on, p ).active = true;
6975 
6976  p->add_msg_if_player(
6977  _( "You turned on your RC car; now place it on the ground, and use your radio control to play." ) );
6978 
6979  return 0;
6980  }
6981 
6982  if( choice == 1 ) {
6983 
6984  if( bomb_it == nullptr ) { //arming car with bomb
6985 
6986  avatar *you = p->as_avatar();
6987  item_location loc;
6988  if( you != nullptr ) {
6989  loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( []( const item & it ) {
6990  return it.has_flag( flag_RADIOCARITEM );
6991  }, *you, _( "Arm what?" ) );
6992  }
6993  if( !loc ) {
6994  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't have that item!" ) );
6995  return 0;
6996  }
6997  item &put = *loc;
6998 
6999  if( put.has_flag( flag_RADIOCARITEM ) && ( put.volume() <= 1250_ml ||
7000  ( put.weight() <= 2_kilogram ) ) ) {
7001  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 3_seconds ) );
7002  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You armed your RC car with %s." ),
7003  put.tname() );
7004  it->put_in( p->i_rem( &put ), pocket_type::CONTAINER );
7005  } else if( !put.has_flag( flag_RADIOCARITEM ) ) {
7006  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You want to arm your RC car with %s? But how?" ),
7007  put.tname() );
7008  } else {
7009  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s is too heavy or bulky for this RC car." ),
7010  put.tname() );
7011  }
7012  } else { // Disarm the car
7013  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
7014 
7015  p->inv->assign_empty_invlet( *bomb_it, *p, true ); // force getting an invlet.
7016  p->i_add( *bomb_it );
7017  it->remove_item( *bomb_it );
7018 
7019  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You disarmed your RC car." ) );
7020  }
7021  }
7022 
7023  return 1;
7024 }
7025 
7026 std::optional<int> iuse::radiocaron( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
7027 {
7028  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
7029  // Deactivate since other mode has an iuse too.
7030  it->convert( itype_radio_car, p ).active = false;
7031  return 0;
7032  }
7033 
7034  int choice = uilist( _( "What to do with your activated RC car?" ), {
7035  _( "Turn off" )
7036  } );
7037 
7038  if( choice < 0 ) {
7039  return 1;
7040  }
7041 
7042  if( choice == 0 ) {
7043  it->convert( itype_radio_car, p ).active = false;
7044 
7045  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You turned off your RC car." ) );
7046  return 1;
7047  }
7048 
7049  return 1;
7050 }
7051 
7052 static void sendRadioSignal( Character &p, const flag_id &signal )
7053 {
7054  map &here = get_map();
7055  for( const tripoint &loc : here.points_in_radius( p.pos(), 60 ) ) {
7056  for( item &it : here.i_at( loc ) ) {
7057  if( it.has_flag( flag_RADIO_ACTIVATION ) && it.has_flag( signal ) ) {
7058  sounds::sound( p.pos(), 6, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "beep" ), true, "misc", "beep" );
7059  if( it.has_flag( flag_RADIO_INVOKE_PROC ) ) {
7060  // Invoke to transform a radio-modded explosive into its active form
7061  // The item activation may have all kinds of requirements. Like requiring item to be wielded.
7062  // We do not care. Call item action directly without checking can_use.
7063  // Items where this can be a problem should not be radio moddable
7064  std::map<std::string, use_function> use_methods = it.type->use_methods;
7065  if( use_methods.find( "transform" ) != use_methods.end() ) {
7066  it.type->get_use( "transform" )->call( &p, it, loc );
7067  item_location itm_loc = item_location( map_cursor( loc ), &it );
7068  here.update_lum( itm_loc, true );
7069  } else {
7070  it.type->get_use( it.type->use_methods.begin()->first )->call( &p, it, loc );
7071  }
7072  }
7073  } else if( !it.empty_container() ) {
7074  item *itm = it.get_item_with( [&signal]( const item & c ) {
7075  return c.has_flag( signal );
7076  } );
7077 
7078  if( itm != nullptr ) {
7079  sounds::sound( p.pos(), 6, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "beep" ), true, "misc", "beep" );
7080  // Invoke to transform a radio-modded explosive into its active form
7081  if( itm->has_flag( flag_RADIO_INVOKE_PROC ) ) {
7082  itm->type->invoke( &p, *itm, loc );
7083  item_location itm_loc = item_location( map_cursor( loc ), itm );
7084  here.update_lum( itm_loc, true );
7085  }
7086  }
7087  }
7088  }
7089  }
7090 }
7091 
7092 std::optional<int> iuse::radiocontrol_tick( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
7093 {
7094  if( !p ) {
7095  // Player has dropped the controller
7096  avatar &player = get_avatar();
7097  it->active = false;
7098  player.remove_value( "remote_controlling" );
7099  return 1;
7100  }
7101  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
7102  it->active = false;
7103  p->remove_value( "remote_controlling" );
7104  } else if( p->get_value( "remote_controlling" ).empty() ) {
7105  it->active = false;
7106  }
7107 
7108  return 1;
7109 }
7110 
7111 std::optional<int> iuse::radiocontrol( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
7112 {
7113  const char *car_action = nullptr;
7114 
7115  if( !it->active ) {
7116  car_action = _( "Take control of RC car" );
7117  } else {
7118  car_action = _( "Stop controlling RC car" );
7119  }
7120 
7121  int choice = uilist( _( "What to do with the radio control?" ), {
7122  car_action,
7123  _( "Press red button" ), _( "Press blue button" ), _( "Press green button" )
7124  } );
7125 
7126  map &here = get_map();
7127  if( choice < 0 ) {
7128  return 0;
7129  } else if( choice == 0 ) {
7130  if( it->active ) {
7131  it->active = false;
7132  p->remove_value( "remote_controlling" );
7133  } else {
7134  std::list<std::pair<tripoint, item *>> rc_pairs = here.get_rc_items();
7135  tripoint rc_item_location = {999, 999, 999};
7136  // TODO: grab the closest car or similar?
7137  for( auto &rc_pairs_rc_pair : rc_pairs ) {
7138  if( rc_pairs_rc_pair.second->has_flag( flag_RADIOCAR ) &&
7139  rc_pairs_rc_pair.second->active ) {
7140  rc_item_location = rc_pairs_rc_pair.first;
7141  }
7142  }
7143  if( rc_item_location.x == 999 ) {
7144  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "No active RC cars on ground and in range." ) );
7145  return 1;
7146  } else {
7147  std::stringstream car_location_string;
7148  // Populate with the point and stash it.
7149  car_location_string << rc_item_location.x << ' ' <<
7150  rc_item_location.y << ' ' << rc_item_location.z;
7151  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You take control of the RC car." ) );
7152 
7153  p->set_value( "remote_controlling", car_location_string.str() );
7154  it->active = true;
7155  }
7156  }
7157  } else {
7158  const flag_id signal( "RADIOSIGNAL_" + std::to_string( choice ) );
7159 
7160  if( p->cache_has_item_with( flag_BOMB, [&p, &signal]( const item & it ) {
7161  if( it.has_flag( flag_RADIO_ACTIVATION ) && it.has_flag( signal ) ) {
7162  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
7163  _( "The %s in your inventory would explode on this signal. Place it down before sending the signal." ),
7164  it.display_name() );
7165  return true;
7166  }
7167  return false;
7168  } ) ) {
7169  return std::nullopt;
7170  }
7171 
7172  if( p->cache_has_item_with( flag_RADIO_CONTAINER, [&p, &signal]( const item & it ) {
7173  const item *rad_cont = it.get_item_with( [&signal]( const item & c ) {
7174  return c.has_flag( flag_BOMB ) && c.has_flag( signal );
7175  } );
7176  if( rad_cont != nullptr ) {
7177  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
7178  _( "The %1$s in your %2$s would explode on this signal. Place it down before sending the signal." ),
7179  rad_cont->display_name(), it.display_name() );
7180  return true;
7181  }
7182  return false;
7183  } ) ) {
7184  return std::nullopt;
7185  }
7186 
7187  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Click." ) );
7188  sendRadioSignal( *p, signal );
7189  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
7190  }
7191 
7192  return 1;
7193 }
7194 
7195 static bool hackveh( Character &p, item &it, vehicle &veh )
7196 {
7197  if( !veh.is_locked || !veh.has_security_working() ) {
7198  return true;
7199  }
7200  const bool advanced = !empty( veh.get_avail_parts( "REMOTE_CONTROLS" ) );
7201  if( advanced && veh.is_alarm_on ) {
7202  p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "This vehicle's security system has locked you out!" ) );
7203  return false;
7204  }
7205 
7206  /** @EFFECT_INT increases chance of bypassing vehicle security system */
7207 
7208  /** @EFFECT_COMPUTER increases chance of bypassing vehicle security system */
7209  int roll = dice( round( p.get_skill_level( skill_computer ) ) + 2,
7210  p.int_cur ) - ( advanced ? 50 : 25 );
7211  int effort = 0;
7212  bool success = false;
7213  if( roll < -20 ) { // Really bad rolls will trigger the alarm before you know it exists
7214  effort = 1;
7215  p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You trigger the alarm!" ) );
7216  veh.is_alarm_on = true;
7217  } else if( roll >= 20 ) { // Don't bother the player if it's trivial
7218  effort = 1;
7219  p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You quickly bypass the security system!" ) );
7220  success = true;
7221  }
7222 
7223  if( effort == 0 && !query_yn( _( "Try to hack this car's security system?" ) ) ) {
7224  // Scanning for security systems isn't free
7225  p.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
7226  it.charges -= 1;
7227  return false;
7228  }
7229 
7230  p.practice( skill_computer, advanced ? 10 : 3 );
7231  if( roll < -10 ) {
7232  effort = rng( 4, 8 );
7233  p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You waste some time, but fail to affect the security system." ) );
7234  } else if( roll < 0 ) {
7235  effort = 1;
7236  p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You fail to affect the security system." ) );
7237  } else if( roll < 20 ) {
7238  effort = rng( 2, 8 );
7239  p.add_msg_if_player( m_mixed,
7240  _( "You take some time, but manage to bypass the security system!" ) );
7241  success = true;
7242  }
7243 
7244  p.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( time_duration::from_seconds( effort ) ) );
7245  it.charges -= effort;
7246  if( success && advanced ) { // Unlock controls, but only if they're drive-by-wire
7247  veh.is_locked = false;
7248  }
7249  return success;
7250 }
7251 
7252 static vehicle *pickveh( const tripoint &center, bool advanced )
7253 {
7254  static const std::string ctrl = "CTRL_ELECTRONIC";
7255  static const std::string advctrl = "REMOTE_CONTROLS";
7256  uilist pmenu;
7257  pmenu.title = _( "Select vehicle to access" );
7258  std::vector< vehicle * > vehs;
7259 
7260  for( wrapped_vehicle &veh : get_map().get_vehicles() ) {
7261  vehicle *&v = veh.v;
7262  if( rl_dist( center, v->global_pos3() ) < 40 &&
7263  v->fuel_left( itype_battery ) > 0 &&
7264  ( !empty( v->get_avail_parts( advctrl ) ) ||
7265  ( !advanced && !empty( v->get_avail_parts( ctrl ) ) ) ) ) {
7266  vehs.push_back( v );
7267  }
7268  }
7269  std::vector<tripoint> locations;
7270  for( int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>( vehs.size() ); i++ ) {
7271  vehicle *veh = vehs[i];
7272  locations.push_back( veh->global_pos3() );
7273  pmenu.addentry( i, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, veh->name );
7274  }
7275 
7276  if( vehs.empty() ) {
7277  add_msg( m_bad, _( "No vehicle available." ) );
7278  return nullptr;
7279  }
7280  if( vehs.size() == 1 ) {
7281  return vehs[0];
7282  }
7283 
7284  pointmenu_cb callback( locations );
7285  pmenu.callback = &callback;
7286  pmenu.w_y_setup = 0;
7287  pmenu.query();
7288 
7289  if( pmenu.ret < 0 || pmenu.ret >= static_cast<int>( vehs.size() ) ) {
7290  return nullptr;
7291  } else {
7292  return vehs[pmenu.ret];
7293  }
7294 }
7295 
7296 std::optional<int> iuse::remoteveh_tick( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
7297 {
7298  vehicle *remote = g->remoteveh();
7299  bool stop = false;
7300  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
7301  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "The remote control's battery goes dead." ) );
7302  stop = true;
7303  } else if( remote == nullptr ) {
7304  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Lost contact with the vehicle." ) );
7305  stop = true;
7306  } else if( remote->fuel_left( itype_battery ) == 0 ) {
7307  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "The vehicle's battery died." ) );
7308  stop = true;
7309  }
7310  if( stop ) {
7311  it->active = false;
7312  g->setremoteveh( nullptr );
7313  }
7314 
7315  return 1;
7316 }
7317 
7318 std::optional<int> iuse::remoteveh( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
7319 {
7320  vehicle *remote = g->remoteveh();
7321 
7322  bool controlling = it->active && remote != nullptr;
7323  int choice = uilist( _( "What to do with the remote vehicle control:" ), {
7324  controlling ? _( "Stop controlling the vehicle." ) : _( "Take control of a vehicle." ),
7325  _( "Execute one vehicle action" )
7326  } );
7327 
7328  if( choice < 0 || choice > 1 ) {
7329  return std::nullopt;
7330  }
7331 
7332  if( choice == 0 && controlling ) {
7333  it->active = false;
7334  g->setremoteveh( nullptr );
7335  return 0;
7336  }
7337 
7338  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
7339  point p2( player_character.view_offset.xy() );
7340 
7341  vehicle *veh = pickveh( pos, choice == 0 );
7342 
7343  if( veh == nullptr ) {
7344  return std::nullopt;
7345  }
7346 
7347  if( !hackveh( *p, *it, *veh ) ) {
7348  return 0;
7349  }
7350 
7351  if( choice == 0 ) {
7352  if( p->has_trait( trait_WAYFARER ) ) {
7353  add_msg( m_info,
7354  _( "Despite using a controller, you still refuse to take control of this vehicle." ) );
7355  } else {
7356  it->active = true;
7357  g->setremoteveh( veh );
7358  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You take control of the vehicle." ) );
7359  if( !veh->engine_on ) {
7360  veh->start_engines();
7361  }
7362  }
7363  } else if( choice == 1 ) {
7364  const auto rctrl_parts = veh->get_avail_parts( "REMOTE_CONTROLS" );
7365  const auto electronics_parts = veh->get_avail_parts( "CTRL_ELECTRONIC" );
7366  // Revert to original behavior if we can't find remote controls.
7367  if( empty( rctrl_parts ) ) {
7368  veh->interact_with( electronics_parts.begin()->pos() );
7369  } else {
7370  veh->interact_with( rctrl_parts.begin()->pos() );
7371  }
7372  }
7373 
7374  player_character.view_offset.x = p2.x;
7375  player_character.view_offset.y = p2.y;
7376  return 1;
7377 }
7378 
7379 static bool multicooker_hallu( Character &p )
7380 {
7381  p.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
7382  const int random_hallu = rng( 1, 7 );
7383  switch( random_hallu ) {
7384 
7385  case 1:
7386  add_msg( m_info, _( "And when you gaze long into a screen, the screen also gazes into you." ) );
7387  return true;
7388 
7389  case 2:
7390  add_msg( m_bad, _( "The multi-cooker boiled your head!" ) );
7391  return true;
7392 
7393  case 3:
7394  add_msg( m_info, _( "The characters on the screen display an obscene joke. Strange humor." ) );
7395  return true;
7396 
7397  case 4:
7398  //~ Single-spaced & lowercase are intentional, conveying hurried speech-KA101
7399  add_msg( m_warning, _( "Are you sure?! the multi-cooker wants to poison your food!" ) );
7400  return true;
7401 
7402  case 5:
7403  add_msg( m_info,
7404  _( "The multi-cooker argues with you about the taste preferences. You don't want to deal with it." ) );
7405  return true;
7406 
7407  case 6:
7408  if( !one_in( 5 ) ) {
7409  add_msg( m_warning, _( "The multi-cooker runs away!" ) );
7410  if( monster *const m = g->place_critter_around( mon_hallu_multicooker, p.pos(), 1 ) ) {
7411  m->hallucination = true;
7412  m->add_effect( effect_run, 1_turns, true );
7413  }
7414  } else {
7415  p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You're surrounded by aggressive multi-cookers!" ) );
7416 
7417  for( const tripoint &pn : get_map().points_in_radius( p.pos(), 1 ) ) {
7418  if( monster *const m = g->place_critter_at( mon_hallu_multicooker, pn ) ) {
7419  m->hallucination = true;
7420  }
7421  }
7422  }
7423  return true;
7424 
7425  default:
7426  return false;
7427  }
7428 
7429 }
7430 
7431 std::optional<int> iuse::multicooker( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
7432 {
7433  static const int charges_to_start = 50;
7434  const int charge_buffer = 2;
7435 
7436  enum {
7437  mc_start, mc_stop, mc_take, mc_upgrade, mc_empty
7438  };
7439 
7440  if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
7441  return std::nullopt;
7442  }
7443 
7444  if( p->has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
7445  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
7446  _( "You can't read, and don't understand the screen or the buttons!" ) );
7447  return std::nullopt;
7448  }
7449 
7450  if( p->has_effect( effect_hallu ) || p->has_effect( effect_visuals ) ) {
7451  if( multicooker_hallu( *p ) ) {
7452  return 0;
7453  }
7454  }
7455 
7456  if( p->has_flag( json_flag_HYPEROPIC ) && !p->worn_with_flag( flag_FIX_FARSIGHT ) &&
7457  !p->has_effect( effect_contacts ) && !p->has_effect( effect_transition_contacts ) ) {
7458  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
7459  _( "You'll need to put on reading glasses before you can see the screen." ) );
7460  return std::nullopt;
7461  }
7462 
7463  uilist menu;
7464  menu.text = _( "Welcome to the RobotChef3000. Choose option:" );
7465 
7466  item *dish_it = it->get_item_with(
7467  []( const item & it ) {
7468  return !( it.is_toolmod() || it.is_magazine() );
7469  } );
7470 
7471  if( it->active ) {
7472  menu.addentry( mc_stop, true, 's', _( "Stop cooking" ) );
7473  } else {
7474  if( dish_it == nullptr ) {
7475  if( it->ammo_remaining( p, true ) < charges_to_start ) {
7476  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Batteries are low." ) );
7477  return 0;
7478  }
7479  menu.addentry( mc_start, true, 's', _( "Start cooking" ) );
7480 
7481  /** @EFFECT_ELECTRONICS >3 allows multicooker upgrade */
7482 
7483  /** @EFFECT_FABRICATION >3 allows multicooker upgrade */
7484  if( p->get_skill_level( skill_electronics ) >= 4 && p->get_skill_level( skill_fabrication ) >= 4 ) {
7485  const std::string upgr = it->get_var( "MULTI_COOK_UPGRADE" );
7486  if( upgr.empty() ) {
7487  menu.addentry( mc_upgrade, true, 'u', _( "Upgrade multi-cooker" ) );
7488  } else {
7489  if( upgr == "UPGRADE" ) {
7490  menu.addentry( mc_upgrade, false, 'u', _( "Multi-cooker already upgraded" ) );
7491  } else {
7492  menu.addentry( mc_upgrade, false, 'u', _( "Multi-cooker unable to upgrade" ) );
7493  }
7494  }
7495  }
7496  } else {
7497  // Something other than a recipe item might be stored in the pocket.
7498  if( dish_it->typeId().str() == it->get_var( "DISH" ) ) {
7499  menu.addentry( mc_take, true, 't', _( "Take out dish" ) );
7500  } else {
7501  menu.addentry( mc_empty, true, 't',
7502  _( "Obstruction detected. Please remove any items lodged in the multi-cooker." ) );
7503  }
7504  }
7505  }
7506 
7507  menu.query();
7508  int choice = menu.ret;
7509 
7510  if( choice < 0 ) {
7511  return std::nullopt;
7512  }
7513 
7514  if( mc_stop == choice ) {
7515  if( query_yn( _( "Really stop cooking?" ) ) ) {
7516  it->active = false;
7517  it->erase_var( "DISH" );
7518  it->erase_var( "COOKTIME" );
7519  it->erase_var( "RECIPE" );
7520  it->convert( itype_multi_cooker, p );
7521  }
7522  return 0;
7523  }
7524 
7525  if( mc_take == choice ) {
7526  item &dish = *dish_it;
7527  if( dish.has_flag( flag_FROZEN ) ) {
7528  dish.cold_up(); //don't know how to check if the dish is frozen liquid and prevent extraction of it into inventory...
7529  }
7530  const std::string dish_name = dish.tname( dish.charges, false );
7531  const bool is_delicious = dish.has_flag( flag_HOT ) && dish.has_flag( flag_EATEN_HOT );
7532  if( dish.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
7533  if( !p->check_eligible_containers_for_crafting( *recipe_id( it->get_var( "RECIPE" ) ), 1 ) ) {
7534  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't have a suitable container to store your %s." ),
7535  dish_name );
7536 
7537  return 0;
7538  }
7539  liquid_handler::handle_all_liquid( dish, PICKUP_RANGE );
7540  } else {
7541  p->i_add( dish );
7542  }
7543 
7544  it->remove_item( *dish_it );
7545  it->erase_var( "RECIPE" );
7546  if( is_delicious ) {
7547  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
7548  _( "You got the dish from the multi-cooker. The %s smells delicious." ),
7549  dish_name );
7550  } else {
7551  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You got the %s from the multi-cooker." ),
7552  dish_name );
7553  }
7554 
7555  return 0;
7556  }
7557 
7558  // Do nothing if there's non-dish contained in the cooker
7559  if( mc_empty == choice ) {
7560  return std::nullopt;
7561  }
7562 
7563  if( mc_start == choice ) {
7564  uilist dmenu;
7565  dmenu.text = _( "Choose desired meal:" );
7566 
7567  std::vector<const recipe *> dishes;
7568 
7569  inventory crafting_inv = p->crafting_inventory();
7570  // add some tools and qualities. we can't add this qualities to
7571  // json, because multicook must be used only by activating, not as
7572  // component other crafts.
7573  crafting_inv.push_back( item( "hotplate", calendar::turn_zero ) ); //hotplate inside
7574  // some recipes requires tongs
7575  crafting_inv.push_back( item( "tongs", calendar::turn_zero ) );
7576  // toolset with CUT and other qualities inside
7577  crafting_inv.push_back( item( "toolset", calendar::turn_zero ) );
7578  // good COOK, BOIL, CONTAIN qualities inside
7579  crafting_inv.push_back( item( "pot", calendar::turn_zero ) );
7580 
7581  int counter = 0;
7582  static const std::set<std::string> multicooked_subcats = { "CSC_FOOD_MEAT", "CSC_FOOD_VEGGI", "CSC_FOOD_PASTA" };
7583 
7584  for( const recipe * const &r : get_avatar().get_learned_recipes().in_category( "CC_FOOD" ) ) {
7585  if( multicooked_subcats.count( r->subcategory ) > 0 ) {
7586  dishes.push_back( r );
7587  const bool can_make = r->deduped_requirements().can_make_with_inventory(
7588  crafting_inv, r->get_component_filter() );
7589 
7590  dmenu.addentry( counter++, can_make, -1, r->result_name( /*decorated=*/true ) );
7591  }
7592  }
7593 
7594  dmenu.query();
7595 
7596  int choice = dmenu.ret;
7597 
7598  if( choice < 0 ) {
7599  return std::nullopt;
7600  } else {
7601  const recipe *meal = dishes[choice];
7602  int mealtime;
7603  if( it->get_var( "MULTI_COOK_UPGRADE" ) == "UPGRADE" ) {
7604  mealtime = meal->time_to_craft_moves( *p, recipe_time_flag::ignore_proficiencies );
7605  } else {
7606  mealtime = meal->time_to_craft_moves( *p, recipe_time_flag::ignore_proficiencies ) * 2;
7607  }
7608 
7609  const int all_charges = charges_to_start + mealtime / 1000 * units::to_watt(
7610  it->type->tool->power_draw ) / 1000;
7611 
7612  if( it->ammo_remaining( p, true ) < all_charges ) {
7613 
7614  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
7615  _( "The multi-cooker needs %d charges to cook this dish." ),
7616  all_charges );
7617 
7618  return std::nullopt;
7619  }
7620 
7621  const auto filter = is_crafting_component;
7622  const requirement_data *reqs =
7623  meal->deduped_requirements().select_alternative( *p, crafting_inv, filter );
7624  if( !reqs ) {
7625  return std::nullopt;
7626  }
7627 
7628  for( const auto &component : reqs->get_components() ) {
7629  p->consume_items( component, 1, filter );
7630  }
7631 
7632  it->set_var( "RECIPE", meal->ident().str() );
7633  it->set_var( "DISH", meal->result().str() );
7634  it->set_var( "COOKTIME", mealtime );
7635 
7636  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
7637  _( "The screen flashes blue symbols and scales as the multi-cooker begins to shake." ) );
7638 
7639  it->convert( itype_multi_cooker_filled, p ).active = true;
7640  it->ammo_consume( charges_to_start - charge_buffer, pos, p );
7641 
7642  p->practice( skill_cooking, meal->difficulty * 3 ); //little bonus
7643 
7644  return 0;
7645  }
7646  }
7647 
7648  if( mc_upgrade == choice ) {
7649 
7650  if( !p->has_morale_to_craft() ) {
7651  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your morale is too low to craft" ) );
7652  return std::nullopt;
7653  }
7654 
7655  bool has_tools = true;
7656 
7657  const inventory &cinv = p->crafting_inventory();
7658 
7659  if( !cinv.has_amount( itype_soldering_iron, 1 ) ) {
7660  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You need a %s." ),
7661  item::nname( itype_soldering_iron ) );
7662  has_tools = false;
7663  }
7664 
7665  if( !cinv.has_quality( qual_SCREW_FINE ) ) {
7666  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You need an item with %s of 1 or more to upgrade this." ),
7667  qual_SCREW_FINE.obj().name );
7668  has_tools = false;
7669  }
7670 
7671  if( !has_tools ) {
7672  return std::nullopt;
7673  }
7674 
7675  p->practice( skill_electronics, rng( 5, 10 ) );
7676  p->practice( skill_fabrication, rng( 5, 10 ) );
7677 
7678  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 7_seconds ) );
7679 
7680  /** @EFFECT_INT increases chance to successfully upgrade multi-cooker */
7681 
7682  /** @EFFECT_ELECTRONICS increases chance to successfully upgrade multi-cooker */
7683 
7684  /** @EFFECT_FABRICATION increases chance to successfully upgrade multi-cooker */
7685  if( p->get_skill_level( skill_electronics ) + p->get_skill_level( skill_fabrication ) + p->int_cur >
7686  rng( 20, 35 ) ) {
7687 
7688  p->practice( skill_electronics, rng( 5, 20 ) );
7689  p->practice( skill_fabrication, rng( 5, 20 ) );
7690 
7691  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
7692  _( "You've successfully upgraded the multi-cooker, master tinkerer! Now it cooks faster!" ) );
7693 
7694  it->set_var( "MULTI_COOK_UPGRADE", "UPGRADE" );
7695 
7696  return 0;
7697 
7698  } else {
7699 
7700  if( !one_in( 5 ) ) {
7701  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral,
7702  _( "You sagely examine and analyze the multi-cooker, but don't manage to accomplish anything." ) );
7703  } else {
7704  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
7705  _( "Your tinkering nearly breaks the multi-cooker! Fortunately, it still works, but best to stop messing with it." ) );
7706  it->set_var( "MULTI_COOK_UPGRADE", "DAMAGED" );
7707  }
7708 
7709  return 0;
7710 
7711  }
7712 
7713  }
7714 
7715  return 0;
7716 }
7717 
7718 std::optional<int> iuse::multicooker_tick( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
7719 {
7720  const int charge_buffer = 2;
7721 
7722  //stop action before power runs out and iuse deletes the cooker
7723  if( it->ammo_remaining( p, true ) < charge_buffer ) {
7724  it->active = false;
7725  it->erase_var( "RECIPE" );
7726  it->convert( itype_multi_cooker, p );
7727  //drain the buffer amount given at activation
7728  it->ammo_consume( charge_buffer, pos, p );
7729  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
7730  _( "Batteries low, entering standby mode. With a low buzzing sound the multi-cooker shuts down." ) );
7731  return 0;
7732  }
7733 
7734  int cooktime = it->get_var( "COOKTIME", 0 );
7735  cooktime -= 100;
7736 
7737  if( cooktime >= 300 && cooktime < 400 ) {
7738  //Smart or good cook or careful
7739  /** @EFFECT_INT increases chance of checking multi-cooker on time */
7740 
7741  /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL increases chance of checking multi-cooker on time */
7742  avatar &player = get_avatar();
7743  if( player.int_cur + player.get_skill_level( skill_cooking ) + player.get_skill_level(
7744  skill_survival ) > 16 ) {
7745  add_msg( m_info, _( "The multi-cooker should be finishing shortly" ) );
7746  }
7747  }
7748 
7749  if( cooktime <= 0 ) {
7750  item meal( it->get_var( "DISH" ), time_point( calendar::turn ), 1 );
7751  if( ( *recipe_id( it->get_var( "RECIPE" ) ) ).hot_result() ) {
7752  meal.heat_up();
7753  } else {
7754  meal.set_item_temperature( std::max( temperatures::cold,
7755  get_weather().get_temperature( pos ) ) );
7756  }
7757 
7758  it->active = false;
7759  it->erase_var( "COOKTIME" );
7760  it->convert( itype_multi_cooker, p );
7761  if( it->can_contain( meal ).success() ) {
7762  it->put_in( meal, pocket_type::CONTAINER );
7763  } else {
7764  add_msg( m_info,
7765  _( "Obstruction detected. Please remove any items lodged in the multi-cooker." ) );
7766  return 0;
7767  }
7768 
7769  //~ sound of a multi-cooker finishing its cycle!
7770  sounds::sound( pos, 8, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "ding!" ), true, "misc", "ding" );
7771 
7772  return 0;
7773  } else {
7774  it->set_var( "COOKTIME", cooktime );
7775  return 0;
7776  }
7777 
7778  return 0;
7779 }
7780 
7781 std::optional<int> iuse::weather_tool( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
7782 {
7783  weather_manager &weather = get_weather();
7784  const w_point weatherPoint = *weather.weather_precise;
7785 
7786  /* Possibly used twice. Worth spending the time to precalculate. */
7787  const units::temperature player_local_temp = weather.get_temperature( p->pos() );
7788 
7789  if( it->typeId() == itype_weather_reader ) {
7790  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "The %s's monitor slowly outputs the data" ),
7791  it->tname() );
7792  }
7793  if( it->has_flag( flag_THERMOMETER ) ) {
7794  std::string temperature_str;
7795  if( get_map().has_flag_ter( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, p->pos() ) ||
7796  get_map().has_flag_ter( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SHALLOW_WATER, p->pos() ) ) {
7797  temperature_str = print_temperature( get_weather().get_cur_weather_gen().get_water_temperature() );
7798  } else {
7799  temperature_str = print_temperature( player_local_temp );
7800  }
7801  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "The %1$s reads %2$s." ), it->tname(),
7802  temperature_str );
7803  }
7804  if( it->has_flag( flag_HYGROMETER ) ) {
7805  if( it->typeId() == itype_hygrometer ) {
7806  p->add_msg_if_player(
7807  m_neutral, _( "The %1$s reads %2$s." ), it->tname(),
7808  print_humidity( get_local_humidity( weatherPoint.humidity, get_weather().weather_id,
7809  g->is_sheltered( p->pos() ) ) ) );
7810  } else {
7811  p->add_msg_if_player(
7812  m_neutral, _( "Relative Humidity: %s." ),
7813  print_humidity( get_local_humidity( weatherPoint.humidity, get_weather().weather_id,
7814  g->is_sheltered( p->pos() ) ) ) );
7815  }
7816  }
7817  if( it->has_flag( flag_BAROMETER ) ) {
7818  if( it->typeId() == itype_barometer ) {
7819  p->add_msg_if_player(
7820  m_neutral, _( "The %1$s reads %2$s." ), it->tname(),
7821  print_pressure( static_cast<int>( weatherPoint.pressure ) ) );
7822  } else {
7823  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "Pressure: %s." ),
7824  print_pressure( static_cast<int>( weatherPoint.pressure ) ) );
7825  }
7826  }
7827 
7828  if( it->typeId() == itype_weather_reader ) {
7829  int vehwindspeed = 0;
7830  if( optional_vpart_position vp = get_map().veh_at( p->pos() ) ) {
7831  vehwindspeed = std::abs( vp->vehicle().velocity / 100 ); // For mph
7832  }
7833  const oter_id &cur_om_ter = overmap_buffer.ter( p->global_omt_location() );
7834  const int windpower = get_local_windpower( weather.windspeed + vehwindspeed, cur_om_ter,
7835  p->get_location(), weather.winddirection, g->is_sheltered( p->pos() ) );
7836 
7837  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "Wind Speed: %.1f %s." ),
7838  convert_velocity( windpower * 100, VU_WIND ),
7839  velocity_units( VU_WIND ) );
7840  p->add_msg_if_player(
7841  m_neutral, _( "Feels Like: %s." ),
7842  print_temperature( player_local_temp + get_local_windchill( weatherPoint.temperature,
7843  weatherPoint.humidity, windpower ) ) );
7844  std::string dirstring = get_dirstring( weather.winddirection );
7845  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "Wind Direction: From the %s." ), dirstring );
7846  }
7847 
7848  return 1; //TODO check
7849 }
7850 
7851 std::optional<int> iuse::sextant( Character *p, item *, const tripoint &pos )
7852 {
7853  const std::pair<units::angle, units::angle> sun_position = sun_azimuth_altitude( calendar::turn );
7854  const float altitude = to_degrees( sun_position.second );
7855  if( debug_mode ) {
7856  // Debug mode always shows all sun angles
7857  const float azimuth = to_degrees( sun_position.first );
7858  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, "Sun altitude %.1f, azimuth %.1f", altitude, azimuth );
7859  } else if( g->is_sheltered( pos ) ) {
7860  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You can't see the Sun from here." ) );
7861  } else if( altitude > 0 ) {
7862  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "The Sun is at an altitude of %.1f." ), altitude );
7863  } else {
7864  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "The Sun is below the horizon." ) );
7865  }
7866 
7867  return 0;
7868 }
7869 
7870 std::optional<int> iuse::lux_meter( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
7871 {
7872  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "The illumination is %.1f." ),
7873  g->natural_light_level( pos.z ) );
7874 
7875  return it->type->charges_to_use();
7876 }
7877 
7878 std::optional<int> iuse::dbg_lux_meter( Character *p, item *, const tripoint &pos )
7879 {
7880  map &here = get_map();
7881  const float incident_light = incident_sunlight( current_weather( here.getglobal( pos ) ),
7882  calendar::turn );
7883  const float nat_light = g->natural_light_level( pos.z );
7884  const float sunlight = sun_light_at( calendar::turn );
7885  const float sun_irrad = sun_irradiance( calendar::turn );
7886  const float incident_irrad = incident_sun_irradiance( current_weather( here.getglobal( pos ) ),
7887  calendar::turn );
7888  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral,
7889  _( "Incident light: %.1f\nNatural light: %.1f\nSunlight: %.1f\nSun irradiance: %.1f\nIncident irradiance %.1f" ),
7890  incident_light, nat_light, sunlight, sun_irrad, incident_irrad );
7891 
7892  return 0;
7893 }
7894 
7895 std::optional<int> iuse::calories_intake_tracker( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
7896 {
7897  if( p->has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
7898  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't know what you're looking at." ) );
7899  return std::nullopt;
7900  } else {
7901  std::string msg;
7902  msg.append( "*** " );
7903  msg.append( string_format( _( "You check your registered calories intake on your %s." ),
7904  it->tname( 1, false ) ) );
7905  msg.append( " ***\n\n" );
7906  msg.append( "-> " );
7907  msg.append( string_format( _( "You consumed %d kcal today and %d kcal yesterday." ),
7908  p->as_avatar()->get_daily_ingested_kcal( false ),
7909  p->as_avatar()->get_daily_ingested_kcal( true ) ) );
7910  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, msg );
7911  popup( msg );
7912  }
7913  return 1;
7914 }
7915 
7916 std::optional<int> iuse::directional_hologram( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
7917 {
7918  if( it->is_armor() && !p->is_worn( *it ) ) {
7919  p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You need to wear the %1$s before activating it." ),
7920  it->tname() );
7921  return std::nullopt;
7922  }
7923  const std::optional<tripoint> posp = choose_adjacent( _( "Choose hologram direction." ) );
7924  if( !posp ) {
7925  return std::nullopt;
7926  }
7927  const tripoint delta = *posp - get_player_character().pos();
7928 
7929  monster *const hologram = g->place_critter_at( mon_hologram, *posp );
7930  if( !hologram ) {
7931  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Can't create a hologram there." ) );
7932  return std::nullopt;
7933  }
7934  tripoint_abs_ms target = p->get_location() + delta * ( 4 * SEEX );
7935  hologram->friendly = -1;
7936  hologram->add_effect( effect_docile, 1_hours );
7937  hologram->wandf = -30;
7938  hologram->set_summon_time( 60_seconds );
7939  hologram->set_dest( target );
7940  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
7941  return 1;
7942 }
7943 
7944 std::optional<int> iuse::capture_monster_veh( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
7945 {
7946  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
7947  return std::nullopt;
7948  }
7949  if( !it->has_flag( flag_VEHICLE ) ) {
7950  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The %s must be installed in a vehicle before being loaded." ),
7951  it->tname() );
7952  return std::nullopt;
7953  }
7954  capture_monster_act( p, it, pos );
7955  return 0;
7956 }
7957 
7958 bool item::release_monster( const tripoint &target, const int radius )
7959 {
7960  shared_ptr_fast<monster> new_monster = make_shared_fast<monster>();
7961  try {
7962  ::deserialize_from_string( *new_monster, get_var( "contained_json", "" ) );
7963  } catch( const std::exception &e ) {
7964  debugmsg( _( "Error restoring monster: %s" ), e.what() );
7965  return false;
7966  }
7967  if( !g->place_critter_around( new_monster, target, radius ) ) {
7968  return false;
7969  }
7970  erase_var( "contained_name" );
7971  erase_var( "contained_json" );
7972  erase_var( "name" );
7973  erase_var( "weight" );
7974  return true;
7975 }
7976 
7977 // didn't want to drag the monster:: definition into item.h, so just reacquire the monster
7978 // at target
7979 int item::contain_monster( const tripoint &target )
7980 {
7981  const monster *const mon_ptr = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( target );
7982  if( !mon_ptr ) {
7983  return 0;
7984  }
7985  const monster &f = *mon_ptr;
7986 
7987  set_var( "contained_json", ::serialize( f ) );
7988  set_var( "contained_name", f.type->nname() );
7989  set_var( "name", string_format( _( "%s holding %s" ), type->nname( 1 ),
7990  f.type->nname() ) );
7991  // Need to add the weight of the empty container because item::weight uses the "weight" variable directly.
7992  set_var( "weight", to_milligram( type->weight + f.get_weight() ) );
7993  g->remove_zombie( f );
7994  return 0;
7995 }
7996 
7997 std::optional<int> iuse::capture_monster_act( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint &pos )
7998 {
7999  if( p->is_mounted() ) {
8000  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't capture a creature mounted." ) );
8001  return std::nullopt;
8002  }
8003  if( it->has_var( "contained_name" ) ) {
8004  // Remember contained_name for messages after release_monster erases it
8005  const std::string contained_name = it->get_var( "contained_name", "" );
8006 
8007  if( it->release_monster( pos ) ) {
8008  // It's been activated somewhere where there isn't a player or monster, good.
8009  return 0;
8010  }
8011  if( it->has_flag( flag_PLACE_RANDOMLY ) ) {
8012  if( it->release_monster( p->pos(), 1 ) ) {
8013  return 0;
8014  }
8015  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There is no place to put the %s." ), contained_name );
8016  return std::nullopt;
8017  } else {
8018  const std::string query = string_format( _( "Place the %s where?" ), contained_name );
8019  const std::optional<tripoint> pos_ = choose_adjacent( query );
8020  if( !pos_ ) {
8021  return std::nullopt;
8022  }
8023  if( it->release_monster( *pos_ ) ) {
8024  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You release the %s." ), contained_name );
8025  return 0;
8026  }
8027  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't place the %s there!" ), contained_name );
8028  return std::nullopt;
8029  }
8030  } else {
8031  if( !it->has_property( "creature_size_capacity" ) ) {
8032  debugmsg( "%s has no creature_size_capacity.", it->tname() );
8033  return std::nullopt;
8034  }
8035  const std::string capacity = it->get_property_string( "creature_size_capacity" );
8036  if( Creature::size_map.count( capacity ) == 0 ) {
8037  debugmsg( "%s has invalid creature_size_capacity %s.",
8038  it->tname(), capacity.c_str() );
8039  return std::nullopt;
8040  }
8041  const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> adjacent_capturable = []( const tripoint & pnt ) {
8042  const monster *mon_ptr = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( pnt );
8043  return mon_ptr != nullptr;
8044  };
8045  const std::string query = string_format( _( "Grab which creature to place in the %s?" ),
8046  it->tname() );
8047  const std::optional<tripoint> target_ = choose_adjacent_highlight( query,
8048  _( "There is no creature nearby you can capture." ), adjacent_capturable, false );
8049  if( !target_ ) {
8050  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't use a %s there." ), it->tname() );
8051  return std::nullopt;
8052  }
8053  const tripoint target = *target_;
8054 
8055  // Capture the thing, if it's on the target square.
8056  if( const monster *const mon_ptr = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( target ) ) {
8057  const monster &f = *mon_ptr;
8058 
8059  if( f.get_size() > Creature::size_map.find( capacity )->second ) {
8060  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The %1$s is too big to put in your %2$s." ),
8061  f.type->nname(), it->tname() );
8062  return std::nullopt;
8063  }
8064  // TODO: replace this with some kind of melee check.
8065  int chance = f.hp_percentage() / 10;
8066  // A weaker monster is easier to capture.
8067  // If the monster is friendly, then put it in the item
8068  // without checking if it rolled a success.
8069  if( f.friendly != 0 || one_in( chance ) ) {
8070  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You capture the %1$s in your %2$s." ),
8071  f.type->nname(), it->tname() );
8072  return it->contain_monster( target );
8073  } else {
8074  p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "The %1$s avoids your attempts to put it in the %2$s." ),
8075  f.type->nname(), it->type->nname( 1 ) );
8076  }
8077  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
8078  } else {
8079  add_msg( _( "The %s can't capture nothing" ), it->tname() );
8080  return std::nullopt;
8081  }
8082  }
8083  return 0;
8084 }
8085 
8086 washing_requirements washing_requirements_for_volume( const units::volume &vol )
8087 {
8088  int water = divide_round_up( vol, 125_ml );
8089  int cleanser = divide_round_up( vol, 1_liter );
8090  int time = to_moves<int>( 10_seconds * ( vol / 250_ml ) );
8091  return { water, cleanser, time };
8092 }
8093 
8094 std::optional<int> iuse::wash_soft_items( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
8095 {
8096  if( p->fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
8097  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't see to do that!" ) );
8098  return std::nullopt;
8099  }
8100  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
8101  return std::nullopt;
8102  }
8103  // Check that player isn't over volume limit as this might cause it to break... this is a hack.
8104  // TODO: find a better solution.
8105  if( p->volume_capacity() < p->volume_carried() ) {
8106  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You're carrying too much to clean anything." ) );
8107  return std::nullopt;
8108  }
8109 
8110  wash_items( p, true, false );
8111  return 0;
8112 }
8113 
8114 std::optional<int> iuse::wash_hard_items( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
8115 {
8116  if( p->fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
8117  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't see to do that!" ) );
8118  return std::nullopt;
8119  }
8120  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
8121  return std::nullopt;
8122  }
8123  // Check that player isn't over volume limit as this might cause it to break... this is a hack.
8124  // TODO: find a better solution.
8125  if( p->volume_capacity() < p->volume_carried() ) {
8126  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You're carrying too much to clean anything." ) );
8127  return std::nullopt;
8128  }
8129 
8130  wash_items( p, false, true );
8131  return 0;
8132 }
8133 
8134 std::optional<int> iuse::wash_all_items( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
8135 {
8136  if( p->fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
8137  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't see to do that!" ) );
8138  return std::nullopt;
8139  }
8140 
8141  // Check that player isn't over volume limit as this might cause it to break... this is a hack.
8142  // TODO: find a better solution.
8143  if( p->volume_capacity() < p->volume_carried() ) {
8144  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You're carrying too much to clean anything." ) );
8145  return std::nullopt;
8146  }
8147 
8148  wash_items( p, true, true );
8149  return 0;
8150 }
8151 
8152 std::optional<int> iuse::wash_items( Character *p, bool soft_items, bool hard_items )
8153 {
8154  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
8155  return std::nullopt;
8156  }
8157  p->inv->restack( *p );
8158  const inventory &crafting_inv = p->crafting_inventory();
8159 
8160  auto is_liquid = []( const item & it ) {
8161  return it.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID );
8162  };
8163  int available_water = std::max(
8164  crafting_inv.charges_of( itype_water, INT_MAX, is_liquid ),
8165  crafting_inv.charges_of( itype_water_clean, INT_MAX, is_liquid )
8166  );
8167  int available_cleanser = std::max( crafting_inv.charges_of( itype_soap ),
8168  std::max( crafting_inv.charges_of( itype_detergent ),
8169  crafting_inv.charges_of( itype_liquid_soap, INT_MAX, is_liquid ) ) );
8170 
8171  const inventory_filter_preset preset( [soft_items, hard_items]( const item_location & location ) {
8172  return location->has_flag( flag_FILTHY ) && !location->has_flag( flag_NO_CLEAN ) &&
8173  ( ( soft_items && location->is_soft() ) || ( hard_items && !location->is_soft() ) );
8174  } );
8175  auto make_raw_stats = [available_water,
8176  available_cleanser]( const std::vector<std::pair<item_location, int>> &locs
8177  ) {
8178  units::volume total_volume = 0_ml;
8179  for( const auto &pair : locs ) {
8180  total_volume += pair.first->volume( false, true, pair.second );
8181  }
8182  washing_requirements required = washing_requirements_for_volume( total_volume );
8183  const std::string time = colorize( to_string( time_duration::from_moves( required.time ), true ),
8184  c_light_gray );
8185  auto to_string = []( int val ) -> std::string {
8186  if( val == INT_MAX )
8187  {
8188  return pgettext( "short for infinity", "inf" );
8189  }
8190  return string_format( "%3d", val );
8191  };
8192  const std::string water = string_join( display_stat( "", required.water, available_water,
8193  to_string ), "" );
8194  const std::string cleanser = string_join( display_stat( "", required.cleanser, available_cleanser,
8195  to_string ), "" );
8196  using stats = inventory_selector::stats;
8197  return stats{{
8198  {{ _( "Water" ), water }},
8199  {{ _( "Cleanser" ), cleanser }},
8200  {{ _( "Estimated time" ), time }}
8201  }};
8202  };
8203  inventory_multiselector inv_s( *p, preset, _( "ITEMS TO CLEAN" ),
8204  make_raw_stats, /*allow_select_contained=*/true );
8205  inv_s.add_character_items( *p );
8206  inv_s.add_nearby_items( PICKUP_RANGE );
8207  inv_s.set_title( _( "Multiclean" ) );
8208  inv_s.set_hint( _( "To clean x items, type a number before selecting." ) );
8209  if( inv_s.empty() ) {
8210  popup( std::string( _( "You have nothing to clean." ) ), PF_GET_KEY );
8211  return std::nullopt;
8212  }
8213  const drop_locations to_clean = inv_s.execute();
8214  if( to_clean.empty() ) {
8215  return std::nullopt;
8216  }
8217  // Determine if we have enough water and cleanser for all the items.
8218  units::volume total_volume = 0_ml;
8219  for( drop_location pair : to_clean ) {
8220  if( !pair.first ) {
8221  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
8222  return std::nullopt;
8223  }
8224  total_volume += pair.first->volume( false, true, pair.second );
8225  }
8226 
8227  washing_requirements required = washing_requirements_for_volume( total_volume );
8228 
8229  if( !crafting_inv.has_charges( itype_water, required.water, is_liquid ) &&
8230  !crafting_inv.has_charges( itype_water_clean, required.water, is_liquid ) ) {
8231  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You need %1$i charges of water or clean water to wash these items." ),
8232  required.water );
8233  return std::nullopt;
8234  } else if( !crafting_inv.has_charges( itype_soap, required.cleanser ) &&
8235  !crafting_inv.has_charges( itype_detergent, required.cleanser ) &&
8236  !crafting_inv.has_charges( itype_liquid_soap, required.cleanser, is_liquid ) ) {
8237  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You need %1$i charges of cleansing agent to wash these items." ),
8238  required.cleanser );
8239  return std::nullopt;
8240  }
8241  const std::vector<Character *> helpers = p->get_crafting_helpers();
8242  const std::size_t helpersize = p->get_num_crafting_helpers( 3 );
8243  required.time *= ( 1.0f - ( helpersize / 10.0f ) );
8244  for( std::size_t i = 0; i < helpersize; i++ ) {
8245  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s helps with this task" ), helpers[i]->get_name() );
8246  }
8247  // Assign the activity values.
8248  p->assign_activity( wash_activity_actor( to_clean, required ) );
8249 
8250  return 0;
8251 }
8252 
8253 std::optional<int> iuse::break_stick( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
8254 {
8255  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
8256  p->mod_stamina( static_cast<int>( 0.05f * p->get_stamina_max() ) );
8257 
8258  if( p->get_str() < 5 ) {
8259  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You are too weak to even try." ) );
8260  return 0;
8261  } else if( p->get_str() <= rng( 5, 11 ) ) {
8262  p->add_msg_if_player(
8263  _( "You use all your strength, but the stick won't break. Perhaps try again?" ) );
8264  return 0;
8265  }
8266  std::vector<item_comp> comps;
8267  comps.emplace_back( it->typeId(), 1 );
8268  p->consume_items( comps, 1, is_crafting_component );
8269  int chance = rng( 0, 100 );
8270  map &here = get_map();
8271  if( chance <= 20 ) {
8272  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You try to break the stick in two, but it shatters into splinters." ) );
8273  here.spawn_item( p->pos(), "splinter", 2 );
8274  return 1;
8275  } else if( chance <= 40 ) {
8276  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The stick breaks clean into two parts." ) );
8277  here.spawn_item( p->pos(), "stick", 2 );
8278  return 1;
8279  } else if( chance <= 100 ) {
8280  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You break the stick, but one half shatters into splinters." ) );
8281  here.spawn_item( p->pos(), "stick", 1 );
8282  here.spawn_item( p->pos(), "splinter", 1 );
8283  return 1;
8284  }
8285  return 0;
8286 }
8287 
8288 std::optional<int> iuse::weak_antibiotic( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
8289 {
8290  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You take some %s." ), it->tname() );
8291  if( p->has_effect( effect_infected ) && !p->has_effect( effect_weak_antibiotic ) ) {
8292  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The throbbing of the infection diminishes. Slightly." ) );
8293  }
8294  p->add_effect( effect_weak_antibiotic, 12_hours );
8295  p->add_effect( effect_weak_antibiotic_visible, rng( 9_hours, 15_hours ) );
8296  return 1;
8297 }
8298 
8299 std::optional<int> iuse::strong_antibiotic( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
8300 {
8301  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You take some %s." ), it->tname() );
8302  if( p->has_effect( effect_infected ) && !p->has_effect( effect_strong_antibiotic ) ) {
8303  p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You feel much better - almost entirely." ) );
8304  }
8305  p->add_effect( effect_strong_antibiotic, 12_hours );
8306  p->add_effect( effect_strong_antibiotic_visible, rng( 9_hours, 15_hours ) );
8307  return 1;
8308 }
8309 
8310 static item *wield_before_use( Character *const p, item *const it, const std::string &msg )
8311 {
8312  if( !p->is_wielding( *it ) ) {
8313  if( !p->is_armed() || query_yn( msg.c_str(), it->tname() ) ) {
8314  if( !p->wield( *it ) ) {
8315  // Will likely happen if it is too heavy, or the player is
8316  // wielding something that can't be unwielded
8317  add_msg( m_bad, "%s", p->can_wield( *it ).str() );
8318  return nullptr;
8319  }
8320  // `it` is no longer the item we are using (note that `player::wielded` is a value).
8321  return &*p->get_wielded_item();
8322  } else {
8323  return nullptr;
8324  }
8325  }
8326  return it;
8327 }
8328 
8329 std::optional<int> iuse::craft( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
8330 {
8331  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
8332  return std::nullopt;
8333  }
8334  it = wield_before_use( p, it, _( "Wield the %s and start working?" ) );
8335  if( !it ) {
8336  return std::nullopt;
8337  }
8338 
8339  const std::string craft_name = it->tname();
8340 
8341  if( !it->is_craft() ) {
8342  debugmsg( "Attempted to start working on non craft '%s.' Aborting.", craft_name );
8343  return std::nullopt;
8344  }
8345 
8346  if( !p->can_continue_craft( *it ) ) {
8347  return std::nullopt;
8348  }
8349  const recipe &rec = it->get_making();
8350  if( !p->has_recipe( &rec ) ) {
8351  p->add_msg_player_or_npc(
8352  _( "You don't know the recipe for the %s and can't continue crafting." ),
8353  _( "<npcname> doesn't know the recipe for the %s and can't continue crafting." ),
8354  rec.result_name() );
8355  return 0;
8356  }
8357  p->add_msg_player_or_npc(
8358  pgettext( "in progress craft", "You start working on the %s." ),
8359  pgettext( "in progress craft", "<npcname> starts working on the %s." ), craft_name );
8360  item_location craft_loc = item_location( *p, it );
8361  p->assign_activity( craft_activity_actor( craft_loc, false ) );
8362 
8363  return 0;
8364 }
8365 
8366 std::optional<int> iuse::disassemble( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
8367 {
8368  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
8369  return std::nullopt;
8370  }
8371  it = wield_before_use( p, it, _( "Wield the %s and start working?" ) );
8372  if( !it ) {
8373  return std::nullopt;
8374  }
8375  if( !p->has_item( *it ) ) {
8376  return std::nullopt;
8377  }
8378 
8379  p->disassemble( item_location( *p, it ), false );
8380 
8381  return 0;
8382 }
8383 
8384 std::optional<int> iuse::melatonin_tablet( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
8385 {
8386  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You pop a %s." ), it->tname() );
8387  if( p->has_effect( effect_melatonin ) ) {
8388  p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
8389  _( "Simply taking more melatonin won't help. You have to go to sleep for it to work." ) );
8390  }
8391  p->add_effect( effect_melatonin, 16_hours );
8392  return 1;
8393 }
8394 
8395 std::optional<int> iuse::coin_flip( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
8396 {
8397  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You flip a %s." ), it->tname() );
8398  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, one_in( 2 ) ? _( "Heads!" ) : _( "Tails!" ) );
8399  return 0;
8400 }
8401 
8402 std::optional<int> iuse::play_game( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
8403 {
8404  if( p->is_avatar() ) {
8405  std::vector<npc *> followers = g->get_npcs_if( [p]( const npc & n ) {
8406  return n.is_ally( *p ) && p->sees( n ) && n.can_hear( p->pos(), p->get_shout_volume() );
8407  } );
8408  int fcount = followers.size();
8409  if( fcount > 0 ) {
8410  const char *qstr = fcount > 1 ? _( "Play the %s with your friends?" ) :
8411  _( "Play the %s with your friend?" );
8412  std::string res = query_popup()
8413  .context( "FRIENDS_ME_CANCEL" )
8414  .message( qstr, it->tname() )
8415  .option( "FRIENDS" ).option( "ME" ).option( "CANCEL" )
8416  .query().action;
8417  if( res == "FRIENDS" ) {
8418  if( fcount > 1 ) {
8419  add_msg( n_gettext( "You and your %d friend start playing.",
8420  "You and your %d friends start playing.", fcount ), fcount );
8421  } else {
8422  add_msg( _( "You and your friend start playing." ) );
8423  }
8424  p->assign_activity( ACT_GENERIC_GAME, to_moves<int>( 1_hours ), fcount,
8425  p->get_item_position( it ), "gaming with friends" );
8426  for( npc *n : followers ) {
8427  n->assign_activity( ACT_GENERIC_GAME, to_moves<int>( 1_hours ), fcount,
8428  n->get_item_position( it ), "gaming with friends" );
8429  }
8430  } else if( res == "ME" ) {
8431  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You start playing." ) );
8432  p->assign_activity( ACT_GENERIC_GAME, to_moves<int>( 1_hours ), -1,
8433  p->get_item_position( it ), "gaming" );
8434  } else {
8435  return std::nullopt;
8436  }
8437  return 0;
8438  } // else, fall through to playing alone
8439  }
8440  if( query_yn( _( "Play a game with the %s?" ), it->tname() ) ) {
8441  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You start playing." ) );
8442  p->assign_activity( ACT_GENERIC_GAME, to_moves<int>( 1_hours ), -1,
8443  p->get_item_position( it ), "gaming" );
8444  } else {
8445  return std::nullopt;
8446  }
8447  return 0;
8448 }
8449 
8450 std::optional<int> iuse::magic_8_ball( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
8451 {
8452  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You ask the %s, then flip it." ), it->tname() );
8453  int rn = rng( 0, 3 );
8454  std::string msg_category;
8455  game_message_type color;
8456  if( rn == 0 ) {
8457  msg_category = "magic_8ball_bad";
8458  color = m_bad;
8459  } else if( rn == 1 ) {
8460  msg_category = "magic_8ball_unknown";
8461  color = m_info;
8462  } else {
8463  msg_category = "magic_8ball_good";
8464  color = m_good;
8465  }
8466  p->add_msg_if_player( color, _( "The %s says: %s" ), it->tname(),
8467  SNIPPET.random_from_category( msg_category ).value_or( translation() ) );
8468  return 0;
8469 }
8470 
8471 std::optional<int> iuse::measure_resonance( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
8472 {
8473  if( !it->ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
8474  popup( _( "The device doesn't have enough power to function!" ) );
8475  return std::nullopt;
8476  }
8477  // Get a list of resonant artifacts to show the player.
8478  std::vector<uilist_entry> uile;
8479  std::vector<item_location> artifacts;
8480  int i = 0;
8481  for( const item_location &item_loc : p->all_items_loc() ) {
8482  const item *tested_item = item_loc.get_item();
8483  if( !tested_item->get_proc_enchantments().empty() ) {
8484  // We've found an item with an enchantment. This doesn't guarantee it is an artifact! Prune the list to only items with resonance
8485  bool is_resonant_artifact = false;
8486  for( enchant_cache &maybe_artifact : tested_item->get_proc_enchantments() ) {
8487  if( maybe_artifact.get_value_add( enchant_vals::mod::ARTIFACT_RESONANCE ) ) {
8488  // Found an artifact with resonance!
8489  is_resonant_artifact = true;
8490  }
8491  }
8492  if( is_resonant_artifact ) {
8493  // Return tname, should handle renamed artifacts?
8494  uilist_entry entry( i, true, i + 49, item_loc.get_item()->tname() );
8495  uile.emplace_back( entry );
8496  artifacts.emplace_back( item_loc );
8497  i++;
8498  }
8499  }
8500  }
8501 
8502  if( artifacts.empty() ) {
8503  popup( _( "The device indicates none of the items on your person resonate with registered nether phenomena." ) );
8504  // Explicitly no cost for passive detection
8505  return std::nullopt;
8506  }
8507  int choice = 0;
8508  choice = uilist( _( "The device found these items have resonant properties.\nChoose one to scan." ),
8509  uile );
8510 
8511  if( choice < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( choice ) >= artifacts.size() ) {
8512  // Player exited menu. No cost, return early.
8513  return std::nullopt;
8514  }
8515 
8516  popup( _( "Calculating." ) );
8517  popup( _( "Calculating" ) );
8518  int actual_resonance = 0;
8519  // Add up the resonance of all the enchantments on the selected item to get the item's total resonance
8520  for( enchant_cache &this_ench : artifacts.at( choice ).get_item()->get_proc_enchantments() ) {
8521  actual_resonance += this_ench.get_value_add( enchant_vals::mod::ARTIFACT_RESONANCE );
8522  }
8523  // Random 15% +- on the detection, no freebies here.
8524  int resonance_offset_low = 0.85 * actual_resonance;
8525  int resonance_offset_high = 1.15 * actual_resonance;
8526  int detected_resonance = rng( resonance_offset_low, resonance_offset_high );
8527  // Different messages for different resonance levels? Dangerous resonance levels are in suffer::from_artifact_resonance
8528  popup( _( "Detected resonance approximately equal to %i units." ), detected_resonance );
8529 
8530  p->consume_charges( *it, it->type->charges_to_use() );
8531  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_minutes ) );
8532 
8533 
8534  return 0;
8535 }
8536 
8537 std::optional<int> iuse::electricstorage( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
8538 {
8539  // From item processing
8540  if( !p ) {
8541  debugmsg( "%s called action electricstorage that requires character but no character is present",
8542  it->typeId().str() );
8543  return std::nullopt;
8544  }
8545 
8546  if( p->is_npc() ) {
8547  return std::nullopt;
8548  }
8549 
8550  if( p->is_underwater() ) {
8551  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Unfortunately your device is not waterproof." ) );
8552  return std::nullopt;
8553  }
8554 
8555  if( !it->is_ebook_storage() ) {
8556  debugmsg( "ELECTRICSTORAGE iuse called on item without ebook type pocket" );
8557  return std::nullopt;
8558  }
8559 
8560  if( p->has_flag( json_flag_HYPEROPIC ) && !p->worn_with_flag( flag_FIX_FARSIGHT ) &&
8561  !p->has_effect( effect_contacts ) && !p->has_effect( effect_transition_contacts ) &&
8562  !p->has_flag( json_flag_ENHANCED_VISION ) ) {
8563  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
8564  _( "You'll need to put on reading glasses before you can see the screen." ) );
8565  return std::nullopt;
8566  }
8567 
8568  auto filter = [it]( const item & itm ) {
8569  return !itm.is_broken() &&
8570  &itm != it &&
8571  itm.has_pocket_type( pocket_type::EBOOK );
8572  };
8573 
8574  item_location storage_card = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu(
8575  filter, *p->as_avatar(), _( "Use what storage device?" ),
8576  -1, _( "You don't have any empty book storage devices." ) );
8577 
8578  if( !storage_card ) {
8579  return std::nullopt;
8580  }
8581 
8582  // list of books of from_it that are not in to_it
8583  auto book_difference = []( const item & from_it, const item & to_it ) -> std::vector<const item *> {
8584  std::set<itype_id> existing_ebooks;
8585  for( const item *ebook : to_it.ebooks() )
8586  {
8587  if( !ebook->is_book() ) {
8588  debugmsg( "ebook type pocket contains non-book item %s", ebook->typeId().str() );
8589  continue;
8590  }
8591 
8592  existing_ebooks.insert( ebook->typeId() );
8593  }
8594 
8595  std::vector<const item *> ebooks;
8596  for( const item *ebook : from_it.ebooks() )
8597  {
8598  if( !ebook->is_book() ) {
8599  debugmsg( "ebook type pocket contains non-book item %s", ebook->typeId().str() );
8600  continue;
8601  }
8602 
8603  if( existing_ebooks.count( ebook->typeId() ) ) {
8604  continue;
8605  }
8606 
8607  ebooks.emplace_back( ebook );
8608  }
8609  return ebooks;
8610  };
8611 
8612  std::vector<const item *> to_storage = book_difference( *it, *storage_card );
8613  std::vector<const item *> to_device = book_difference( *storage_card, *it );
8614 
8615  uilist smenu;
8616  smenu.text = _( "What to do with your storage devices:" );
8617 
8618  smenu.addentry( 1, !to_device.empty(), 't', _( "Copy to device from the card" ) );
8619  smenu.addentry( 2, !to_storage.empty(), 'f', _( "Copy from device to the card" ) );
8620  smenu.addentry( 3, !storage_card->ebooks().empty(), 'v', _( "View books in the card" ) );
8621  smenu.query();
8622 
8623  // were any books moved to or from the device
8624  int books_moved = 0;
8625 
8626  auto move_books = [&books_moved]( const std::vector<const item *> &fromset, item & toit ) -> void {
8627  books_moved = fromset.size();
8628  for( const item *ebook : fromset )
8629  {
8630  toit.put_in( *ebook, pocket_type::EBOOK );
8631  }
8632  };
8633 
8634  if( smenu.ret == 1 ) {
8635  // to device
8636  move_books( to_device, *it );
8637  } else if( smenu.ret == 2 ) {
8638  // from device
8639  move_books( to_storage, *storage_card );
8640  } else if( smenu.ret == 3 ) {
8641  game_menus::inv::ebookread( *p, storage_card );
8642  return std::nullopt;
8643  } else {
8644  return std::nullopt;
8645  }
8646 
8647  if( books_moved > 0 ) {
8648  p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
8649  if( smenu.ret == 1 ) {
8650  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
8651  n_gettext( "Copied one book to the device.",
8652  "Copied %1$s books to the device.", books_moved ),
8653  books_moved );
8654  } else if( smenu.ret == 2 ) {
8655  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
8656  n_gettext( "Copied one book to the %2$s.",
8657  "Copied %1$s books to the %2$s.", books_moved ),
8658  books_moved, storage_card->tname() );
8659  }
8660  }
8661 
8662  return std::nullopt;
8663 }
8664 
8665 std::optional<int> iuse::ebooksave( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
8666 {
8667  if( !p ) {
8668  debugmsg( "%s called action ebooksave that requires character but no character is present",
8669  it->typeId().str() );
8670  return std::nullopt;
8671  }
8672  if( !it->is_ebook_storage() ) {
8673  debugmsg( "EBOOKSAVE iuse called on item without ebook type pocket" );
8674  return std::nullopt;
8675  }
8676 
8677  if( p->is_npc() ) {
8678  return std::nullopt;
8679  }
8680 
8681  if( p->is_underwater() ) {
8682  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Unfortunately your device is not waterproof." ) );
8683  return std::nullopt;
8684  }
8685 
8686  if( p->has_flag( json_flag_HYPEROPIC ) && !p->worn_with_flag( flag_FIX_FARSIGHT ) &&
8687  !p->has_effect( effect_contacts ) && !p->has_effect( effect_transition_contacts ) &&
8688  !p->has_flag( json_flag_ENHANCED_VISION ) ) {
8689  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
8690  _( "You'll need to put on reading glasses before you can see the screen." ) );
8691  return std::nullopt;
8692  }
8693 
8694  item_location ereader = item_location( *p, it );
8695  const drop_locations to_scan = game_menus::inv::ebooksave( *p, ereader );
8696  if( to_scan.empty() ) {
8697  return std::nullopt;
8698  }
8699  std::vector<item_location> books;
8700  for( const auto &pair : to_scan ) {
8701  books.push_back( pair.first );
8702  }
8703  p->assign_activity( ebooksave_activity_actor( books, ereader ) );
8704  return std::nullopt;
8705 }
8706 
8707 std::optional<int> iuse::ebookread( Character *p, item *it, const tripoint & )
8708 {
8709  if( !p ) {
8710  debugmsg( "%s called action ebookread that requires character but no character is present",
8711  it->typeId().str() );
8712  return std::nullopt;
8713  }
8714  if( !it->is_ebook_storage() ) {
8715  debugmsg( "EBOOKREAD iuse called on item without ebook type pocket" );
8716  return std::nullopt;
8717  }
8718 
8719  if( p->is_npc() ) {
8720  return std::nullopt;
8721  }
8722 
8723  if( p->is_underwater() ) {
8724  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Unfortunately your device is not waterproof." ) );
8725  return std::nullopt;
8726  }
8727 
8728  if( p->has_flag( json_flag_HYPEROPIC ) && !p->worn_with_flag( flag_FIX_FARSIGHT ) &&
8729  !p->has_effect( effect_contacts ) && !p->has_effect( effect_transition_contacts ) &&
8730  !p->has_flag( json_flag_ENHANCED_VISION ) ) {
8731  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
8732  _( "You'll need to put on reading glasses before you can see the screen." ) );
8733  return std::nullopt;
8734  }
8735 
8736  // Only turn on the eBook light, if it's too dark to read
8737  if( p->fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 && !it->active && it->is_transformable() ) {
8738  const use_function *readinglight = it->type->get_use( "transform" );
8739  if( readinglight ) {
8740  readinglight->call( p, *it, p->pos() );
8741  }
8742  }
8743 
8744  item_location ereader = item_location( *p, it );
8745  item_location book = game_menus::inv::ebookread( *p, ereader );
8746 
8747  if( !book ) {
8748  return std::nullopt;
8749  }
8750 
8751  p->as_avatar()->read( book, ereader );
8752 
8753  return std::nullopt;
8754 }
8755 
8756 std::optional<int> iuse::binder_add_recipe( Character *p, item *binder, const tripoint & )
8757 {
8758  if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
8759  return std::nullopt;
8760  }
8761 
8762  if( p->is_underwater() ) {
8763  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You rethink trying to write underwater." ) );
8764  return std::nullopt;
8765  }
8766 
8767  const inventory crafting_inv = p->crafting_inventory();
8768  const std::vector<const item *> writing_tools = crafting_inv.items_with( [&]( const item & it ) {
8769  return it.has_flag( flag_WRITE_MESSAGE ) && it.ammo_sufficient( p );
8770  } );
8771 
8772  if( writing_tools.empty() ) {
8773  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You do not have anything to write with." ) );
8774  return std::nullopt;
8775  }
8776 
8777  if( p->fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4.0f ) {
8778  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "It's too dark to write!" ) );
8779  return std::nullopt;
8780  }
8781 
8782  const recipe_subset res = p->get_recipes_from_books( crafting_inv );
8783  const std::vector<const recipe *> recipes( res.begin(), res.end() );
8784  const auto enough_writing_tool_charges = [&writing_tools]( int pages ) {
8785  for( const item *it : writing_tools ) {
8786  if( it->ammo_required() == 0 ) {
8787  return true;
8788  }
8789  pages -= it->ammo_remaining() / it->ammo_required();
8790  if( pages <= 0 ) {
8791  return true;
8792  }
8793  }
8794  return false;
8795  };
8796 
8797  uilist menu;
8798  menu.text = _( "Choose recipe to copy" );
8799  menu.hilight_disabled = true;
8800  menu.desc_enabled = true;
8801  for( const recipe *r : recipes ) {
8802  std::string desc;
8803  const int pages = bookbinder_copy_activity_actor::pages_for_recipe( *r );
8804  const std::string pages_str = string_format( n_gettext( "%1$d page", "%1$d pages", pages ), pages );
8805 
8806  if( !p->has_charges( itype_paper, pages ) ) {
8807  desc = _( "You do not have enough paper to copy this recipe." );
8808  } else if( binder->remaining_ammo_capacity() < pages ) {
8809  desc = _( "Your recipe book can not fit this recipe." );
8810  } else if( binder->get_saved_recipes().count( r->ident() ) != 0 ) {
8811  desc = string_format( _( "Your recipe book already has a recipe for %s." ), r->result_name() );
8812  } else if( !enough_writing_tool_charges( pages ) ) {
8813  desc = _( "Your writing tools do not have enough charges." );
8814  }
8815  menu.addentry_col( -1, desc.empty(), std::nullopt, r->result_name(), pages_str, desc );
8816  }
8817  if( menu.entries.empty() ) {
8818  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You do not have any recipes you can copy." ) );
8819  return std::nullopt;
8820  }
8821  menu.query();
8822  if( menu.ret < 0 ) {
8823  return std::nullopt;
8824  }
8825 
8826  bookbinder_copy_activity_actor act( item_location( *p, binder ), recipes[menu.ret]->ident() );
8827  p->assign_activity( act );
8828 
8829  return std::nullopt;
8830 }
8831 
8832 std::optional<int> iuse::binder_manage_recipe( Character *p, item *binder,
8833  const tripoint &ipos )
8834 {
8835  if( p->is_underwater() ) {
8836  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Doing that would ruin the %1$s." ), binder->tname() );
8837  return std::nullopt;
8838  }
8839 
8840  std::set<recipe_id> binder_recipes = binder->get_saved_recipes();
8841  const std::vector<recipe_id> recipes( binder_recipes.begin(), binder_recipes.end() );
8842 
8843  if( binder_recipes.empty() ) {
8844  p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You have no recipes to manage." ) );
8845  return std::nullopt;
8846  }
8847 
8848  uilist rmenu;
8849  rmenu.text = _( "Manage recipes" );
8850 
8851  for( const recipe_id &new_recipe : recipes ) {
8852  std::string recipe_name = new_recipe->result_name();
8853  if( p->knows_recipe( &new_recipe.obj() ) ) {
8854  recipe_name += _( " (KNOWN)" );
8855  }
8856 
8857  const int pages = bookbinder_copy_activity_actor::pages_for_recipe( *new_recipe );
8858  rmenu.addentry_col( -1, true, ' ', recipe_name,
8859  string_format( n_gettext( "%1$d page", "%1$d pages", pages ), pages ) );
8860  }
8861 
8862  rmenu.query();
8863  if( rmenu.ret < 0 ) {
8864  return std::nullopt;
8865  }
8866  const recipe_id &rec = recipes[rmenu.ret];
8867  if( !query_yn( _( "Remove the recipe for %1$s?" ), rec->result_name() ) ) {
8868  return std::nullopt;
8869  }
8870  binder_recipes.erase( rec );
8871  binder->set_saved_recipes( binder_recipes );
8872 
8873  const int pages = bookbinder_copy_activity_actor::pages_for_recipe( *rec );
8874  binder->ammo_consume( pages, ipos, p );
8875 
8876  return std::nullopt;
8877 }
8878 
8879 std::optional<int> iuse::voltmeter( Character *p, item *, const tripoint & )
8880 {
8881  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Check voltage where?" ) );
8882  if( !pnt_ ) {
8883  return std::nullopt;
8884  }
8885 
8886  const map &here = get_map();
8887  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( *pnt_ );
8888 
8889  if( !vp ) {
8890  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There's nothing to measure there." ) );
8891  return std::nullopt;
8892  }
8893  if( vp->vehicle().fuel_left( itype_battery ) ) {
8894  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %1$s has voltage." ), vp->vehicle().name );
8895  } else {
8896  p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %1$s has no voltage." ), vp->vehicle().name );
8897  }
8898  return 1;
8899 }
8900 
8901 void use_function::dump_info( const item &it, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
8902 {
8903  if( actor != nullptr ) {
8904  actor->info( it, dump );
8905  }
8906 }
8907 
8908 ret_val<void> use_function::can_call( const Character &p, const item &it,
8909  const tripoint &pos ) const
8910 {
8911  if( actor == nullptr ) {
8912  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't do anything interesting with your %s." ),
8913  it.tname() );
8914  } else if( it.is_broken() ) {
8915  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Your %s is broken and won't activate." ),
8916  it.tname() );
8917  }
8918 
8919  return actor->can_use( p, it, pos );
8920 }
8921 
8922 std::optional<int> use_function::call( Character *p, item &it,
8923  const tripoint &pos ) const
8924 {
8925  return actor->use( p, it, pos );
8926 }
